product_description:
Treat and transform skin with the FOREO LUNA™ mini 2, a facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Perfect for all skin types, the facial brush inspires healthier-looking skin; helping to clear and clarify for a more luminous complexion.
Combining T-Sonic pulsations with three zones of soft, non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates, helping to unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and blemish-inducing impurities; its eight adjustable intensities allow you to customise your cleansing experience. The silicone 'bristles' are super hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean.
100% waterproof, the device is safe for use in the bath or shower.
Three Zone Breakdown:
Thinner touch-points gently cleanse sensitive and normal skin.
Thicker touch-points for precision cleansing.
Broader touch-points on the reverse side cater to oilier skin.
name: LUNA™ mini 2 - Pearl Pink

With a silky soft feel for sublime comfort, the innovative mask calms the mind and senses and has been clinically proven to visibly reduce signs of ageing, including the appearance of fine lines and crow's feet in just four weeks.

When in contact with skin, copper ions are transferred to promote natural cell renewal, making sure you get all the beauty sleep you need. Featuring an adjustable Velcro® strap to secure in place, the mask is ideal for use on-the-move. Safe and non-irritating. E.N.

product_description:
The FOREO LUNA™ mini provides a deep yet gentle cleansing action, effectively removing make-up, dirt and oil by using T-Sonic™ technology, which channels transdermal sonic pulsations across the skin’s surface. Suitable for use with any cleanser, your skin will be smoothed and refined in just three days!
Featuring 1300 non-abrasive, hygienic, silicone-coated touch-points that are configured into three zones to suit all skin types, it cleans impurities from you pores to reduce blemishes. Waterproof and fully rechargeable, just one minute of use morning and evening will leave you with clearer, brighter skin.
The LUNA™ mini is an innovative facial-cleansing device that directs T-Sonic™ pulsations through an ultra-hygienic silicone brush. Compact and travel-friendly, it requires no replacement brushes and transforms the skin by removing breakout-causing impurities, leaving behind a healthier-looking, radiant complexion - as well as the confidence that comes with having clear and clean skin.
FOREO’S INNOVATIONS VERSATILE 3-ZONE BRUSH
Suitable for cleansing every skin type, the LUNA™ mini’s brush features thinner touch-points on one side to gently cleanse sensitive or dry skin, thicker touch-points grouped at the top for precision cleansing and broad touch-points on the reverse side for channeling pulsations more directly to cleanse and refresh oilier skin.
WHAT IS T-SONIC™ TECHNOLOGY|
T-Sonic™ technology refers to the up to 8,000 transdermal sonic pulsations per minute that are channeled through soft silicone touch-points to remove dead skin cells, and unclog pores of dirt, oil and make-up residue.
MANUAL VS. T-SONIC™ CLEANSING
T-Sonic™ technology delivers far more effective deep cleansing than just using the hands alone. This is because the fingers, in addition to often having oil, dirt, bacteria and other contaminants on them, cannot cleanse the pores as deeply as the LUNA™ mini or remove dead skin cells, as the LUNA™ mini has the ideal texture required to remove impurities from the skin.
BRISTLES VS. SILICONE
Unlike bristles, silicone is non-porous so it is resistant to bacteria build-up, doesn’t absorb dirt and oil, is easy to clean and quick-drying for an ultra-hygienic facial-cleansing device. Silicone is also not only body-safe and hypoallergenic, but far more gentle on the skin than similar products on the market thanks to its soft, smooth and non-abrasive texture.
name: LUNA™ mini - Petal Pink

product_description:

It is also able to promote circulation to visibly reduce any under-eye puffiness. Utilising a potent blend of Hyaluronic Acid and NCTF (Filorga’s exclusive complex), the vitamin-rich cream visibly plumps skin to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines at the eye contour and create a refreshed appearance.
Gliding effortlessly onto the eye contour, the anti-ageing eye cream defeats signs of fatigue by leaving eyes youthful and rejuvenated.
name: Optim-Eyes Eye Contour Cream 15ml

product_description:

The revolutionary tool relieves muscular tension and supports lymphatic drainage to reduce the look of puffiness, preventing congestion and jawline breakouts. With an intelligent formula, the aromatic cleanser combines omega rich oils and powerful antioxidants with anti-ageing actives, melting effortlessly into the skin and deep into pores to eradicate grime, dirt and makeup; expertly decongesting to leave your complexion clean, revitalised and glowing.

Synergising a blend of potent actives and innovative peptides, the multi-targeted serum works at a cellular level to plump and brighten the skin, diminishing the appearance of uneven pigmentation whilst boosting collagen production to firm skin and soften the tracks of unruly wrinkles. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, the lightweight serum will hydrate your complexion and expertly improve radiance and tone. Expect glowing skin that looks younger, firmer and energised. 
Professional Cleansing Mitt
Specially designed with two layers of dual effect cotton fabric and a sponge inner to retain heat and moisture for high performance cleansing, the mitt fits comfortably onto the fingers for easy use. Features a textured side to gently exfoliate the skin's surface, drawing out dirt and impurities, and a fine-weave side for the removal of eye make-up. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect a brighter, revitalised and clarified complexion.

Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology from the LUNA™ mini 2 with FOREO'S signature, non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity, dual-zone range; its thicker touch points at the top perform an intense clean to help unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and dead skin, whilst softer, thinner points at the bottom gently cleanse sensitive or normal skin, and larger areas such as the cheeks. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean.
Easy to operate and super-portable, the device combines the high-tech power of the LUNA™ range with the ease of a single intensity. Experience simple cleansing without the need to recharge. Skin appears bright, refined and more even in tone.
Product Features:
Non-rechargeable battery: up to 100 uses.
1 pulsation intensity.
Ultra-hygienic.
Fully waterproof.
Suitable for all skin types.
Travel-friendly size – same size as a cotton pad.

It effectively removes make-up, dirt and excess oil using its 1300 non-abrasive touch points, coated in smooth silicone to create the feel of a facial, whilst the three different zones ensure that it's suitable for all skin types. Fully rechargeable and waterproof, it will leave your skin looking brighter, clearer and healthier.
The LUNA™ mini is an innovative facial-cleansing device that directs T-Sonic™ pulsations through an ultra-hygienic silicone brush. Compact and travel-friendly, it requires no replacement brushes and transforms the skin by removing breakout-causing impurities, leaving behind a healthier-looking, radiant complexion - as well as the confidence that comes with having clear and clean skin.
FOREO’S INNOVATIONS VERSATILE 3-ZONE BRUSH
Suitable for cleansing every skin type, the LUNA™ mini’s brush features thinner touch-points on one side to gently cleanse sensitive or dry skin, thicker touch-points grouped at the top for precision cleansing and broad touch-points on the reverse side for channeling pulsations more directly to cleanse and refresh oilier skin.
WHAT IS T-SONIC™ TECHNOLOGY T-Sonic™ technology refers to the up to 8,000 transdermal sonic pulsations per minute that are channeled through soft silicone touch-points to remove dead skin cells, and unclog pores of dirt, oil and makeup residue.
MANUAL VS. T-SONIC™ CLEANSING T-Sonic™ technology delivers far more effective deep cleansing than just using the hands alone. This is because the fingers, in addition to often having oil, dirt, bacteria and other contaminants on them, cannot cleanse the pores as deeply as the LUNA™ mini or remove dead skin cells, as the LUNA™ mini has the ideal texture required to remove impurities from the skin.
BRISTLES VS. SILICONE
Unlike bristles, silicone is non-porous so it is resistant to bacteria build-up, doesn’t absorb dirt and oil, is easy to clean and quick-drying for an ultra-hygienic facial-cleansing device. Silicone is also not only body-safe and hypoallergenic, but far more gentle on the skin than similar products on the market thanks to its soft, smooth and non-abrasive texture.
name: LUNA™ mini - Turquoise Blue

product_description:
Konjac Sponge Puff with Added Charcoal and Bamboo 

The Konjac Face & Body Sponge Puff with Added Charcoal Bamboo is perfect for teen skin and those with oily skin prone to spots, blackheads and outbreaks. The Bamboo Charcoal contains activated carbon and various minerals that enhance absorptive ability, perfect for removing excess oil. Bamboo Charcoal is also a natural anti- oxidant  so will help fight hard-to-reach, acne-causing bacteria.

Benefits of The Konjac Sponge with Bamboo Charcoal:

    * Kills acne-causing bacteria
    * Deep cleans skin pores eliminating blackheads, dirt and oil
    * Retains the natural pH balance of your skin
    * Gently exfoliates skin to create a natural glow

Directions:

Before use, always wash the sponge thoroughly. We recommend plunging it in water and squeezing several times.

If the sponge has dried out, always allow it to fully absorb water before putting against your skin.

Gently massage the face and body in circular motion all over, to exfoliate dead skin cells, and deeply cleanse. The massaging will stimulate tired skin & encourage skin renewal. Soap or cleansing solution can be added to the sponge if desired, but is not necessary.

Your sponge should last several months, but once it starts to look tired, or starts to break down. Please replace it. The better care you take of your sponge, the longer it will last.

Non-rechargeable battery: up to 100 uses.
1 pulsation intensity.
Ultra-hygienic.

Suitable for all skin types.

Infused with Marula Oil and 3.5% D-Glyox; a patent-pending, anti-ageing ingredient blending Pomegranate Flower, Silk Tree and Liposome-Peptide to help combat glycoxidation (a combination of glycation and oxidation that modify the skin's proteins to contribute to loss of elasticity, dullness and lack of suppleness).
Catering specifically for dry skin, the fast-absorbing formula works to firm, plump and soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst Hyaluronic Acid hydrates and Shea Butter improves the skin's texture. Creating the perfect canvas for make-up application, you can expect a nourished, smoothened complexion.

product_description:
Care for your lips with this beautiful, sheer colour balm from Burt's Bees.
Our new tinted balms give you a hint of colour with a soft, sweet flavour and natural ingredients that moisturise and condition your lips.
name: Bees Tinted Lip Balm - Rose 4.25g

product_description:
Combat ageing around the delicate eye area with Sarah Chapman's Skinesis Eye Recovery, a multi-functional formula enriched with vitamins and antioxidants to target dark circles, puffiness and lines around the eyes.
Combining innovative peptides with makeup technology, the eye treatment effectively reduces the look of lines and ageing, performing a botox-like effect to instantly plump skin and disguise tiredness with hyaluronic filling spheres and optical diffusers. Eyes will look younger, smoother, more energised. - K.N.

product_description: Catering for sensitive skin types, the Replenishing Rich Moisturiser from Simple works to nourish, replenish and hydrate your complexion for up to twelve hours. Infused with a skin-loving blend of Pro-Vitamin B5, Glycerin, Bisabolol and Allantoin, the fast-absorbing formula leaves skin smooth, supple and touchably soft.

product_description:
Refresh your skin with Caudalie Gentle Cleansing Milk. Perfect for daily use, the soft and velvety texture glides onto your skin to remove make up, dirt, oil and impurities from your pores, leaving you with glowing and rejuvenated skin.
Specially formulated for normal to dry skin, it's enriched with grape-seed polyphenols, cornflower and oat extract, which decongest the skin to leave it looking bright, as well as protecting agaisnt free radical damage. Suitable for both the eyes and face, this nourishing cleanser will leave your skin feeling soft and supple.
name: Gentle Cleansing Milk (100ml)

product_description:
Inspire a natural, healthy glow with the First Aid Beauty Facial Radiance Pads. Combining the perfect amount of lactic and glycolic acids to make the pads safe for daily use, they work to improve skin's clarity whilst visibly reducing the look of pores and diminishing the appearance of fine lines for a brighter, smoother, younger looking complexion.
Ideal for all skin types, even the most sensitive, its blend of cucumber and Indian gooseberry tone the skin, whilst lemon peel and liquorice root leave your complexion renewed, radiant and glowing. - K.N.

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with Caudalie's Micellar Cleansing Water; a multi-beneficial formula infused with Organic Grape Water and plant-derived Glycerin to expertly cleanse, soothe and hydrate skin.
Suitable for all skin types, including the most sensitive, the micellar water effortlessly eliminates dirt, make-up and impurities from the face and eyes to leave skin feeling fresh, comfortable and velvety soft. Imparts a delicate, uplifting fragrance of Watermelon, Mint Leaves and Orange and Lemon Blossom.
name: Micellar Cleansing Water Duo 200ml (Worth £30)

product_description:
Treat spot-prone skin to the Me Clear Spot Treatment Device, a rechargeable, anti-blemish device that utilises blue LED light and patented tri-action technology to banish breakouts without dryness or irritation.
Working to calm and eliminate blemishes whilst preventing future flare-ups, the device combines blue LED light with sonic vibration and gentle warming for effective results. The LED light targets the skin's surface to eradicate P.acnes bacteria; the sonic vibration encourages microcirculation to ease inflammation and gently agitate the skin (exposing bacteria to the spot-banishing light); and excess light energy provides a gentle warming sensation that helps open pores to target more bacteria.
Portable for on-the-go convenience, the 2-minute treatment will help clear your skin with visible results.
Clinical Results:
After 1 treatment, 19% of blemishes were reduced.
After 2 treatments, 77% of blemishes improved or completely resolved.
After 3 treatments within a 24 hour period, 87% of blemishes were improved or resolved.
The first signs of improvement were noticed as early as a few hours following the first session of treatment.
name: Clear Spot Treatment Device for Blemish - Prone Skin

product_description:
Discover boosted anti-ageing correction with Filorga NCTF-Intensive; a potent serum that tackles wrinkles and loss of elasticity, whilst leaving skin radiant.
The serum boasts an ultra-light texture, which effortlessly glides onto skin and absorbs quickly. Utilising NCTF®, a medicine-derived polyrevitalising complex, the potent fluid has a concentration that is equivalent to injectable anti-ageing treatments and so delivers similar benefits without the pain or expense. The potent serum combines Retinol, a DNA complex and Vitamin C to create a rejuvenating solution that severely reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as combating loss of elasticity to leave the face visibly firm.
Working tirelessly, the serum reveals youthful skin that is energised and youthful.
name: NCTF-Intensive 30ml

product_description:
Rediscover youthful radiance with Skin Republic Brightening Vitamin C Face Mask, a serum-infused face mask that performs deep level action to help brighten, hydrate and even out the tone of your skin.
Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the treatment is dedicated to illuminating and hydrating the complexion. Combining extracts of Coffee Bean with Vitamin E and Rosa Centifolia, the mask performs a tightening and brightening effect without drying skin, reducing the appearance wrinkles and imperfections to reveal a more luminous, youthful look; wrinkles are eased and the severity of freckles and age spots are reduced.
Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, it helps fight free radical damage and slows down signs of ageing. Its dose of Allantoin and Liquorice work in tandem to lock in moisture and restore suppleness and youthful vitality.
Skin is radiant, even in tone and revitalised.
The Benefits of Using a Sheet Mask:
Sheet masks utilise a Transdermal Delivery System that ensures nutrients, nourishment and moisture are delivered deeply and effectively. Their breathable, 'second  
skin' nature allows for faster absorption than traditional masks and creams. They are also more hygienic.
Key Ingredients:
Vitamin C - an antioxidant that helps slow down free radical damage.
Vitamin E - a potent antioxidant with anti-ageing and moisturising properties.
Mulberry Bark Extract - a natural skin brightener and anti-inflammatory.
Liquorice - helps restore suppleness to dry skin.
Allantoin - a naturally soothing skin protectant that promotes cell replication for smooth skin.
Rosa Centifolia - a therapeutic astringent to tighten pores and remove excess oil without drying.
Green Tea - antioxidant that protects against free radicals.
Coffee Bean Extract - powerful antioxidant known to brighten tone whilst reducing the appearance of wrinkles.
Cocoa Extract - potent antioxidant that fights free radicals.
Bearberry - improves clarity and helps diminish dark spots and pigmentation.
name: Republic Brightening Vitamin C Face Mask 25ml

Gently refresh your complexion with the Oil Balancing+ Charcoal Anti-Pollution Facial Masque from Sukin. With antioxidant White Tea, Bilberry and Quince, the astringent face mask promotes cell renewal and prevents breakouts, whilst absorbing excess sebum to eliminate unwanted shine and visibly reduce the look of enlarged pores. Skin is left smooth, supple and refined with a healthy glow. Suitable for oily to combination skin.

product_description: The Face Cleanser (142g) by First Aid Beauty is designed for sensitive skin types. It cleanses your complexion, neck and décolleté, tackling imperfections and impurities. The pH-balanced formula blends a range of powerful antioxidants. These reduce and smooth out the imperfections caused by external aggressors, leaving your skin looking healthier and more youthful. For best results, apply the Face Cleanser to a wet complexion and massage it into your skin using your fingertips. Remove with a mitt or cloth and rinse thoroughly. Repeat as needed. The Face Cleanser is recommended for daily use, in the morning and before going to bed.

Re-energise tired and dull skin around the eye area with NUXE Crème Prodigieuse Contour Des Yeux – Contouring Eye Cream. Formulated to fight ageing and puffiness, eyes will look bright and youthful.
NUXE Crème Prodigieuse Contour Des Yeux – Contouring Eye Cream is a light and non-greasy formula that hydrates and smoothes the skin around the eyes, in turn preventing fine lines and wrinkles occurring. 95% of users reported smoother skin and 85% reported that the signs of stress and fatigue had disappeared. Directions of use:
name: Creme Prodigieuse Contour Des Yeux - Contouring Eye Cream (15ml)

Developed using the brand's advanced vine resveratrol and plumping micro hyaluronic acids, the powerful anti-ageing treatment diminishes puffiness, dark circles and signs of fatigue, whilst smoothening the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to reveal youthful-looking peepers.
Roller 
This free tool allows you to recreate a relaxing facial massage from the comfort of your own home. The device helps stimulate blood circulation and tone facial muscles, alleviating the look of puffiness for visibly firmer and smoother skin.

Tackle signs of ageing with the help of Imedeen Derma One 12 Month Bundle. The lycopene antioxidant has been scientifically shown to be twice as effective as beta-carotene and 100 times more potent than vitamin E at combating free radical damage.
Imedeen Derma One promotes healthier and more radiant skin whilst providing softer looking skin. The perfect product for when dreaded signs of getting older appear. -SA

Reignite a youthful glow with the Liquid Gold Ultimate Resurfacing Duo from Alpha-H. Combining two of the brand's best-sellers, the kit boosts tired, dull complexions to leave you with smooth, healthy-looking skin after use.
Alpha-H Liquid Gold (100ml)

Enriched with 5% Cosmetic Grade Glycolic Acid to remove dead skin cells and minimise pigmentation, whilst delivering intense hydration for smoother, decongested skin.

A weekly treatment that works to improve skin tone and texture. Harnessing the powers of 15% Glycolic Acid, the face mask buffs away dead skin cells and impurities, whilst a nourishing blend of Manuka Honey, Macadamia Nut Oil and Lavender Extract leave skin looking dewy, fresh and radiant after use. Targets blemishes and pigmentation to reveal a rejuvenated, rebalanced and refined complexion with restored luminosity and a plump appearance.

Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Moisturising Eye Cream protects delicate skin around the eyes from dryness. Cosmetics, airborne toxins and other matter can damage skin over time. This cream contains vitamin E extract and can help skin retain its moisture balance and retain a more youthful appearance. Regular use can also diminish the look of fine lines, puffiness, and circles under the eyes. In many cases, results can be seen in as little as 14 days.
Use a small amount daily after washing your face for best results.

The set is host to a daily cleanser, effective exfoliator, hydrating day cream and facial oil in capsule form. Combined, the products are able to thoroughly moisturise dry skin, revealing a youthful and smooth complexion.
Rehydrating Rosepetal Cleanser (200ml)
The Rehydrating Rosepetal Cleanser works to visibly restore a youthful bloom to dehydrated and mature skin. The effective formula is rich in Vitamin E, boasts an Egg Yolk base and is complete with extracts of Rose Petal, which combine to replenish skin’s moisture levels whilst offering purifying action. Ideal for dehydrated, mature and sensitive skin, the cleanser is gentle and replenishing whilst effectively removing skin impurities and make up.
Gentle Rose Exfoliator (50ml)
The Gentle Rose Exfoliator boasts a gel formula with tiny exfoliating Jojoba beads that work to brighten and smooth skin for a naturally radiant glow. The exfoliator is gentle enough to use every day on all skin types- especially sensitive or mature. A hydrating blend of Absolute of Moroccan Rose, soothing Cucumber and smooth micro spherical Jojoba beads exfoliate very gently yet effectively, leaving your skin silky and soft to the touch. The exfoliator is ideal for using prior to a treatment mask or moisturiser as it improves the penetration of other moisture treatments; helping you to re-hydrate and replenish your skin.
Hydra-Boost Day Cream (20ml)
Intensively hydrating, the Hydra-Boost Day Cream will banish areas of dryness to leave skin feeling smooth and soft. Enriched with an expert blend of Hyaluronic Acid, Marsh Samphire extract and Starflower Oil to strengthen your skin's natural moisture barrier, it also contains organic Myrtle and Vitamin E to protect skin against free radical damage. Producing an instant moisturising effect, it's the perfect treat for dry skin that is in need of a boost of hydration.
Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules (14 capsules)
The Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules are the ultimate anti-pollution solution; containing potent age-defying anti-oxidants to refresh, nourish and distress skin. The capsules work to visibly repair signs of ageing as well as sweeping clean the skin cell matrix, ridding it of toxins to allow nutrients to be absorbed, thus renewing youthful skin vitality. Lavender and Rose Absolute provide a ‘bliss effect’, meaning skin appears de-stressed and thoroughly nourished. The Rose day capsule restores a youthful bloom to skin, whilst the Lavender evening capsule balances and repairs stressed skin.

product_description:
Treat and transform skin with the FOREO LUNA™ play, an ultra-portable facial-cleansing device designed to provide a professional standard of skincare with its invigorating one-minute ritual. Perfect for all skin types, the facial brush inspires healthier-looking skin; helping to clear and clarify for a more luminous complexion. The perfect introductory product for FOREO beginners, the travel-sized device is the smallest in the range (the same size as a cotton pad!) and and offers up to 100 uses*.
Combining T-Sonic™ Pulsation Technology from the LUNA™ mini 2 with FOREO'S signature, non-porous silicone touch-points, the device gently yet effectively cleanses and exfoliates with a single intensity, dual-zone range; its thicker touch points at the top perform an intense clean to help unclog pores and lift away dirt, oil and dead skin, whilst softer, thinner points at the bottom gently cleanse sensitive or normal skin, and larger areas such as the cheeks. Flexible and easy to use, the silicone 'bristles' are ultra-hygienic and resist bacteria build-up to keep skin fresh and clean.
Easy to operate and super-portable, the device combines the high-tech power of the LUNA™ range with the ease of a single intensity. Experience simple cleansing without the need to recharge. Skin appears bright, refined and more even in tone.
Product Features:
Non-rechargeable battery: up to 100 uses.
1 pulsation intensity.
Ultra-hygienic.
Fully waterproof.
Suitable for all skin types.
Travel-friendly size – same size as a cotton pad.
name: LUNA™ play - Sunflower Yellow

product_description:
The LUNA™ from FOREO is a brush that deeply cleanses skin whilst reducing signs of ageing. Transform skin and boost radiance by effectively removing make-up, dirt and excess oil. The non-abrasive, soft silicone brush is easy to clean and non-porous to reduce the build up of bacteria. Designed with T-Sonic™ technology to thoroughly cleanse by channelling transdermal sonic pulsations across the skin’s surface to unblock pores and remove impurities, the device will give your skin a smoother and more refined appearance.
The top of the brush has broader touch-points to cleanse oily skin and focus on the T-zone, whilst the thinner touch-points and silicone waves gently cleanse sensitive and normal skin. The anti-ageing mode focuses on wrinkle-prone areas with lower frequency pulsations. The smart, adjustable pulsation intensities make the LUNA™ suitable for all skin types.
Its compact, lightweight design is ideal for travelling, and it is both waterproof and fully rechargeable. An innovative facial-cleansing device to leave your skin visibly brighter, clearer and healthier.
name: LUNA™ Exclusive for All Skin Types - Magenta

product_description:
Treat tired, hard-working hands to the Bulldog Original Hand Cream; a fast-absorbing, non-greasy formula to soften, condition and moisturise dry, rough skin.
Powered by Glycerine, Jojoba and Vitamin E to protect and hydrate hands, the brand's unique blend of eight essential oils delivers a masculine fragrance of zesty Lemon, Lime and Bergamot, combined with Geranium and Patchouli and laid on a base of Cedarwood, Vetiver and Artemisia Vulgaris. Hands are smooth, comfortable and subtly scented without sticky residue.
name: Original Hand Cream 75ml

product_description:
A soothing, cooling blue gel designed to alleviate problems which may result from waxing and or shaving. This blue gel will reduce ingrown hairs, razor bumps, razor burn, and redness. This formula combines powerful exfoliating agents to help release trapped hairs from underneath the skin, kill bacteria, and prevent ingrown hairs from reoccurring. It spreads quickly and evenly over skin, offering clinical levels of soothing relief for irritated patches.

Features:
name: The Cool Fix (Ingrown Hair Treatment) 156ml

product_description:
Moisten and soften your lips with the delicious KORRES Lip Butter Stick SPF15 in Rose. Ideal for chapped lips, its fantastic natural formula with mandarin oil offers deep nourishment and long-lasting care to leave your lips super smooth.
Using essential ingredients shea butter and sunflower wax, this Lip Butter Stick SPF15 in Rose will leave a subtle shiny rose tint on your lips while intensely hydrating and protecting, leaving you with soft, kissable lips! The mandarin oil conditions your dry lips while the SPF15 provides essential protection in your most vulnerable areas helping to heal and nourish your lips.
name: Lip Butter Stick Spf15 - Rose

product_description:
The FOREO LUNA™ mini provides a deep yet gentle cleansing action, effectively removing make-up, dirt and oil by using T-Sonic™ technology, which channels transdermal sonic pulsations across the skin’s surface. Suitable for use with any cleanser, your skin will be smoothed and refined in just three days!
Featuring 1300 non-abrasive, hygienic, silicone-coated touch-points that are configured into three zones to suit all skin types, it cleans impurities from you pores to reduce blemishes. Waterproof and fully rechargeable, just one minute of use morning and evening will leave you with clearer, brighter skin.
The LUNA™ mini is an innovative facial-cleansing device that directs T-Sonic™ pulsations through an ultra-hygienic silicone brush. Compact and travel-friendly, it requires no replacement brushes and transforms the skin by removing breakout-causing impurities, leaving behind a healthier-looking, radiant complexion - as well as the confidence that comes with having clear and clean skin.
FOREO’S INNOVATIONS VERSATILE 3-ZONE BRUSH
Suitable for cleansing every skin type, the LUNA™ mini’s brush features thinner touch-points on one side to gently cleanse sensitive or dry skin, thicker touch-points grouped at the top for precision cleansing and broad touch-points on the reverse side for channeling pulsations more directly to cleanse and refresh oilier skin.
WHAT IS T-SONIC™ TECHNOLOGY|
T-Sonic™ technology refers to the up to 8,000 transdermal sonic pulsations per minute that are channeled through soft silicone touch-points to remove dead skin cells, and unclog pores of dirt, oil and make-up residue.
MANUAL VS. T-SONIC™ CLEANSING
T-Sonic™ technology delivers far more effective deep cleansing than just using the hands alone. This is because the fingers, in addition to often having oil, dirt, bacteria and other contaminants on them, cannot cleanse the pores as deeply as the LUNA™ mini or remove dead skin cells, as the LUNA™ mini has the ideal texture required to remove impurities from the skin.
BRISTLES VS. SILICONE
Unlike bristles, silicone is non-porous so it is resistant to bacteria build-up, doesn’t absorb dirt and oil, is easy to clean and quick-drying for an ultra-hygienic facial-cleansing device. Silicone is also not only body-safe and hypoallergenic, but far more gentle on the skin than similar products on the market thanks to its soft, smooth and non-abrasive texture.
name: LUNA™ mini - Purple

product_description:
The Magnitone Active Clean Brush with Skin Kind Bristles is perfect for daily facial cleansing and makeup removal. Featuring Skin Kind bristles which provide deep yet gentle exfoliation, the replacement brush heads will remove dirt, oil and impurities from deep within your pores, leaving your skin looking and feeling soft, smooth and clear. A great choice for those with oily or blemish-prone complexions, the set of two brush heads will ensure your Magnitone device always works at its best. Compatible with the Magnitone Pulsar and the Magnitone Lucid. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Attach the brush head to your Magnitone device when the old one has become worn.
name: London Active Clean Brush with Skin Kind Bristles (Set of 2)

product_description: Fed up of dry lips? Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm in Black Tea and Blackberry works to protect lips from harsh weather conditions. The balm is enriched with skin conditioners and antioxidants that help hydrate the lips, whilst the black tea and blackberry soothes and relieves irritated lips. - SA
name: Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm Black Tea

product_description:
A delicate, multi-action formula that increases skin resistance and minimises the signs of irritation and sensitivity that leads to premature ageing, the beautiful REN Evercalm Gentle Cleansing Milk (150ml) gently works to remove dirt, pollution and make-up and is suitable for sensitive skin. - E.D

Directions of use:
- Gently rub between hands.
- Massage onto face.
- Rinse off with warm water.

product_description:
Reveal fresh luminosity with the Elemis Your New Skin Solution - Iluminate; an indulgent collection of skincare essentials that work to revive a dull and lacklustre complexion. The set is host to a daily cleanser, hydrating balm, potent peel and facial oil in capsule form. Combined, the products are able to create a lit-from-within finish.
Pro-Radiance Cream Cleanser (150ml)
Discover an anti-ageing face wash with the Pro-Radiance Cream Cleanser. The deep cleansing formula utilises innovative solutions to thoroughly and effectively cleanse skin, whilst defending against daily pollutants. The cleanser thoroughly removes makeup and daily grime from the complexion. The wash leaves impurities cleansed, fine lines and wrinkles visibly smoothed and skin healthy-looking.
Pro-Radiance Illuminating Flash Balm (15ml)
Discover a new generation of moisturisers with the Pro-Radiance Illuminating Flash Balm. Carefully formulated, the balm takes hydration to a new level. With every use, skin is nourished and enhanced with its illuminating properties. Without leaving behind a sticky or greasy residue, the hydrating balm offers a fresh, natural-looking boost for your complexion, leaving skin smooth, dewy and luminous.
Papaya Enzyme Peel (50ml)
The unique, non-granular Papaya Enzyme Peel boasts 7 active ingredients that work to repair and protect skin. The natural exfoliating fruit enzyme action of Papaya and Pineapple visibly smooth, brighten and clarify the complexion. Ideal for sensitive or mature complexions, the formula gently and effectively exfoliates without causing irritation. Skin is treated with Seaweed Actives and Vitamin E, leaving you with smooth and moisturised skin.
Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules (14 capsules)
The Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules are the ultimate anti-pollution solution; containing potent age-defying anti-oxidants to refresh, nourish and distress skin. The capsules work to visibly repair signs of ageing as well as sweeping clean the skin cell matrix, ridding it of toxins to allow nutrients to be absorbed, thus renewing youthful skin vitality. Lavender and Rose Absolute provide a ‘bliss effect’, meaning skin appears de-stressed and thoroughly nourished. The Rose day capsule restores a youthful bloom to skin, whilst the Lavender evening capsule balances and repairs stressed skin.
name: Your New Skin Solution - Illuminate

product_description:
Soothe your skin with Certified Organic Rose Hip Oil, an oil rich in essential fatty acids and vitamins to soothe, soften and hydrate skin. The fatty acids protect cell membranes as well as vitamin E, beta carotene and the powerful anti-ageing antioxidant lycopene. The oil feeds the skin with unique oils and vital nutrients to promote radiant, healthier looking skin.
Sukin believe the most powerful and effective ingredients for your skin and hair care come from nature. Environmentally conscious, Sukin is a natural personal care company from Australia.
‘Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA
name: Rose Hip Oil (25ml)

product_description:
The Magnitone London Silk Bliss Replacement Brush Heads with SkinKind™ Bristles is the perfect choice for better skin hydration and superior pore purification. Featuring a soft head with feather-fine bristles, the brush heads create a rich lather with your cleanser for a luxurious deep cleansing action.
Compatible with all Magnitone Cleansing Brushes with a facial cleanse mode. Don’t lose your buzz, change your brush heads every three months!
name: London Silk Bliss Replacement Brush Heads with SkinKind™ Bristles (Set of 2)

product_description:
Treat spots and imperfections directly with Mizon Acence Blemish Out Pink Spot Treatment, a concentrated bi-phase formula that combines two solutions to expertly alleviate and prevent the formation of spots.
Rich in anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial ingredients, the multi-layered treatment offers two distinctive layers; the yellow solution combines Alpha and Beta Hydroxy Acids to effectively exfoliate and slough away residue, blackheads and dead skin cells, whilst the calming, Calamine-based pink powder reduces redness and relieves irritation. Working in synergy, the layers expertly protect and calm the skin, drying out targeted spots to promote a clearer, healthier-looking complexion come morning. Do not shake, the layers are supposed to be separate.
Please Note: The solution takes time to settle after travelling. It may be mixed when it first arrives but after letting it sit, you will see the pink sediment settle and separate from the translucent yellow top layer.
name: Acence Blemish Out Pink Spot Treatment 30ml

product_description:
Smooth your eye area with Zelens Triple Action Advanced Eye Cream, a state of the art cream that is designed for the delicate skin area around the eyes.
With a targeted triple action, the cream immediately tightens the skin and diminishes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes. -SA
name: Triple Action Advanced Eye Cream

product_description:
Cleanse and refresh blemish-prone skin with Murad Clarifying Wipes. Clinically proven to remove dirt, oil and bacteria, the soft, pre-moistened wipes balance and tone your skin, helping to minimise the occurrence of break outs.
Enriched with witch hazel, algae extract, grape seed extract and vitamin E, the wipes work to tighten your pores, regulate sebum and oil production and protect your skin from free radical damage. Perfect for freshening up your skin when you're on to go, these handy wipes will soothe your skin and help to clear existing blemishes. - L.M.
name: Clarifying Wipes

product_description:
Sleep and re-oxygenate your skin with Elemis Pro Collagen Oxygenating Night Cream. This luxury, moisture rich night cream is clinically proven to help increase oxygen levels in your skin and assist the skin’s natural regeneration process.
Padina pavonica, laminaria digitata, red coral and an anti-ageing hexapeptide, have been selected for their powerful age defying properties. Thanks to the Elemis Pro Collagen Oxygenating Night Cream the tell-tale signs of premature ageing are delayed, whilst your skin’s natural collagen network is supported, promoting skin elasticity and hydration.
Elemis Pro Collagen Oxygenating Night Cream is designed to replenish oxygen lost during the day as a direct result of damaging environmental aggressors, such as stress, pollution and free-radical damage. It delivers anti-oxidant protection and strong cell cohesion, which in turn stimulates cell metabolism and turnover.
Directions of use:
name: Pro Collagen Oxygenating Night Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Diminish the visible signs of ageing in seconds with the ground-breaking Instantly Ageless Anti-Ageing Micro Cream from Jeunesse. The powerful anti-wrinkle microcream immediately dissolves into the skin, targeting areas that have lost elasticity to reveal visibly toned, lifted skin with a matte flawless finish. 
Instantly Ageless Cream features a lightweight formula, containing the revolutionary ingredient Argireline, a peptide that works like botox without the needles, and a skin-conditioning complex of minerals that evens skin tone. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced, dark circles and puffiness under the eyes are cleared and pores appear minimised.
At the forefront of anti-ageing technology, Instantly Ageless redefines youth, restoring skin to optimum appearance. – E.W.
name: Ageless Anti-Ageing Micro Cream

product_description:
Refresh your complexion with the Pixi Vitamin Wakeup Mist; a skin boosting toner designed to deliver an awakened effect.
Arriving in the form of a mist, the toner is effortless to apply and is ideal for taking to refresh skin whilst on-the-go. Boasting an Orange Blossom Water base that melts into a blend of Citrus Fruit extracts, Lavender and Arginine, the cooling mist works to revitalise and energise the complexion.

product_description:
The Evening Primrose Concentrate is an all-natural, multi-tasking treatment to tackle signs of premature ageing, developed by holistic cosmetic brand Weleda.
As we age, skin begins to lose elasticity and collagen production slows down, resulting in skin appearing dull and saggy. This advanced serum is powered by Golden Evening Primrose; a highly active extract that helps stimulate skin’s natural protective and regenerative abilities, as well as extracts of Aloe Vera and Centella Asiatica.
Combined, the lightweight formula creates a visible plumping and firming effect, smoothing the look of fine lines and wrinkles. The complexion is left feeling revitalised and replenished, without the need for harsh chemicals or abrasive treatments.
name: Evening Primrose Concentrate 30ml

product_description:
A creamy cleanser to gently remove all traces of make-up and impurities without stripping your skin of protective oils. With moisturising and antimicrobial Active Manuka Honey and naturally cleansing Kumerahou, your skin is left clean, dewy and soft. For normal to dry and mature skin. Your skin is a living organ - treat it well, and it'll return the favour.
To use: Morning and evening, gently massage onto face and rinse with warm water or tissue off. Pat dry, then apply Extra Hydrating Toning Gel and moisturiser.- SC
Made with 100% natural ingredients, Living Nature has harnessed the purifying, healing and nourishing power of New Zealand's unique native botanicals including: Harakeke Flax Gel, Totarol, Manuka Honey, Manuka Oil, Hallo Clay and Kelp. Living nature has never and will never test on animals.
Living Nature contains absolutely no synthetic ingredients or endocrine disruptors. The full range is Certified Natural by BDIH Germany, and many of the products carry the Whole Foods Premium Body Care standard.
The products are independently verified for safety, plus they have one of the best ratings in the Skin Deep Cosmetic Safety Database.  Living Nature's policy: if there is any doubt about the safety of an ingredient, we don’t use it. 
Instead, they harness the incredible bioactive power of New Zealand’s native plants with their nourishing, purifying and healing skin benefits. Their highly effective energetic skincare is designed to enhance your skin’s own natural function. This efficacy is reviewed with ongoing independent testing.
name: Nature Vitalising Cleanser 100ml

product_description:
Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm is an emollient balm enriched with superior skin conditioners and antioxidants, helping to soothe and relieve dry, chapped, irritated lips.
Unlike waxy sticks, Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm penetrates quickly to provide instant relief. It contains a broad-spectrum sun protection with SPF 25, while guarding against windburn and temperature extremes. It also contains natural mint to help freshen breath.
Natural mint helps freshen breath while shea butter, avocado oil and lanolin soften and condition lips. Vitamin E and green tea extract help to protect your lips from damage caused by UV-induced free radicals.
Directions of use:
name: Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm (7g)

product_description:
Instantly refresh and invigorate dry, dull and tired skin with the Coldtox Protecting Anti-Ageing Serum from skinChemists. Bursting with nutrient-rich botanical ingredients, the intensely hydrating treatment with age-defying benefits leaves you with a revitalised and glowing complexion.
Infused with Swiss Glacier Water, the innovative serum delivers concentrated spheres of intense moisture that penetrate deep into the epidermis, whilst Aloe Vera extract soothes and nourishes. Snow Algae helps to stimulate natural collagen reproduction, which lifts and tones as well as reinforcing a protective barrier to minimise the appearance of fine lines. Suitable for daily use, the cooling serum ensures brightened and reconditioned skin.

product_description:
Purify and revitalise your skin with the Thalgo Plasmalg Gel. Suitable for the face and body, this soothing gel leaves skin hydrated and refreshed, and rebalances oily skin, relieves eczema, psoriasis and skin conditions.
Thalgo Plasmalg Gel combines the benefits of algae and pure water, mimicking the effects of the sea. By remineralising the skin and encouraging micro-circulation, this gel heals damaged skin on the face and neck.
Directions of use:
name: Plasmalg Gel (150ml)

product_description: A rich source of hydration, the Acquaconfort Mask from DELAROM is fortified with Pomegranate Sterols, a natural ingredient that improves skin hydration and reinforces its natural barrier; creating a shield that actively fights dryness. Smooth and nourishing, the mask can be used once or twice a week to unveil your complexion's natural radiance and leave you feeling refreshed. - K.N.
name: Acquaconfort Mask (50ml)

product_description:
The skinChemists Retinol Moisturiser will intensively nourish and moisturise your skin, whilst providing anti-ageing benefits to leave you with a younger-looking complexion.
Formulated with antioxidant retinol which reduces acne and blackheads, combats dead skin cells and repairs free radical damage, the cream will smooth your skin's texture, whilst creating a more even tone. Your complexion will be left looking healthy and radiant. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Smooth over the face and neck daily after cleansing.
name: Retinol Moisturiser (50ml)

product_description:
Meticulously formulated with French pharmaceutical expertise, CODAGE present the Fall in Love "Correcting and Revitalizing" serum. Inspiring a uniform glow, the antioxidant rich formula works to moisturise and repair the skin's matrix whilst preparing the epidermis for weather defence. Deeply purifying, the blend of active ingredients help to re-energise the skin and prevent blemishes and sun related pigmentation problems. Truly invigorating and detoxifying. Suitable for all skin types. - K.N.
Hy3- A moisturising property that restores and retains hydration. Boosting collagen, this ingredient also plumps, tightens and firms skin for a younger complexion.
Ao3 - Reparative and protective, this antioxidant rich blend protects against free radical and UV ray harm whilst repairing present damage in the skin.
Po2 - A protective ingredient which defends against pollutants. Works to enhance the skin's natural purification process whilst preserving antioxidants and preventing cell death. The activation of keratinocyte growth reinforces the cutaneous barrier.
Re3- With anti-inflammatory and antibacterial action, this deeply reparative ingredient boosts cellular renewal and helps rebuild injured tissue.
Dx3 - Stimulating natural detoxification, Dx3 works to repair proteins and eliminate toxins for energised skin that glows.
Ec3 - With antioxidant properties, this element boosts cellular energy and recharges the skin for long lasting hydration and radiance.
Tc3 - Improving skin's texture with cellular regeneration, this ingredient corrects pigmentation imperfections for a bright and even complexion.
name: Fall in Love Correcting and Revitalizing Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Featuring a set of 7 creams and a small brush for application, Karin Herzog 7 Creams of the Week features a weekly skincare routine, that provides you with a different cream for each day. The set ensures you benefit from all skincare treatments. -SA
Monday - Rose 15ml: Gently hydrate your skin with Rose. The formula contains 1% active oxygen combined with rose extracts to energise the skin and bring luminosity.
Tuesday - AHA Cream 15ml: Revitalize the skin with AHA Cream. The cream is formulated with fruit acids (AHA) known for their gently exfoliating and illuminating effects.
Wednesday - Vita-A-Kombi 1 15ml: The Vita-A-Kombi 1 anti-ageing face cream contains 1% active oxygen combined with Vitamin A to fight against signs of ageing, deeply hydrate and illuminate the complexion.
Thursday – Additional Sweet 15ml: Working to comfort the skin , the nourishing cream Additional Sweet is rich in vitamins to nourish and protect the skin.
Friday - Oxygen Face 15ml: Oxygenate the skin with the 2% oxygen cream Oxygen Face. This cream will purify and deeply hydrate the skin.
Saturday - Essential Mask 15ml: The hydrating face mask Essential Mask with 2% active oxygen fights against signs of tiredness and tones the skin for a genuine boost and instant radiance.
Sunday - Vitamin H 15ml: Rest and nourish the skin with the extra nourishing cream Vitamin H.
name: Herzog 7 Creams of the Week

product_description:
Specially formulated to banish all signs of ageing, the CODAGE Serum N.11 Anti-Ageing Supreme (15ml) targets fine lines and wrinkles, eye fatigue and skin firmness. Formulated using the brand's French pharmacy expertise, the powerful blend of ingredients leave skin smooth, soft and youthful looking. - K.R
Hy3 - a moisturising property that restores and retains hydration. Boosting collagen, this ingredient also plumps, tightens and firms skin for a younger complexion.
Ao3 - repairative and protective, this antioxidant rich blend protects against free radical and UV ray harm whilst repairing present damage in the skin.
Ru3 - a blend of anti-ageing ingredients make up this anti-wrinkles component. Reducing facial micro-contractions it smoothes and reduces fine lines and wrinkles from the very first signs. Antioxidant properties prevent from skin ageing, while collagen stimulation helps to plump and firm for youthful looking skin.
Ri3 - targeting fine lines and wrinkles, it improves firmness and strengthens skin's structure, as well as preventing from further signs of ageing.
Fe3 - targeting a number of skin structure factors, this unique firming blend increases collagen production and plumps whilst keeping skin hydrated and smooth.
Lf3 - providing an instant lift, it quickly tightens skin from the inside out for long-lasting youthful results.
Aa - the ultimate anti-ageing blend. Fighting current signs of ageing and fatigue while preventing them from further occurring with antioxidants, it increases moisture levels and regulates pigmentation for an even, smooth skin tone.
Tc3 - targeting uneven skin tone and dark spots, pigmentation imperfections are reduced revealing brighter skin. Activating skin cell regeneration, this ingredient ensures that a glowing tone and smooth texture is maintained.
Cn3 - targeting pigmentation, visible capillaries and puffiness, it soothes the eye area to reduce the signs of fatigue and ageing.
Pc3 - acting as a 'drain' for puffy eyes, it increases skin elasticity and relieves puffiness. The skin around the eye is smoothed with an even tone.
name: Serum N.11 Anti-Ageing Supreme Serum (15ml)

product_description:
Moisturise your skin with Living Nature’s Sensitive Night Cream; a certified natural, night time moisturiser recommended for dry and sensitive skin.
For application onto cleansed skin, the Sensitive Moisture Cream provides deep overnight nourishment and supports the skin's natural cell renewal process, without irritation. Made with 100% natural ingredients, the day cream contains a range of New Zealand’s native botanicals including Organic Virgin Coconut Oil, Harakeke Flax Extract and Avocado Oil. – E.W.
