product_description:
Suitable for all skin types, the MONU Hydrating Moisturiser SPF15 has been developed to prevent signs of premature ageing. With Soft Focus Technology and broad spectrum sun protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays, the lightweight face lotion maintains youthful-looking, radiant skin.
An effective blend of Sodium Hyaluronate, Evening Primrose Oil and Wheat Protein restores elasticity and firms skin to reveal a plumper, toned appearance. Powerful antioxidant Vitamin E calms inflammation, whilst Blackcurrant Seed Oil is rich in Essential Fatty Acids to hydrate and balance the complexion.
name: Hydrating Moisturiser SPF15 (50ml)

product_description:
Developed by experts to deliver the highest level of effectiveness, the 'Skin Intervention' prescription kit from CODAGE offers a range of products to treat your skin before and after cosmetic procedures such as peels, lasers and injections. A complete programme, the collection helps prepare your skin pre-procedure, and treat and repair afterwards. Skin will feel completely soothed and regenerated. - K.N.
Micro-Peeling Mask (7ml):
To enhance the effectiveness of your aesthetic procedure, skin must be free of dead cells and impurities. Used once or twice a week beforehand, this mask will optimise the effect and results of the treatment to come, and make your skin more receptive to guarantee an even, uniform and radiant complexion.
SERUM N°01 (5ml):
This intensely moisturising serum nourishes skin on the surface and deep down to reveal a truly hydrated complexion. Skin battered by heat and sea salt will benefit tremendously.
SKIN RECOVERY (10ml):
The ultimate skin repair serum. Two or three days following the procedure, use morning and night to repair, calm and regenerate your weakened skin. Used at night, this powerful skin regeneration enhancer will make your complexion more uniform and radiant.
Night Cream (15ml):
A rich, moisturising emulsion dedicated to repairing skin overnight; a peak period for cellular regeneration. Purifying and nourishing, the cream with hyaluronic acid regenerates dermal stem cell activity whilst stimulating elastin and collagen production for smoothed-out wrinkles and a toned appearance. Expect healthy, moisturised, plump skin. Suitable for all skin types, including dry or ageing skin.
name: Prescription - Skin Intervention

product_description:
Combat signs of ageing whilst hydrating your skin with skinChemists Advanced Bee Venom Duo Moisturiser, an anti-ageing formula that harnesses the age-defying, plumping benefits of bee venom.
Dedicated to rejuvenating your skin, the moisturiser delivers both hydrating and wrinkle-combatting properties; its dose of bee venom enhances blood circulation and actively plumps up skin to reduce visible wrinkles, whilst a moisturising blend of manuka honey and shea butter nourish, comfort and soften the skin.
Helping to improve nutrient delivery between layers of skin, the age-reversing emulsion promotes firmer skin and contains hyaluronic acid to stimulate collagen production for a tauter complexion.
Skin feels replenished and younger looking with an even tone, matt finish and sheer radiance. - K.N.
name: Advanced Bee Venom Duo Moisturiser (50ml)

product_description:
Regenerate and rejuvenate your complexion with the Eternal Snow Cream from Polaar. Fortified with nunatak, an arctic flower that survives extreme climatic conditions, the fast-absorbing cream reduces signs of ageing, minimises redness and erases imperfections to reveal a smoother, healthy-looking appearance.
Works to increase suppleness and elasticity, whilst restoring comfort and deeply moisturising skin to revive radiance. Improves the natural barrier function of the epidermis, delivers intense hydration and eliminates toxins to reignite a natural glow. Lightly fragranced, you can expect a transparent, luminous finish. E.N.
name: Eternal Snow Cream 50ml

product_description:
Karin Herzog Vitamin H Cream is a super light, yet rich and nourishing day cream, made with rare but wonderfully therapeutic natural vitamins, minerals and proteins that are simply not found naturally in abundance in the skin as we age.
This cream provides additional, much needed essential ingredients that the skin recognises and quickly utilises. The result? Soft, fresh skin with fine lines visibly reduced and a luminous glow and clarity to the complexion overall.
Karin Herzog Vitamin H Cream is beneficial for all skin types, but especially those over the age of 30 and those with devitalised, under nourished skin. As we age, these essential ingredients are naturally lacking in the skin – the less these elements are available, the worse the condition of the skin becomes and problems set in.
Directions of use:
name: Herzog Vitamin H Day Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Refresh your complexion with the Youthful Pure Cleansing Water from IOMA. Working to eliminate dirt, make-up and impurities without over-drying, the soothing formula calms even the most sensitive skin types to restore a revitalised, comfortable complexion.
With a silky texture that glides effortlessly over the face, the fragrance-free cleanser is enriched with chamomile and ricin oil to soften, smoothen and refine your complexion, whilst antioxidant-rich mallow extract protects and repairs. Skin will be left hydrated, toned and purified. E.N.
name: Youthful Pure Cleansing Water 140ml

product_description:
Repair and protect dry, sensitive lips with the Nourishing Lip Polish from PIXI. The nutrient-rich formula helps to smooth lips with Shea Butter and a blend of Sweet Almond, Apricot and Evening Primrose Oils.
The lip exfoliator features a massaging applicator, which stimulates circulation, providing a healthy, plumped effect to your pout. – E.W.
name: Nourishing Lip Polish

product_description:
Treat your skin to IOMA's Mild Toner, a lightweight, foam toner that gently washes away impurities whilst delivering firming benefits.
With a unique, airy texture, the foam toner effectively rids the face of makeup without disturbing the skin's natural barrier (hydrolipidic film), and comforts skin to leave it feeling nourished and protected. Fortified with MATRIXYL™ 3000, an active ingredient made up of miniature fragments of collagen, the toner helps re-densify skin and boost fibroblast metabolism, and its dose of OSILIFT, a 100% natural sugar tensor, helps lift and tighten skin. Skin is clean, refreshed and younger looking. - K.N.
name: Mild Toner 150ml

product_description:
Detoxify skin whilst you sleep with My PAYOT Radiance Night Care from PAYOT. Harnessing the superfruit powers of Goji and Açai Berries, the luxurious cream envelops skin in a hydrating, deeply revitalising cocoon to minimise daily signs of fatigue and stress.
Nourishing Hazelnut Oil and active Bifidus regenerate the skin's natural protective barrier to shield against environmental aggressors, whilst reviving radiance and stimulating circulation so your complexion looks brighter, refreshed and replenished come morning. Ideal for all skin types.
name: My PAYOT Radiance Night Care 50ml

product_description:
Keep facial hair in tip-top condition with the Amber 54 Beard Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who utilise traditional formulas to deliver high performance grooming products.
Enriched with a unique blend of oils, including Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond, the non-greasy formula nourishes hair and skin, whilst its masculine fragrance (blended by master perfumers) imparts subtle notes of raw amber and relaxing lavender.
Housed in a pump bottle for mess-free application, hair is left soft and hydrated, and skin feels revitalised.
name: Apothecary Amber 54 Beard Oil

product_description:
Purify your skin with IOMA's Gentle Exfoliating Emulsion, an exfoliator that works to deeply cleanse whilst refining skin's texture.
Fortified with Silica Particles, the cream emulsion scrub gently yet effectively sloughs away dead skin cells whilst dissolving the oxidised tip of blackheads and regulating sebum secretions, so skin looks clear and more refined. Performing a deep clean, the exfoliator effectively lifts away impurities and its dose of Burdock helps tighten pores for a purified complexion. Skin looks refined, balanced and clean. - K.N.
name: Gentle Exfoliating Emulsion 50ml

product_description:
PAYOT AOX Riche Rejuvenating Cream Dry Skin is an anti-ageing moisturiser that works to intensely hydrate whilst redefining the facial contour; smoothing out deep wrinkles and fine lines.
Utilising an exclusive patented AOX System, the high performance cream comforts and nourishes skin whilst expertly protecting against free radicals. Its dose of omegas 3 and 6 maintain epidermal thickness, and its smoothing, hydrating properties (thanks to a Lipid complex of grapeseed, avocado and shea oil) help reduce the appearance of lines, wrinkles and pigmentation for younger-looking skin.
Infused with radiance-boosting light reflectors, skin's luminosity is improved; wrinkles are concealed and areas of dryness and dullness are diminished. Expect smoother looking skin with a rejuvenated, re-sculpted appearance.
name: AOX Riche Rejuvenating Cream Dry Skin 50ml

product_description:
PAYOT's Crème Dermo-Apaisante Comforting Moisturising Cream promises to soothe, hydrate and relieve irritated or sensitive skin.
Fast-absorbing and ultra-lightweight, its caring formula is enriched with Glycerin, Phytosqualane and Algae Polyuronides to replenish and restore calm, comfortable skin. Suitable for daily use to minimise redness and alleviate irritation, skin is left refreshed, rebalanced and super soft with a smooth base for make-up application.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.
name: Crème Dermo-Apaisante Comforting Moisturising Cream 50ml

product_description:
Maximise the benefits of your skincare regimen with the UltraLuxe Seaweed Liposome Gel – Maintenance; a nourishing, protective formula that cares for skin.
Packed full of antioxidants and Vitamins B5, C and E, the Seaweed ‘power shake’ promotes a healthy-looking complexion, whilst acting as a primary delivery system for expediting and maximising the benefits of skincare products to follow.
A protective blend of Frankincense, Tangerine, and Rosewood extracts shields skin from damaging environmental aggressors and premature ageing, whilst offering the complexion a veil of long-lasting moisture. After use, the complexion appears firm, toned and purified.
name: Seaweed Liposome Gel - Maintenance

product_description:
Real Chemistry's Daily Serum is a lightweight, protein-rich serum that works to improve the appearance of skin and protect from environmental aggressors.
Fortified with a proprietary MTHV Complex®, the serum delivers a veil of invisible protection to keep skin safeguarded from oxidative stress whilst reducing the look of dark spots, fine lines and wrinkles.
Expect a brighter, more even-looking complexion.
name: Chemistry Daily Serum

product_description:
Catering specifically for acne-prone or oily skin types, the Oil-Free Nourishing Serum from Wilma Schumann  works to moisturize, hydrate and improve the appearance of skin.
Fortified with extracts from Salmon Caviar (rich in essential Omega-3), the fast-absorbing formula replenishes and revitalizes, while Allantoin softens and smoothens damaged skin to reveal a conditioned, rejuvenated complexion.
name: Schumann Oil-Free Nourishing Serum 30ml

product_description:
Re-energise tired, weary eyes with the Skin Authority Reviving Eye Brightener, a luxurious eye cream that combines a host of natural botanicals, vitamins and antioxidants to promote smoother, firmer, radiant-looking eyes.
Specially formulated for delicate skin around the eye, the cream utilises AOX Technology™ and delivers CoQ10 Enzymes and Vitamin E to expertly moisturise skin whilst reducing the appearance of puffiness, dark circles and fine lines. Its blend of Ginseng, Gingko Biloba and Olive Oil nourish and calm irritation. Skin around the eyes looks brighter, firmer and refreshed.
name: Authority Reviving Eye Brightener

product_description:
Improve the appearance of your complexion with Skin Authority Vitamin A Cell Renewal, a renewing cream that combines 7% Retinyl Palmitate with a host of vitamins and antioxidants to promote healthier, brighter, more even toned skin.
The gentle retinoid formula will help to reduce the appearance of blemishes and scars whilst smoothing skin's texture and brightening dull, discoloured patches. Its hydrating properties ensure the skin doesn't feel over dried, and AOX Technology™ leaves dry, rough skin looking softer and healthier.
name: Authority Vitamin A Cell Renewal

product_description:
Quench your skin with the Hydrating Facial Mist from Wilma Schumann, a refreshing spray that can be applied over make-up to revitalize dull, tired complexions.
Utilizing anti-aging and moisturizing ingredients, the lightweight mist delivers superior hydration to thirsty skin, whilst infusing a natural fragrance to uplift the senses. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect a radiant, rejuvenated complexion with restored luminosity.
name: Schumann Hydrating Facial Mist 80ml

product_description:
Treat dry, dehydrated skin to the Moisture Intensiv™ Restorative Crème from Wilma Schumann. 
Synergizing a unique blend of plant extracts, oligopeptides and pentapeptides, the super-rich cream delivers long-lasting hydration, while defending against environmental aggressors to reveal a radiant, youthful complexion. Infuses skin with a subtle, natural fragrance.
name: Schumann Moisture Intensiv™ Restorative Crème 50ml

product_description: Treat oily and acne prone skin to the Purifying Facial Mask from Wilma Schumann. The natural treatment contains antimicrobial and astringent elements and is designed to reduce the appearance of excess sebum in skin. Resulting in visibly cleaner and clearer skin.
name: Schumann Purifying Facial Mask 105ml

product_description:
Reignite a youthful glow with Skin Authority's Beauty Infusion™ Turmeric & Blueberry for Brightening; a radiance-reviving oil formula that works to restore a luminous complexion.
Synergising Tumeric, Curcumin and antioxidant-rich Blueberry, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy treatment helps to minimise the appearance of dark spots and discolouration, whilst delivering intense moisture to leave your complexion smooth, even and refined. Can be used alone or mixed with foundation and skincare products.
name: Authority Beauty Infusion™ Turmeric & Blueberry for Brightening

product_description: A lightweight blend of natural oils that provide intensive moisture, essential nutrients and potent antioxidants to improve the look and feel of your hair and skin, this 60ml size Jack Black Epic Moisture MP10 Nourishing Oil is the ultimate multi-tasking product. Blended with natural, botanicals such as argan, olive, and jajoba oils and an advanced technology that really helps this product to deliver, it is also formulated without parabens, sulfates or phthalates making it suitable for even dry or sensitive skin. - E.D
name: Black Epic Moisture MP10 Nourishing Oil (60ml)

product_description:
Shield and protect with Skin Authority's Hydrating Sunscreen SPF30; a fast-absorbing, water-resistant formula that works to minimise ageing effects caused by sun, stress and environmental aggressors.
Fortified with innovative AOX Technology™, the sunscreen utilises vitamins and antioxidants to hydrate and moisturise skin, whilst providing broad spectrum protection to defend against UV rays. Its unique Dry Finish Technology™ means you don't have to worry about greasy, sticky or white residue.
name: Authority Hydrating Sunscreen SPF30

product_description:
Wake up to a glowing complexion with this Ultra-Repair Overnight Regenerating Treatment from Dr Botanicals; a lifting, plumping night treatment that helps to reduce fine lines and wrinkles as you sleep. The overnight treatment moisturises dehydrated skin and repairs imperfections such as the visible signs of ageing on mature skin.
The lightweight regeneration serum is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Carrot Cells, which are rich in mineral salts and antioxidants that help to rejuvenate the skin; Olive Oil, which is full of fatty acids that help to plump and restore the skin; and Avocado Peptides, which encourage the production of Hyaluronic Acid that hydrates dry and stressed skin. – E.W.
name: Botanicals Ultra-Repair Overnight Regenerating Treatment (50ml)

product_description:
Quench skin’s thirst with the SOS Hydra Moisture & Radiance Mask from Mádara. The Hydra Mask is designed to provide immediate comfort to particularly dry skin that can appear tired and dull. Tightness will be visibly reduced and any itching prevented.
Formulated with a blend of moisturising sugars, Hyaluronic acid and nettle, the mask is designed to deliver comforting water-based moisture to skin and strengthen its protective barrier in order to prevent further dehydration. The lightweight formula boasts a soft and powdery scent and will leave skin looking hydrated and youthful.
name: SOS Hydra Moisture & Radiance Mask 60ml

product_description:
Revitalise tired eyes with Shiffa's Rejuvenating Eye Remedy; a lightweight, antioxidant-rich formula that utilises carefully selected ingredients to repair, hydrate and decongest the delicate eye area.
Harnessing the powers of healing Aloe Vera and calming Lavender, the fast-absorbing cream helps to smoothen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst Spirulina (a blue-green algae found in alkaline-rich lakes) targets dark circles and puffiness. Sea Buckthorn delivers high levels of Vitamin C to nourish and brighten the eye area, leaving it refreshed, restored and youthful-looking.
name: Rejuvenating Eye Remedy 15ml

product_description:
For use with the DermaTx Facial Tool in DermaTx Microdermabrasion Systems.
The cleansing brush attachment can be used for daily deep cleansing. Can be used with a cleanser of your choice.
Please Note: It is recommended that the attachment heads are changed regularly, at least every three months.
name: Replacement Heads - Set 3

product_description:
Restore tired, ageing eyes with the PRAI PLATINUM Firm & Lift Eye Serum, an anti-ageing eye formula infused with firming Platinum, one of Earth's most highly coveted precious metals.

Working to reverse signs of ageing around the delicate eye area, the 'liquid eye lift' smoothens visible signs of ageing, including fine lines and wrinkles, and utilises NULASTIC™ SILK and PRAISOMES™ to build skin structure and release nutrients into skin. Rich in antioxidants, the formula defends against harmful free radicals and environmental aggressors. Its dose of PRAI Oil leaves skin feeling smooth, fresh and supple with restored youthfulness.
name: PLATINUM Firm & Lift Eye Serum 15ml

product_description:
Designed to inspire a relaxing slumber, Kiss the Moon's After Dark Balm - Dream releases a cloud of pure tranquillity to help you drift off to sleep.
Expertly blended with natural essential oils of Lavender, Bergamot, Cedarwood and Chamomile, its sleep-inducing fragrance allows you to wind down after a stressful day, whilst nourishing Shea Butter and White Tea Seed Oil absorb quickly into pulse points to leave you feeling deeply rejuvenated.
name: the Moon After Dark Balm 12g - Dream

product_description:
PRAI present the BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Luxe Serum; a fast-absorbing, plant-based formula developed to target visible signs of ageing.
Fortified with revolutionary Epigenomyl® (derived from Calendula) and Collageneer® (extracted from White Lupine Seed), the silky serum helps to support collagen and elastin for a firmer, more refined complexion. Black Orchid Extract minimises the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst restoring suppleness to reveal soft, smooth skin with a youthful glow.
name: BLACK ORCHID Youth Activating Luxe Serum 30ml

product_description:
Conceal complexion imperfections with the PAYOT Uni Skin CC Cream. Suitable for all skin types, the colour correcting cream is designed to reduce and conceal the appearance of complexion disorders, including redness, dark spots and dullness.
Upon contact with the skin, the fine, melt-in texture transforms, adapting perfectly to the skin tone and delivering a subtle finish.
name: Uni Skin CC Cream 40ml

product_description:
Discover PRAI AGELESS Throat Peel & Reveal; a lightweight neck and décolleté treatment, that rewinds the years and reduces the visible signs of ageing.
Simply apply the formula to a cotton pad and sweep onto skin. Peel & Reveal will gently yet effectively, exfoliate and hydrate skin, whilst reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Enriched with a potent blend of Lactic and Salicylic acid, the treatment leaves the neck and décolleté visibly tighter and thoroughly softened. After the peeling effect, expect youthful and glowing skin to be revealed.
name: AGELESS Throat Peel & Reveal 120ml

product_description:
The Transphuse Rapid Renewal Cell Protocol from Erno Laszlo is a rejuvenation process to combat signs of ageing by reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Its unique formula contains key ingredients, including BioCellessence to minimise the production of the toxic protein known as progerin, and RapidGen stem cell technology to increase cell renewal and improve elasticity, whilst protecting the skin from free radical damage.
The twenty-eight day treatment repairs and preserves the skin's natural tone and boosts strength, hydration and suppleness. Skin will be left with an energised glow thanks to the Hydra-Skin Complex which provides a powerful barrier to lock in moisture, and Glycerin and olive-derived natural emollient, Sqalane, which both work to maintain a youthful, healthy-looking complexion. 
Suitable for all skin types, the treatment contains Sodium Hyaluronate to penetrate deep into the dermis layer of skin to maintain water levels and promote nutrient absorption for smoother and softer skin. Experience visible results and a much fuller appearance. E.N.
Transphuse Rapid Renewal Cell Protocol delivers anti-ageing benefits that increase in intensity over four phases:
Phase 1 (days 1-7): Deep Hydration 
Phase 2 (days 8-14): Elasticity Restoration 
Phase 3 (days 15-21): Contour Refinement 
Phase 4 (days 22-28): Re-texturisation 
Directions for use: Apply morning and night for 28 days, using one Vial per week for best results. Smooth a small amount over face, neck and décolletage after cleansing and toning.
name: Laszlo Transphuse Rapid Renewal Cell Protocol Travel Edition (15ml)

product_description:
Gently and efficiently remove all traces of eye makeup with the Purity Eye Cleanser from AromaWorks. The powerful cleanser boasts the ability to remove even the most stubborn waterproof makeup, resulting in eyes that are free from makeup and impurities.
Infused with a blend of essential oils including Jojoba, May Chang and Roman Camomile, the formula is suitable for all skin types and seeks to condition the sensitive eye area, visibly soothing any irritation and redness.
name: Purity Eye Cleanser 60ml

product_description:
Nourish dry and dull skin with the IOMA Deep Care Moisturising Mask. With a refreshing gel formula, the soothing treatment works to restore optimum hydration levels and reinforce skin’s natural protective barriers.
Enriched with active mineral-rich Aquaxyl and Red Algae Extract, the lavish mask repairs and softens skin whilst Hyaluronic Acid works to improve texture and elasticity. Perfect for all skin types, the intensive mask transforms skin and leaves you with a revitalised and smooth complexion.
name: Deep Care Moisturising Mask 50ml

product_description:
Visibly plump your complexion with the pack of 8 Age-Adapt® Face Masks from SkinPointEight. Hydrating and soothing skin, the sheet masks deliver an array of nourishing ingredients to the face, transforming the complexion and leaving it youthful.
The masks boast a blend of antioxidant rich Ginseng and Astralagus, which work in synergy to improve micro-circulation and boost skin’s collagen production. Detoxifying on a cellular level, the innovative masks are crafted with highly absorbent Tencel® fibre and allow you to enjoy visibly firmer and calmer skin.
The anti-ageing masks are complete with a duo of age-reversing actives, Magnolol and Honokiol, which combine to target the visible signs of ageing, reduce the appearance of enlarged pores and leave skin smooth and hydrated.
name: Age-Adapt® Face Mask 8 Individual Tencel® Masks

product_description:
Transform the eye area with the Age-Adapt® Eye Serum from SkinPointEight. Visibly rewinding the years, the anti-ageing serum is specially formulated to revive tired looking eyes and deliver a youthful finish.
Boasting a sophisticated adaptogen blend, the eye serum utilises Chinese medicinal herbs and revolutionary western actives to gently and effectively penetrate the delicate eye area. Maintaining and reviving skin’s elasticity, the nutrient rich serum visibly plumps the skin and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, including stubborn crow's feet.
The Age-Adapt® is able to protect skin against environmental damage and photo-ageing, leaving delicate eyes protected, hydrated and youthful.
name: Age-Adapt® Eye Serum 15ml

product_description:
Mizon Men'Er Energetic Power Skin Care Program combines a trio of must-have skincare products, designed specifically to treat men's skin. The cleanser, after-shave treatment and moisturiser work in synergy to promote smoother, softer, younger-looking skin.
Men'Er Energetic Charcoal Foaming Cleanser (30ml)
A foaming facial wash formulated specially for men. Performing a deep cleanse to remove sebum and impurities, the cleanser effectively decongests pores to help prevent blackheads and blemishes whilst moisturising and nourishing the complexion. Its dose of Oak Tree Charcoal gently removes dead skin to reveal a smooth, clarified and comfortable complexion.
Men'Er Energetic Fresh Water (150ml)
A revitalising and calming water solution to help alleviate feelings of irritation after shaving. Utilising a 3S Formula comprising extracts of Raspberry, Lavender and Hedera Helix, the soothing and astringent post-shave formula helps to relax and calm skin whilst controlling excess sebum to combat enlarged pores and shine. Infused with Panthenol, Allantoin and Hyaluronic Acid, it will replenish moisture and elasticity whilst imparting a delicate fragrance. Skin feels fresh and comfortable.
Men'Er Energetic Essential moisturiser (80ml)
An anti-ageing, oil-free moisturiser that works as an all-in-one treatment to restore hydration and softness whilst targeting signs of ageing. Delivering antioxidant and anti-fatigue properties, it diminishes the look of expression lines whilst banishing shine and dullness to leave the complexion healthy-looking and balanced. Lightweight and fast absorbing, it melts effortlessly into skin to recharge, moisturise and revitalise. Infused with a handsome fragrance.
name: Men'Er Energetic Power Skin Care Program

product_description:
The Phytomer Body Blur Shaka Shaka Ultra Smoothing Contouring Lotion is a pioneering treatment to instantly smooth the appearance of cellulite while combating visible excess fat.
The unique ‘shaker bottle’, three-phase formula combines water, oil and powder for unparalleled results, seeking to even the look of orange peel and dimpling with an ongoing corrective action. Layered Clay immediately works to visibly blur imperfections, with Brown Algae encouraging enhanced fat burning and ADIPO 3 to strengthen skin tissue.
With continued use, skin appears supple and smooth with redefined contours and a sleek silhouette.
name: Body Blur Shaka Shaka Ultra Smoothing Contouring Lotion 100ml

product_description:
Prove who is the fairest of them all with the Mizon Snow White Cream; a rich, nourishing moisturiser that brightens and softens for a more smooth and even looking complexion.
Fortified with an exclusive HydraTox™ system, the fluffy textured formula effortlessly melts into skin, delivering extract of Golden Pearls to improve high spectrum luminosity and depth while optimising moisture levels.
Enriched with purifying Lemon and Orange, the face cream leaves skin feeling sumptuously softened and hydrated, with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced for a youthful looking glow.
name: Snow White Cream 50ml

product_description:
Transform tired and ageing skin with the Ocean Power Red Cream from South Korean skincare brand Mizon.
Fortified with a 65% concentration of Red Sea Cucumber extract – the ‘ginseng of the ocean’, the anti-ageing moisturiser has a unique, rubber-like texture that seeks to tighten and firm skin by improving natural elasticity levels.
The appearance of pores and fine lines are visibly softer, with enhanced efficacy due to the sticky formula that gently massages and refines the surface layer. Expect a smoother and revitalised complexion with a youthful looking radiance.
name: Ocean Power Red Cream 50ml

product_description: Boost moisture levels with the Barrier Oil Serum from Korean beauty brand Mizon. Ideal for dull, dry and wanting skin, the concentrated formula contains water-soluble Olive Oil and rapidly absorbs to deliver deep hydration and nutrients. Suitable for regular use, the luxurious serum quickly penetrates skin to form a protective barrier and leave your complexion looking refreshed, supple and positively glowing.
name: Barrier Oil Serum 50ml

product_description:
Reveal soft and supple skin with the SASCO Eco Body Aloe Vera Body Lotion; a rich moisturising cream that nurtures and nourishes skin, whilst enveloping the body in a refreshing fragrance.
Rich in organic Aloe Vera, the soothing formula glides onto skin and absorbs effortlessly. The lotion also boasts a skin-loving blend of Sunflower and Jojoba oils, which deliver intense hydration to skin in need. Skin is left smooth, supple and touchably soft.
name: Eco Body Aloe Vera Body Lotion 200ml

product_description:
Treat your face to the hydrating properties of FIT's Moisturising Ultra Serum, a recharging formula for men that works to intensely moisturise, repair and protect your skin.
Bursting with high performance actives, including vitamins and amino acids, the lightweight serum utilises OXY-FIT-10 technology (a unique oxygen delivery system) to encourage cell regeneration and help stimulate the skin's natural repair mechanisms; skin feels recharged and refreshed. Its non-greasy texture penetrates deeply to act faster and work for longer. - K.N.
name: Moisturising Ultra Serum 30ml

product_description:
Dr Botanicals presents the Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Facial Scrub for Men, a rejuvenating exfoliator that’s bursting with vitamins, minerals and essential oils to leave skin feeling refreshed and clean.
Suitable for all skin types including sensitive, the natural scrub contains Volcanic Pumice to gently buff away dead skin and stimulate cell regeneration, improving tone and brightness. Glycofilm works to create a protective barrier to combat harmful environmental aggressors, whilst Aloe Vera helps moisturise and soften texture. Reveal firmer-feeling and healthier-looking skin.
name: Botanicals Pomegranate Noir Advanced Natural Facial Scrub For Men 50ml

product_description:
Target slackening skin with the Mizon Enjoy Vital-Up Time Firming Mask Set; an anti-ageing treatment that delivers lifting and tightening effects.
Harnessing the powers of Allantoin, Hyaluronic Acid and antioxidant-rich Pomegranate Extract, the face mask helps to improve firmness and elasticity, whilst infusing skin with long-lasting moisture and hydration to reveal a radiant, youthful-looking complexion. The unique microfibre sheet adheres to facial contours for maximum absorbency.
name: Enjoy Vital-Up Time Firming Mask Set 30g

product_description:
Hydrate and protect with the Advanced Derma Care Time Control Solution from Gentlemen's Tonic. Suitable for all skin types, the antioxidant-rich serum utilises Alistin Peptide to defend against pollution, environmental aggressors and free radicals, leaving skin clear and healthy.
Vitamin C slows down melanin production to combat dark spots and pigmentation caused by sun damage, whilst Alpha-Lipoic Acid delivers anti-ageing and anti-inflammatory benefits; minimising the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and visible pores. Fast-absorbing, the solution helps to promote collagen production and boost circulation, revealing youthful, refined and rejuvenated skin after every use.
name: Tonic Advanced Derma Care Time Control Solution 30ml

product_description:
Lift and add radiance to the face with the IOMA Brightening Day Emulsion. Blended with a whitening complex to thoroughly and accurately purify the skin, this highlighting ointment seeks to naturally replenish and revitalise, offering an enhanced level of glow.
Made from Revelation Active and Luminous Optics, the light-based formula efficiently engages with the palette of the skin, to optimise and improve the surface layer tone, providing a clear, natural base for additional treatment and enhancement. C.R
name: Brightening Day Emulsion 50ml

product_description:
Take a moment to relax and pamper with the Skin Authority Calming Mask. Ideal for use as an all over face mask or targeted spot treatment for oily skin, the clay-based formula works to gently exfoliate the surface layer and effectively unclog pores, while absorbing excess oil and minimising the look of redness and inflammation.
Fortified with 10% Precipitated Sulfur and proprietary AOX Technology™, it infuses skin with essential moisture, antioxidants and vitamins, helping to clear congestion and prevent future acne breakouts. Perfect for treating oily T-zones and problematic areas, the aromatic mask leaves skin feeling purified, refreshed and balanced.
name: Authority Calming Mask

product_description:
Working to combat the natural signs of ageing, Rio Hydra-Masque uses galvanic salon technology together with an Intense Hyaluronic Therapy Masque for a complete facial rejuvenation treatment.
When used together with the Anti-Ageing Masque, the roller treatment helps to pump the masque’s active ingredients, youth-boosting hyaluronic acid, from the gel into the skin, hydrating and boosting collagen.
Galvanic technology has been used in salons for many years as a powerful tool for holding back the signs of facial ageing, while hyaluronic acid is now found in many of the market-leading skin care moisturisers, serums and eye creams. Skin will be left feeling revived and more supple thanks to this impressive treatment from Rio the beauty specialists.
name: Hydra Masque

product_description:
Catering for all skin types, including mature, the Gentlemen's Tonic Advanced Derma Care Hero Peptide Serum helps to firm, hydrate and strengthen skin.
Powered by Cocoa Extract (rich in antioxidant Vitamin E) and SNAP-8 (a natural ingredient that delivers a Botox-like effect), the fast-absorbing, anti-ageing serum works to relax facial muscles; reducing the appearance of fine lines and expression wrinkles.
Its highly concentrated formula utilises skin-firming agent Raffermine 2 to tighten and restructure, whilst Signal-10, derived from Sodium Salt of Hyaluronic Acid, has the ability to bind 1,800 times its own weight in water. Skin is soft, smooth and deeply moisturised.
name: Tonic Advanced Derma Care Hero Peptide Serum 30ml

product_description:
Formulated specifically for sensitive skin, the Sensitive Facial Moisturiser by Sukin is light and gentle enough for even the most delicate skin. Enriched with moisturising shea butter, soothing aloe vera with rose hip, blended with nourishing sesame and jojoba oils, this moisturiser absorbs into the skin immediately, and dramatically soothes and calms your complexion. Your face will be left looking beautifully radiant and feeling silky smooth. - R.H
Directions For Use: After cleansing, apply to face, neck and décolletage.
name: Sensitive Facial Moisturiser (125ml)

product_description:
Say hello to soft and smooth lips with the Dr. Hauschka Lip Care Stick. Enriched with jojoba wax and shea butter to protect your delicate lips from the elements, it also contains carrot and anthyllis extracts to moisturise and nurture to help prevent dryness. Your lips will also be enhanced with a silky shine. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Apply to your lips as often as needed.
name: Hauschka Lip Care Stick 4.9g

product_description: Achieve a close, comfortable shave every time with the Sensitive Shave Cream from Bulldog. Enriched with Aloe Vera, Shea Butter and a nourishing blend of Jojoba and Sunflower Oils, its protective formula creates a cushion over sensitive skin to prepare for shaving, allowing the razor to glide effortlessly with less resistance. Hydrates skin and minimises dryness caused by shaving.
name: Sensitive Shave Cream 100ml

product_description:
Benefit further from your moisturiser with the Advanced Hyaluronic Acid Formula Serum from skinChemists. The innovative serum contains Hyaluronic Acid, an effective ingredient capable of holding vast quantities of moisture and preserving skin cells, therefore using the serum before a moisturiser will improve its effectiveness.
The natural, non-invasive serum acts as an anti-ageing remedy. The increase in hydration visibly plumps and firms the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
name: Advanced Hyaluronic Acid Formula Serum 30ml

product_description:
Revive radiance and restore youthful vitality with the Magnificence Day & Night Melt-in Cream-Gel from Lierac; a brand who synergise the best botanical active ingredients and scientific expertise to create high performance products.
Infused with 3.5% D-Glyox; a patent-pending, anti-ageing ingredient blending Pomegranate Flower, Silk Tree and Liposome-Peptide to help combat glycoxidation (a combination of glycation and oxidation that modify the skin's proteins to contribute to loss of elasticity, dullness and lack of suppleness).
Catering specifically for normal to combination skin, the fast-absorbing formula works to firm, plump and soften the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst a dose of Hyaluronic Acid hydrates and smoothens skin. Expect a revitalised, comforted complexion with a long-lasting matte finish and perfect make-up base.
name: Magnificence Day & Night Melt-in Cream-Gel - Normal to Combination Skin 50ml

product_description:
This Elemis Sensitive Cleansing Wash is ideal for sensitive skin. It contains soothing Essential Oils renowned for their anti bacterial and soothing properties for the most effective and gentle cleanse possible.
Essential Oils of Thyme, German Chamomile and Ladies Mantle in the Milk Protein base provide the cleansing and soothing action of this gentle cleanser.  Elemis Sensitive Cleansing Wash is a rich cleanser that conditions and moisturises your skin.
This cleanser can also be used by men for shaving and women when shaving legs or underarms as it will gently prepare and care for your skin.  Also ideal for intimate areas.
Directions of use:
name: Sensitive Cleansing Wash (200ml)

product_description:
Clinically proven to offer 4 hours of long-lasting moisturisation, this ultra-hydrating lip conditioner from Burt's Bees is infused with rich Kokum, Shea, and Cocoa Butters.
Giving you more butters and less wax than other balms, so your lips will be left soft and super smooth. It also lovingly replenishes your skin with no added flavors or fragrances. It’s hydration at its very highest.
name: Bees Lip Balm - Ultra Conditioning 4.25g

product_description:
Gently tone and refresh your skin with Nuxe Lotion Tonique Douce – Gentle Toning Lotion, packed full with natural astringents this lotion will visible reduce with size of your pores, encouraging only new impurity free skin to come through.
Prep your skin for day or night with Nuxe Lotion Tonique Douce – Gentle Toning Lotion, it is enriched with natural skin loving witch hazel, Damasecena rose petals and coconut derivative that works together to effectively shrink the size of pores and without drying the skin out or stripping it of its natural oils.
Directions of use:
name: Lotion Tonique Douce - Gentle Toning Lotion (200ml)

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Peter Thomas Roth Mask Sampler Kit; six of the brand's innovative face masks that target a range of skincare concerns, including anti-ageing, dryness and enlarged pores.
Blue Marine Algae Mask (14ml)
A hydrating gel treatment mask rich with Blue Marine Algae, a soothing, nourishing seaweed that infuses skin with nutrients and humectants to help defend against dehydration and prevent future damage. The gel contains moisture energising Tea sourced from the Jeju Island of Korea to deliver deep nourishment and abundant moisture to skin, and Antarcticine, a unique glycoprotein sourced from Arctic glacial ice that helps skin retain water and protect against water loss in extreme climates or temperatures.
Rose Stem Cell Bio-Repair Gel Mask (14ml)
An innovative formula that utilises cutting-edge plant biotechnology to help repair the signs of ageing on all skin types. Combining five Rose Stem Cells with four Rose Extracts, the cooling gel replicates plant technology to perform an unrivalled anti-ageing process on the skin. Nurturing and hydrating, the synergy works to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst eradicating dullness and sagging. Rebuilding moisture barriers and tightening pores, the strengthening mask will stimulate cell renewal and leave your skin soft and radiant with a youthful appearance.
24K Gold Mask (14ml)
A luxurious anti-ageing treatment fortified with pure 24 Karat Gold to lighten, brighten and firm the skin. Helping reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, the innovative formula is enriched with a unique blend of effective ingredients, including Colloidal Gold which bestows a radiant glow on the skin, Caffeine which lifts, tightens and firms and Peridot, a magnesium-rich gemstone that re-energises and reduces stress induced ageing. Deeply nourishing, the pampering mask delivers intense hydration with the addition of Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin, humectants that contribute to the plumping and lifting of wrinkles.
Irish Moor Mud Mask (14ml)
Deeply cleanses and decongests skin without stripping moisture. Its unique formula contains 9,000 year old Black Moor Mud, harvested by hand from the Irish countryside to provide a high concentration of bio-minerals, vitamins and antioxidants to protect skin. Hijiki Seaweed hydrates skin, whilst Volcanic Ash helps to revitalise, purify and refresh. Enriched with Activated Charcoal, the rich mask effectively removes excess oil, dirt and impurities and minimises the appearance of visible pores for a smoother, more refined complexion. Experience renewed, youthful-looking skin with a natural glow.
Cucumber Gel Mask (14ml)
An ultra-gentle formula infused with cooling Cucumber Extract to nourish and hydrate skin, whilst vitamin-rich Papaya and Pineapple Extracts restore softness. Suitable for all skin types, the lightweight mask is enriched with Sugar Maple to encourage cell renewal and Orange and Lemon to invigorate skin and minimise the appearance of pores. The award-wining Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Wash is designed to stimulate skin's natural cell renewal cycle, actively smoothing and refining whilst removing the dead skin cells. Effectively encouraging the resurfacing of skin, the Dynamic Resurfacing Gel Mask addresses the decline in skin renewal as skin ages. You’ll be left with instantly smoother, shine-free and more radiant skin. As we age, cellular renewal slowly declines resulting in dull, lifeless skin and premature ageing. This revolutionary gel-based Resurfacing Mask combines patented Tri Enzyme Technology with the Amazonian Acerola Cherry, Great Burdock and Amino Acids to encourage effective re-texturising of the skin’s surface and balance sebum levels without compromising the natural pH levels.
Dynamic Resurfacing Night Cream (15ml)
The Dynamic Resurfacing Night Cream stimulates the skin's natural cell renewal cycle, actively smoothing and enhancing skin whilst it’s most receptive to repair. Utilising Elemis’ revolutionary patent pending Tri-Enzyme technology, the innovative formula resurfaces the upper layers of skin. The night cream boasts anti-oxidant rich Rice Hull and Samphire, which protect against pollution as well as restoring clarity to skin. Existing lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced and younger looking skin is revealed. Expect skin that is ultra-soft and supple.
Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules (14 capsules)
The Cellular Recovery Skin Bliss Capsules are the ultimate anti-pollution solution; containing potent age-defying anti-oxidants to refresh, nourish and distress skin. The capsules work to visibly repair signs of ageing as well as sweeping clean the skin cell matrix, ridding it of toxins to allow nutrients to be absorbed, thus renewing youthful skin vitality. What is Severe Acne?Larger pimples and some cysts, pimples are inflamed, cover larger areas of face, are persistent and chronic ( 3 years or longer).  For those who have suffered for 3 or more years with moderate to severe acne.
About the Brand:AcnEase® is a most effective Botanical Therapeutic® that treats existing acne and prevents new cysts and pimples from forming.  In addition, with recommended use, the ingredients in AcnEase® will make your skin clearer and healthier with less blackheads, whiteheads and redness.
AcnEase® works to restore the natural internal balance that is disrupted by endocrine changes, environmental factors, some medications, mental tension, stress and diet.  Acne is viewed as an external manifestation of an internal disorder. AcnEase® is unique in that it doesn’t simply treat the external symptoms of the disease, but it addresses the underlying causes of Acne and other skin related problems such as Rosacea from the inside.AcnEase is perfect for those who suffer from: Adolescent Acne, Hormonal Acne, Menopausal Acne (women), Chronic Acne, Acne aggravated by spicy and greasy food, smoking, stress, consumption of alcohol or other medicines, Facial and Body Acne, Cystic Acne.

product_description:
Make painful extractions a thing of the past with the STARSKIN Sunset Strips™ 3-Step Advanced Pore Cleansing Expert System; a new-generation black head removal routine that works to eliminate trapped dirt, excess sebum and impurities from the nose.
Each treatment comprises three mask strips, which work in synergy to perform a deep cleanse of the pores. The first strip is designed to prepare the skin for extraction. The anti-microbial cotton strip is infused with Witch-Hazel, which softens excess sebum, whilst dissolving a build-up of debris.
After 10 minutes skin is ready for step two; the blackhead removal charcoal mask, which extracts blackheads, whiteheads and impurities from skin. Enriched with Charcoal extract, the second step seeks to purify pores and condition the skin on the nose.
Finally, the third step leaves pores tight and refined. The bio-cellulose strip boasts a proprietary herbal medley, which instantly soothes the pores after extraction. The addition of Eucalyptus ensures pores are visibly minimised and refined. Used regularly, the three step system promotes healthier and clearer skin. Simply strip your way to a smooth and refined nose.

The cleverly designed (and beautiful!) bottle features a push button dropper and smart base dimple, ensuring no product is wasted – ‘Gorgeous to the last drop®’. Give dull, stressed out and lacklustre skin some TLC with Glow Drops and unveil a lit-from-within complexion.

product_description:
NIOD Elasticity Catalyst Neck Serum is a non invasive anti-ageing formula that utilises a host of intelligent technologies to help increase and protect visible skin elasticity.
Contributing to the increase and strengthening of elastin on slackened skin, the serum targets neck lines and sagging to help improve elasticity and density, both on and below the skin's surface.
Pro-Elastin and Pro-Elastic-Fibre Technologies:
These technologies help increase and strengthen elastin. They support cellular cohesion, strengthen elastic fibre and restore elastin protein synthesis for a visible increase in skin viscoelastic properties.
Anti-Elastase and Anti-Progerin Technologies:
Elastase is an enzyme that breaks down elastin; these technologies inhibit the performance of elastase to help counteract sagginess that occurs when elastin breaks down.
Dermal and Subcutaneous Density Technologies:
These technologies work to increase visible skin density on and below the surface. Caffeine, Carnitine and Bitter Ginger create a 'push-pull' effect to keep skin 'active'. This counter-intuitive approach enhances visible tone by increasing and decreasing fluid motion simultaneously; this 'push-pull' action improves skin density and surface evenness because the fluids are distributed more evenly.
name: Elasticity Catalyst Neck Serum 50ml

product_description:

The combination of petrolatum, a skin-soothing beta-hydroxy in one of its first cosmetic uses, and vitamin E make this apricot coloured balm effective and beneficial for those emergency skin moments. Miss Arden also famously used it to soothe her thoroughbred horses' legs!

product_description:
The FOREO LUNA™ mini provides a deep yet gentle cleansing action, effectively removing make-up, dirt and oil by using T-Sonic™ technology, which channels transdermal sonic pulsations across the skin’s surface. Suitable for use with any cleanser, your skin will be smoothed and refined in just three days!
Featuring 1300 non-abrasive, hygienic, silicone-coated touch-points that are configured into three zones to suit all skin types, it cleans impurities from you pores to reduce blemishes. Waterproof and fully rechargeable, just one minute of use morning and evening will leave you with clearer, brighter skin.
The LUNA™ mini is an innovative facial-cleansing device that directs T-Sonic™ pulsations through an ultra-hygienic silicone brush. Compact and travel-friendly, it requires no replacement brushes and transforms the skin by removing breakout-causing impurities, leaving behind a healthier-looking, radiant complexion - as well as the confidence that comes with having clear and clean skin.
FOREO’S INNOVATIONS VERSATILE 3-ZONE BRUSH
Suitable for cleansing every skin type, the LUNA™ mini’s brush features thinner touch-points on one side to gently cleanse sensitive or dry skin, thicker touch-points grouped at the top for precision cleansing and broad touch-points on the reverse side for channeling pulsations more directly to cleanse and refresh oilier skin.
WHAT IS T-SONIC™ TECHNOLOGY|
T-Sonic™ technology refers to the up to 8,000 transdermal sonic pulsations per minute that are channeled through soft silicone touch-points to remove dead skin cells, and unclog pores of dirt, oil and make-up residue.
MANUAL VS. T-SONIC™ CLEANSING
T-Sonic™ technology delivers far more effective deep cleansing than just using the hands alone. This is because the fingers, in addition to often having oil, dirt, bacteria and other contaminants on them, cannot cleanse the pores as deeply as the LUNA™ mini or remove dead skin cells, as the LUNA™ mini has the ideal texture required to remove impurities from the skin.
BRISTLES VS. SILICONE
Unlike bristles, silicone is non-porous so it is resistant to bacteria build-up, doesn’t absorb dirt and oil, is easy to clean and quick-drying for an ultra-hygienic facial-cleansing device. Silicone is also not only body-safe and hypoallergenic, but far more gentle on the skin than similar products on the market thanks to its soft, smooth and non-abrasive texture.
name: LUNA™ mini - Grey

‘Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™’ - Sukin’s commitment extends far beyond cosmetic. The 100% certified carbon neutral company aims to reduce the impact their business has on our increasingly fragile environment. -SA

product_description:

Ideal for busy lifestyles, the dual-texture pads are able to massage, exfoliate and tone skin using one side, whilst the other side functions as a serum, moisturiser, leave-in mask and primer.
The front side of the pad boasts an array of massaging and exfoliating beads that slough away dead skin cells, promote optimum circulation and leave pores refined. Complete with a dose of toner, the pad balances the complexion and visibly brightens skin for a radiant finish.
The back of the pad is soaked with a powerhouse cocktail of skin-boosting ingredients. Enriched with a potent blend of Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate and Adenosine, also known as ‘topical botox’, the pad visibly plumps the complexion to eliminate the appearance of fine line and wrinkles. This side works as a nourishing and protective serum, as well as offering a veil of hydration to the face that maintains skin’s moisture levels. Similar to a leave-on face mask, the pad boasts a slow-release formula that ensures skin is treated to nourishment all day.
Ideal for use before makeup application, the pad prepares skin for the day and functions as a primer to enhance the wear and duration of makeup. Expect a bright and radiant complexion that appears healthy and nourished.
name: 7-Second Morning Mask™ 7-in-1 Miracle Skin Mask Pads

product_description:
Treat the delicate skin around your eyes to the high-performance qualities of Jurlique Herbal Recovery Eye Cream (15ml). With its powerful formula packed with potent anti-oxidising botanicals and Australian native flower extracts to help brighten and refresh the delicate eye area, this Herbal Recovery Eye Cream from Jurlique promises to leave you with youthful-looking, radiant eyes. Long-lasting moisture helps minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst providing the skin with deep hydration to protect it against harsh environmental aggressors.
The Herbal Recovery Eye Cream's rich formula benefits from safflower oleosomes, which deliver soothing and firming benefits, whilst the inclusion of arnica, eyebright and cucumber reduce the appearance of puffiness and dark circles. Skin is left feeling firm, smooth and hydrated.
Apply a small amount of Jurlique Herbal Recovery Eye Cream to your fingertips and press the product gently onto the delicate skin around the eye area.
For best results, use this eye cream each morning and night.

product_description:
Discover the secret to younger looking skin with the Elizabeth Arden Advanced Ceramide Capsules; the iconic skincare treatment now with triple the power to truly transform skin and reveal a visibly firmer and smoother complexion.
As we age, skin loses the ability to produce the essential youth factor of lipid ceramides, leading to a weakened and uneven texture with a dramatic increase in wrinkles and sagging.
The innovative anti-ageing capsules directly deliver a concentrated dosage of bio-engineered, skin-identical ceramides, helping to repair and strengthen the lipid barrier as well as support natural collagen renewal, resulting in a re-texturising and plumping effect to radically minimise the appearance of fine lines.
A Botanical Complex blend of Alfalfa, Olives and Coconut Oil infuses skin with hydrocarbons and lipids, while Omega-rich Tsubuki Oil restores elasticity levels, effectively optimising moisture levels. Expect skin to feel revitalised, soft and supple with an improved luminosity and healthy-looking glow.

A moisturising and repairing serum. Ideal for all skin types and those particularly susceptible to dryness, the moisturising formula contains a blend of hydrating ingredients that work in synergy to protect and soothe skin that has been weakened by the cold. Deeply replenishing, the formula will restore natural moisture and lipids whilst protecting the outer layer from environmental nasties. The addition of a unique Antarctic glacier ingredient ensures your skin will be left soft and regenerated.
Night Cream (15 ml):
A rich, moisturising emulsion dedicated to repairing skin overnight; a peak period for cellular regeneration. Purifying and nourishing, the cream with hyaluronic acid regenerates dermal stem cell activity whilst stimulating elastin and collagen production for smoothed-out wrinkles and a toned appearance. Expect healthy, moisturised, plump skin. Suitable for all skin types, including dry or ageing skin.
name: Prescription - Apres Ski

product_description:
Experience next generation anti-ageing with skinChemists Advanced Pro-5 Collagen Marine Cream, an innovative cream that utilises bio marine extracts to improve skin's tone and elasticity.
The second step in your Pro-5 Collagen regime, the formula glides effortlessly across the skin, delivering age-defying benefits; two marine collagen derivatives combine to soften and smooth skin whilst hydrating, improving elasticity and reducing the appearance of wrinkles.
Skin looks plumped up and youthful, and 'Suberlift', a clinically proven ingredient, is harnessed to lift and firm the skin. Skin is protected from external aggressors, retains moisture and looks smoother and younger with improved tone. - K.N.
name: Advanced Pro-5 Collagen Marine Cream (50ml)

product_description:
The Astringent Toning Lotion from IOMA lastingly purifies the skin through its astringent action. The toner applies as an airy foam that is light and creamy textured, and softly massages into your skin, eliminating impurities and removing make-up residue.
As well as cleansing, the toning lotion tightens pores for a smooth, firm complexion. It regenerates, calms and rebalances the skin, and regulates sebum production to reduce shine. – E.W.
name: Astringent Toning Lotion 150ml

product_description:
Take anti-ageing action with skinChemists Advanced Bee Venom Facial Serum, an innovative serum that harnesses the age-defying, plumping benefits of bee venom.
Working to actively firm and plump the skin, the lightweight serum effectively hydrates and fights wrinkles simultaneously; its dose of bee venom enhances blood circulation and actively plumps up skin to reduce visible wrinkles, whilst moisturising manuka honey nourishes, comfort and softens the skin.
Helping to improve nutrient delivery between layers of skin, the age-reversing serum also brightens the complexion and diminishes the appearance of age spots and imperfections. Expect younger looking, smooth skin with a radiant glow. - K.N.
name: Advanced Bee Venom Facial Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Bursting with vitamins, anti-oxidants and minerals, this Advanced Anti-Oxidant Superfood Facial Oil from Dr Botanicals is a rapidly absorbing facial serum. The oil works day and night, protecting the skin from UV damage and boosting the skin’s regeneration. Light on your skin, the oil leaves you with a repaired, protecting and healthy-looking complexion.
The Advanced Oil is enriched with a range of botanical extracts including: Blackcurrant Seed Oil, which moisturises, nourishes and strengthens; Cherry Kernel Oil, which acts as a UV absorber; and a blend of wild Plum, which has remarkable skin healing properties. – E.W.
name: Botanicals Advanced Anti-Oxidant Superfood Facial Oil (30ml)

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with the Dr Botanicals Ultra-Hydrating Facial Serum; a luxurious formula that works to nourish, soften and protect skin.
Fast-absorbing and lightweight, its blend of blue lotus flower, red algae and elderflower moisturises and conditions skin, whilst anti-ageing white tea minimises the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to maintain a youthful look.
Antioxidant-rich sweet almond oil shields from free radical damage and environmental aggressors to reveal an even skin tone and restore long-lasting comfort. Skin is left purified, revitalised and soothed with a radiant glow. E.N.
name: Botanicals Ultra-Hydrating Facial Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Moisturise, smooth and visibly firm skin with Chantecaille Retinol Body Treatment. The transformative cream uses active nano-encapsulated retinol technology to gently improve the appearance of the skin’s texture, creating firmer looking skin.
Infused with powerful botanicals, shea butter and sunflower oil which smooth and moisturise dry skin for a youthful glow.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalene that is plant derived.
name: Retinol Body Treatment - 200ml

product_description:
Draw out impurities with the acclenz™ Deep Down Clearing Mask from Dr. Nick Lowe, internationally recognised as one of the world's leading experts in dermatology and skincare.
Specifically formulated for blemish-prone skin, the face mask utilises Niacinamide, Zinc and Time Release Salicylic Acid to eliminate excess surface oil and encourage cell renewal, whilst calming and comforting damaged skin.
Eucalyptus Leaf Extract acts as an anti-microbial agent to inhibit bacteria growth, leaving your complexion clear, fresh and shine-free.
name: Nick Lowe acclenz Deep Down Clearing Mask 50ml

product_description: The Elixir Lift Face Regenerating and Tightening Serum by PAYOT delivers a special complex that melts into the skin to prevent and treat the signs of ageing. Specially developed for mature skin, the serum combines an active complex of hyaluronic acids, oligoelements, biosaccharides and Argan extract for an instant tightening and smoothing effect. The elixir prepares the skin for day and night moisturisers for maximum anti-ageing protection and a youthful and glowing complexion.
name: Elixir Lift Face Serum 30ml

product_description:
Developed for combination to oily skin, PAYOT's Puri Eau Cleanser gently eliminates impurities without stripping moisture.
With a no need to rinse formula, the micellar water utilises Zinc Extract to effortlessly dissolve make-up, excess sebum and pollutants, decongesting pores and revealing a refreshed, refined complexion. Housed in a convenient pump bottle for mess-free application.
name: Puri Eau Cleanser for Combination to Oily Skin 200ml

product_description:
Reveal a brighter, more radiant complexion with Skin Authority VitaD Fortified™ Topical Elixir, a lightweight, oil-free solution enriched with a Vitamin D compound and Retinol to brighten and protect your skin.
The multi-action formula utilises a host of vitamins, including D, A, E, and K, and Dry Finish Technology™ to quickly deliver nutrients into skin. Its brightening and firming properties promote a youthful complexion, and its dose of antioxidants keep skin safe from external aggressors. After use, skin feels silky to the touch with renewed clarity and radiance.
name: Authority VitaD Fortified™ Topical Elixir

product_description:
Regain a youthful-looking complexion with Skin Authority Wrinkle Reversing Serum, a lightweight, anti-ageing serum that works to restore even tone whilst reducing the appearance of wrinkles.
Utilising four naturally ocurring proteins, the formula promotes a smoother, fuller and plumper-looking complexion; its line-smoothing properties target wrinkles to leave skin with a firmer appearance. Helping to fade discolouration and enhance natural radiance, the non-greasy serum improves tone and texture to leave skin clarified, radiant and younger-looking. Won't clog pores.
name: Authority Wrinkle Reversing Serum

product_description:
Reveal a radiant complexion with the MÁDARA Exfoliating Oil-to-Milk Scrub in a convenient travel size. The rich oil-based formula transforms into a silky milk texture when applied to gently cleanse and soften skin without stripping away essential moisture.
Formulated with a nourishing organic blend, Apricot and Oat Oil molecules work to lift away dirt and impurities, whilst natural wax microbeads help unclog pores and buff away dead skin cells. Skin’s natural cell renewal is stimulated, unveiling softened, smoother and polished skin with a healthy-looking glow.
name: Exfoliating Scrub Oil-To-Milk Travel Size 12.5ml

product_description:
Rejuvenate tired eyes with PAYOT Perform Lift Eye Contour Patches, a set of anti-ageing eye care patches that work to combat signs of ageing and fatigue around the sensitive eye contour.
Targeting the whole eye zone, including wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness, the pre-loaded patches are packed with a host of active ingredients to help counteract signs of ageing and tiredness. Their blend of antioxidant vitamin E, hyaluronic acids and Acti-Lift complex perform a lifting effect on the eyes, smoothing the appearance of fine lines whilst diminishing dark circles for wide awake, younger-looking peepers.
Eyes feel instantly fresher with a bright and radiant appearance.
name: Perform Lift Eye Contour Patches

product_description:
Achieve a close, comfortable shave with the Sheik's Musk Shaving Oil from Carsons Apothecary; a brand who combine traditional formulas with high performance results. Developed for use pre and post shave, the protective oil softens and lifts hairs, whilst hydrating and conditioning skin to prevent moisture loss.
Infused with a nourishing blend of Rosehip, Grapeseed and Sweet Almond Oils, its caring formula allows the razor to glide effortlessly over skin with minimised friction, nicks and burns, whilst delivering a masculine fragrance of musk and patchouli. Skin is left soft, smooth and restored.
name: Apothecary Sheik's Musk Shaving Oil

product_description:
Treat lack-lustre skin to the Lift & Plump Sheet Mask from Lancer Skincare. Utilising Apple Stem Cell Compounds and Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-3, the face mask is enriched with innovative anti-ageing ingredients that work to firm and tighten skin for a younger-looking appearance.
A revitalising blend of Rose Water, Centella Asiatica Extract and Sodium Hyaluronate deliver optimum, long-lasting hydration to quench thirsty skin, whilst improving suppleness and texture to reveal a refreshed, restored complexion. Includes four single-use sheet masks.
name: Skincare Lift & Plump Sheet Mask 4 Pack

product_description:
Achieve nourished skin with Men's Moisturising Cream from Natural Spa Factory. Ideal for the modern day man, the moisturiser is a rich cream designed to hydrate and soften skin. Infused with a blend of Neroli, sweet Almond and Wheat Germ oils, the velvety formula is ideal to use after shaving or whenever the skin is in need of some TLC.
Without leaving behind a greasy residue, the moisturiser works to reduce the appearance of blemishes and marks causes from scarring and spots as well as delivering instant hydration. Through use of the gentle cream, the face is left moisturised, smooth and thoroughly nourished.
name: Spa Factory Men's Moisturising Cream

product_description:
Combat the look of crow’s feet and dark circles with the AminoGenesis Counter Clockwise Under Eye Rescue. The advanced anti-aging serum has the consistency and concentration of a cream with the water-carrying abilities of a gel, allowing hydration and nutrients to be effectively delivered to skin.
Utilising the AminoGenesis<sup>™</sup> base formula, it contains the patented, breakthrough peptide Preventhelia™, which combats free radical damage and helps neutralize oxidative aggressors that both cause premature signs of aging. Brimming with vitamins and essential amino acids, the eye cream reduces the look of fine lines and discolouration. It quickly sinks in to leave skin feeling moisturised, refreshed and smoother.
name: Counter Clockwise Under Eye Treatment

product_description:
Revive dull skin with AromaWorks Nourish Face Exfoliate Mask, an anti-ageing face mask that sloughs away dead skin cells to promote brighter, smoother, rejuvenated skin.
Infused with Bamboo, Seagrass and Essential Oils, the formula gently exfoliates, tones and refines whilst improving the appearance of wrinkles and other signs of ageing. Harnessing the power of 14 BioActive ingredients, the mask delivers moisturising and firming properties to inspire younger-looking skin.
name: Nourish Face Exfoliate Mask 50ml

product_description:
Awaken to softened and restored skin with the AromaWorks Night Cream for Men, an anti-ageing moisturiser that works to penetrate skin overnight when it’s most susceptible to treatment.
Formulated with 15 BioActive ingredients, it hydrates and conditions skin to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Complex actives ActiMoist NMF and ActiGlow C balance and optimise moisture levels to soften and refine texture with long lasting results, whilst Aloe Vera encourages cell repair. Naturally fragranced with uplifting Bergamot and Lavender, the face cream leaves skin feeling nourished and rejuvenated.
name: Men's Night Cream 50ml

product_description:
Unveil visibly younger looking skin with the AminoGenesis Simply One 10-in-1 Skin Perfecting Treatment; an advanced, multi-tasking face cream that smoothes the appearance of fine lines, minimises the look of pores and revitalises dull skin.
Formulated with a complex scientific blend of peptides, antioxidants and botanical extracts, the lightweight cream can be used as a moisturizer or makeup primer, creating an even and refined texture that’s the perfect canvas with a shine-resistant, matte finish.
Hyaluronic Acid and Glucosamine help infuse skin with intense hydration, while Alpha Lipoic Acid is rich in vitamins and antioxidants to combat free radical damage that causes signs of premature aging. Suitable for daily use and all skin types, it’s the ideal product for achieving a radiant, flawless and revitalised complexion in one simple step.
name: Simply One 10-in-1 Skin Perfecting Treatment

product_description:
Freshly handmade in the UK with high-quality and natural ingredients, STEAMCREAM's 'Cheval A Bascule' Moisturiser is a lightweight whipped emulsion that can be used on the face, hands and body.
Developed with the brand's unique STEAM process, the finest ingredients have been fused together by a shot of steam to create a gentle, fast-absorbing emulsion that delivers long-lasting hydration.
Harnessing the nourishing powers of Orange Flower Water, Cocoa Butter and Almond and Jojoba Oils, the ultra-moisturising formula softens and replenishes, leaving skin smooth, restored and rejuvenated from top to toe.
Presented in a reusable, decorative tin crafted from recyclable materials to reduce energy use and respect the environment. STEAMCREAM follows a strict no-animal testing policy and is approved by the Vegan Society.
name: Cheval A Bascule Moisturiser 75ml

product_description:
Combat signs of ageing with Lancer Skincare's Younger Pure Youth Serum, an anti-ageing formula that works to promote younger looking skin.
Utilising a novel complex, wrinkles and fine lines appear reduced and elasticity, tone and signs of sun damage are greatly improved.
Delivering a refreshing veil over the skin, expect radiant skin that feels and looks younger.
name: Skincare Younger Pure Youth Serum (30ml)

product_description:
Treat tired complexions to the yes to Cucumbers Calming Face Mask; a revitalising treatment developed specifically for sensitive skin in need of a gentle boost.
Harnessing the powers of cooling Aloe Vera and Organic Cucumber, the soothing, five-minute mask rejuvenates and refreshes, whilst delivering long-lasting hydration to leave you with a soft, supple and comfortable complexion.
name: to Cucumbers Calming Face Mask

product_description:
Refresh and rejuvenate tired, weary eyes with Borghese Botanico Eye Compresses, a cooling, hydrating eye treatment that helps to soften and soothe delicate, fatigued skin.
Combining antioxidant Green Tea with Goldenseal and Eyebright extracts, the saturated pads instantly cool and refresh skin around the eyes, softening and relieving to lend tired eyes an energised and wide awake feeling. After use, skin looks clarified and radiant.
name: Botanico Eye Compresses

product_description:
Presenting you with a trio of essential products for a clear, fresh complexion, this Essentials set from Triumph and Disaster will leave your skin looking and feeling silky soft.
This set contains the following products:
Triumph and Disaster Ritual Face Cleanser 150mlTriumph and Disaster Ritual Face Cleanser removes the build up of dirt, oil and impurities from your pores, without drying the skin or causing irritation. A gentle exfoliating action buffs away dead skin cells to leave your complexion bright and renewed, whilst a blend of natural oils nourish and care for even the most sensitive of skin.
Triumph and Disaster Old Fashioned Shave Cream 90mlTriumph and Disaster Old Fashioned Shave Cream will help you to relive that nostalgic feeling that comes with a traditional wet shave. Rich and creamy, it forms a luxurious lather which means you can achieve a close, comfortable and smooth shave, minimising the risk of irritation, ingrown hairs and razor bumps.
Triumph and Disaster Gameface Facial Moisturiser 90mlNourish your skin with Triumph and Disaster Gameface Facial Moisturiser. The lightweight formula absorbs easily to protect your skin against harsh environmental elements, whilst the special blend of hydrating ingredients feed your skin with essential nutrients.
name: and Disaster Essentials

product_description:
Protect and nourish skin in one simple step with the Skin Authority Daily Defense Moisturizer SPF 30; a multitasking treatment ideally used beneath makeup.
Enriched with AOX Technology™ that combines Vitamins B5 and E as well as soothing Aloe extract, the lightweight and very water-resistant formula infuses skin with hydration while providing broad spectrum protection against harmful UV rays and photo ageing. Patented Dry Finish Technology™ ensures a smooth, matte base free from any greasy residue.
name: Authority Daily Defense Moisturizer SPF 30

product_description:
Reignite a luminous glow with PRAI's 24K GOLD Precious Oil Drops. Harnessing the powers of luxurious 24K Gold, the deeply nourishing treatment defends against free radicals and environmental aggressors to help maintain healthy collagen.
Synergising Avocado Oil, Chamomile and precious PRAI Oil, the fast-absorbing, anti-ageing formula infuses skin with long-lasting moisture and hydration, whilst restoring softness and suppleness for a youthful-looking complexion. Complete with a pipette for mess-free application.

product_description:
The Jurlique Skin Balancing Face Oil is a non-greasy, wonderfully light moisturising face oil that will soften, protect and nurture your skin. With beautiful chamomile, calendula, marshmallow and rose essences, your skin will thank you for the treat.
Jurlique never fails to deliver with their vast range of biodynamic beauty products and this Skin Balancing Face Oil is no exception. This oil soothes and balances skin with the help of avocado, macadamia and rose hip which guards it against moisture loss, improve skin elasticity and leave it feeling smooth and supple. As a restorative moisturiser, it also makes an ideal after sun cream.
Directions of use:
name: Skin Balancing Face Oil (50ml)

product_description:
This Rosa Centifolia Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser by REN is created to deeply cleanse the skin to leave you with a fresh, soft and supple complexion. Working to remove dead skin cells, the innovative formula contains microbeads of Jojoba which provide a gentle exfoliating action to remove dirt from your pores.
Wonderfully rejuvenating and refreshing, this cleanser is perfect for normal skin types. Easy to use and super effective, it buffs away all impurities to leave skin looking and feeling purified and invigorated. K.D.

product_description: Give your skin a soothing and hydrating treatment with the Rose Moisture Plus Revitalising Gel Lotion by Jurlique. The gel lotion is based on natural ingredients. These include green tea, grape seed and rose hip. Combined, this formula designed by Jurlique moisturises your skin and restores your skin's natural glow and suppleness. To apply, gently use a small portion of the gel lotion to rub between your fingertips and massage it onto your face, neck and décolleté. For best results, use the revitalising gel lotion on a daily basis. Part of the Rose Moisture Plus range, the revitalising gel lotion comes in a 50ml jar that you can store easily in your bedroom or bathroom cupboard.
name: Rose Moisture Plus Revitalising Gel Lotion (50ml)

product_description:
Fight signs of ageing with PRAI PLATINUM Night Caviar Firm & Lift Serum, a powerful anti-ageing serum that works to combat visible signs of ageing.

Infused with Platinum, an antioxidant-rich precious metal known for its firming properties, and an Uplevity™ Peptide, the serum helps to counteract the force of gravity, tightening and firming the appearance of skin whilst fighting free radical attacks to promote a more youthful-looking complexion. Its blend of Argan and Avocado Oils deliver omega-3 fatty acids to help renew skin whilst you sleep for smoother, softer skin come morning. Expect a restored complexion that looks younger and energised.

product_description: This First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer gives your complexion instant hydration. The Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer does not contain any parabens, sulphates, synthetic ingredients or petrochemicals. Instead, it is made with colloidal oatmeal, shea butter, meadowfoam seed oil and liquorice root. Combined into a luxurious treatment, the moisturiser helps to boost your skin's natural barrier function, keeping out grime and retaining natural moisture. Apply daily, morning and night-time after cleansing your face, for best results.
name: Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Face Moisturizer (50ml)

Natural Spa Factory's Illuminate Super Serum is a highly concentrated gel-serum that penetrates deep down to help re-energise skin and combat discolouration.
Formulated with smaller molecules than that of a traditional moisturiser, the face serum is able to delve deeper into skin, acting as a delivery system for larger molecules that sit on the surface from other skincare products; it carries the larger molecules from face creams and moisturisers deep within the epidermis to enhance efficacy and results. Enriched with Rice Bran, Vitamins and Antioxidants, the lightweight yet thick textured serum will melt effortlessly into skin, leaving it feeling hydrated and rejuvenated with a more even tone.
