Help correct the ten most visible signs of ageing with Perricone MD Cold Plasma. Through Dr. Perricone’s patented delivery system this treatment offers the skin all it needs for optimal health.
Perricone MD Cold Plasma represents Dr. Perricone’s most comprehensive and efficacious work to date. Working to combat wrinkles, enlarged pores, dryness, redness, discolouration, uneven skin tone, impurities, loss of firmness, loss of smoothness and loss of radiance, this composite delivers extraordinary results whatever your age or skin type.
Directions of use:
name: Md Cold Plasma (30ml)

This cream from Karin Herzog increases elasticity and softness of the epidermis, the most out layer of your skin, providing an excellent texture for the perfect application of make up.
Directions of use:

Fighting the 5 signs of fatigue, L’Oréal Men Expert Hydra Energetic Daily Anti-Fatigue Moisturising Lotion gives your skin a daily boost of hydration and provides non-stop protection throughout the day.

Take action with L’Oréal Men Expert Hydra Energetic Daily Anti-Fatigue Moisturising Lotion as it helps to reinforce your skin’s natural resistance with a fresh and hydrating formula designed specifically for men’s skin.
Directions of use:
name: Men Expert Hydra Energetic Daily Anti-Fatigue Moisturising Lotion (50ml)

product_description: The Pro-Radiance Cream Cleanser is a new anti-ageing cleanser by Elemis. The cream cleanser comes in a 150ml bottle and is easy to use. Use the cleanser for your face, neck and décolleté. For best results, use the cleanser daily, working your fingertips gently over your skin. Leave the solution for one minute, and then remove with a warm mitt. Repeat if necessary.

Monoi Tahitian, a perfume oil works to moisturise and soothe skin, visibly repairing damage and stress experienced by the skin whilst it is most receptive to repair, during sleep
A balance of Vitamins and Anti-Oxidants work to protect the skin against exposure to environmental damage and aggressors, whilst also hydrating the skin and improving its visible firmness. skinChemists COLDTOX Facial Serum (20ml) boasts a revolutionary  formulation that combines award winning Snow Algae, Marine Collagen and  Glacier Water to create a hydrating and nourishing serum.

Infused with a host of beneficial ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Rosehip Oil and antioxidant Blackberry Leaf Extract, the BB cream firms and refines skin, whilst delivering natural-looking coverage with a hint of colour for a beautifully even tone.
Ideal as a primer beneath make-up, its innovative sun filter is combined with Spruce Knot, Lotus Flower and Violet Seed to defend against the damaging effects of UVA and UVB rays. Skin is bright, calm and comfortable with long-lasting moisture and hydration. Suitable for all skin types.

product_description:
Tackle problematic, breakout-prone skin on-the-spot with the ESPADA™ Acne-Clearing Pen from Swedish beauty brand FOREO; a pioneering, at-home treatment that combines their renowned T-Sonic™ pulsations with powerful blue light technology to deliver unparalleled results.
The intelligent device utilises 415NM of blue light LEDs that penetrate deep below the surface layer of skin, clinically proven to kill acne-causing bacteria at the source without causing pain or discomfort, with targeted light application ensuring surgical-like precision to treat even the smallest blemish right from when it emerges for instant action.
The gentle T-Sonic™ pulsations activate upon contact with skin, working to diffuse the light into pores to enhance efficiency while stimulating micro-circulation to promote skin renewal and repair. With continued use, the overall complexion appears healthier looking and more refined with a noticeable decrease in breakouts.  
Ergonomically designed with the head coated in ultra-hygienic, 100% waterproof silicone, ESPADA™ prevents the spread of acne-causing bacteria and feels smooth to touch for optimum comfort even on sensitive skin, with one charge providing up to 60 2-minute treatments. With no need to replace cartridges, it provides a long-term investment for visibly clearer skin.

product_description:
L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Laser Renew Precision Eye Cream helps to renew and revitalise the delicate skin around the eye area. The triple action formula works to smooth wrinkles, reduce eye bags and firm the skin, leaving you with visible results in just four weeks. Say hello to refreshed, younger looking eyes!
Directions of Use: Press the tube to release the cream and massage into the eye contour area.
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Revitalift Laser Renew Precision Eye Cream - Triple Action (15ml)

product_description:
The GLOV Hydro Cleansing Travel Set is an effortless, efficient and simple way to cleanse skin without the need for a cleanser, perfect for travel or as an everyday solution. Presented in a re-usable cosmetics storage case, the kit provides an innovative solution for refreshed and purified skin.
On-The-Go Hydro Cleanser
Utilising advanced microfibre technology, the cleansing glove contains refined fibres up to 30 times thinner than a cotton pad, which boast electrostatic properties to absorb makeup, dirt and excess oil like a magnet without the need for a facial cleanser. The delicate and naturally antibacterial glove delivers a light yet effective clean with a gentle peeling effect to unveil skin that feels fresher and revitalised.

Perfect for quick cleansing and fixes, the Quick Treat Cleanser is a compact version that fits in your purse for any-time any-place cleansing. The micro fibre tool effortlessly sweeps away mascara smudges or lipstick marks for clean and flawless results.
1 x Soap - to effectively clean the GLOV after each use for optimum efficiency and lifespan.
1 x Travel Hanger - with suction cup to hang the GLOV up after each use.

Achieve a shine-free complexion with the Mattifying Face Cream from NAOBAY (Natural And Organic Beauty And You).
Infused with Rice Starch, Fucus and Ivy Extracts, the fast-absorbing formula delivers optimum hydration, whilst eliminating excess oil for a smooth, flawless finish. Ideal for blemish-prone or oily skin types, you can expect a long-lasting matte complexion and perfect base for make-up application.

product_description:
Tackle a range of skincare woes with the skinChemists 24H Aqua Repair Facial Serum, perfect for dry, sensitive and problematic skin types.
A delicate blend of advanced active ingredients work in tandem to infuse skin with vitamins and antioxidants, working to minimise the look of uneven skin tone and redness while delivering deep hydration with long lasting results. Suitable for all skin types, it helps promote a more even and healthier looking complexion that feels firmer and more refined.

product_description: Shield skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays and keep it ultra hydrated with the Antipodes Immortal Moisturiser SPF15. Its intense moisturising properties ensure your face and body is kept soft with opitmum hydration, whilst being protected from sun exposure. - K.R

product_description: Get camera ready in a flash with the Double Blur® Skin Perfector from The Hero Project; an advanced, HD skin treatment that targets problematic areas to deliver a uniform, smooth and flawless looking complexion. The transparent, lightweight gel formula features Dual Diffusion Technology™  – polymer microspheres create an optical illusion on skin, working to scatter light and fill the appearance of wrinkles. The clever technology optimises light reflection, leading to a natural looking base with imperfections effectively blurred. An undetectable, silky smooth veil softens and corrects the look of blemishes and pores; with the addition of natural Glycerin keeping skin feeling softened and hydrated. Easy to use with a no-waste, airless pump, it’s an ideal makeup primer or foundation replacement – helping to minimise shine, even out redness and create an airbrushed, matte finish.

product_description:
Specially formulated to promote health, youth and longevity, Fountain The Beauty Molecule is a concentrated beauty supplement that will keep you feeling healthy and youthful both on the inside and the out.
Each 5ml serving contains 40mg of resveratrol, a natural phenol that's found in the skin of red grapes and in Japanese knotweed which has been proven in studies to offer the longevity effects of calorie restriction, promote normal cell division and offer powerful antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
The formula contains water-soluble resveratrol in a proprietary water matrix delivery system for maximum absorption, in a base of vegan-friendly hyaluronic acid to promote youthfulness. Boasting a delicious pomegranate flavour, Fountain The Beauty Molecule is suitable for both men and women, whilst also being free from artificial colours and flavours. - L.M.

Boasting broad spectrum SPF30, the sun cream shields skin from UVA and UVB damage, whilst an advanced active ingredients works to stimulate the production of melanin. This activates the tanning process and promotes a healthy glow. The hydrating formula delivers a veil of protective moisture to the visage, which restores skin’s optimum levels during sun exposure, as well as working to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores.
Suitable for all skin types but ideal for those with sensitive skin, the lightweight lotion effortlessly glides over the face, absorbing quickly without leaving behind an unwanted, greasy residue. Expect to achieve a safe and natural tan.

product_description:
Rejuvenate your complexion with the OSKIA Restoration Oil, a high performance blend of nutrients, floral oils and extracts to lift, tone and nourish skin. Suitable for all skin types, the non-greasy oil is enriched with firming African Acmella to increase suppleness, lupin and sea fennel to promote collagen production and boost elasticity, and anti-inflammatory turmeric which evens out skin tone for a radiant, healthy-looking complexion.
Infused with replenishing starflower, sunflower seeds and evening primrose oil, rich in gamma linolenic acid to hydrate skin and restore the natural barrier function. With antioxidant rosehip oil to repair and protect from free radical damage and calming heart seed vine to relieve discomfort, the luxurious oil minimises the appearance of fine lines to reveal smoother, softer skin. E.N.
name: Restoration Oil (30ml)

product_description:
Rejuvenate skin whilst you sleep with the Cell Repair Night Oil from Aurelia Probiotic Skincare. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive, the overnight treatment utilises Kalahari and Mongongo Oils to regenerate and strengthen skin, whilst Kigelia firms and tones to reveal a smoother, more refined complexion.
Antioxidant Hibiscus is blended with Baobab, an ingredient rich in Omegas 3, 6 and 9, to fight free radical damage and environmental aggressors; combatting dullness and dehydration to restore a luminous, dewy appearance. Naturally fragranced with Neroli, Lavender, Rose and Mandarin, you can expect revitalised, youthful-looking skin come morning.
name: Probiotic Skincare Cell Repair Night Oil 50ml

product_description: A package of textured cloths that are designed to deeply cleanse skin and refine your pores, the Ole Henriksen Grease Relief Cleansing Cloths work to refresh and cleanse your skin on the go. Uniquely textured and blended with glycolic, lactic and citric acid to thoroughly dissolve dead skin cells, these wipes also contain purifying eucalyptus to absorb pore-clogging dirt and oil for clarified and fresh-looking skin. - E.D
name: Henriksen Grease Relief Cleansing Cloths

product_description:
Show your skin who's boss with Garnier Pure Matte Control Moisturiser, an oil-banishing emulsion that works to hydrate skin whilst combatting excess shine.
Ideal for oily to combination skin, the comforting gel moisturiser harnesses the absorbent powers of Airlicium™, and the corrective, exfoliating properties of salicylic acid; in conjunction they help control sebum and oil production whilst reducing the appearance of blemishes on the skin. Skin feels intensely moisturised with a refined texture. Pores appear to disappear and skin is mattified with no greasy patch in sight. - K.N.
name: Pure Matte Control Moisturiser (50ml)

product_description:
Enhance your pout with Eve Lom's Kiss Mix Colour; an ultra-hydrating formula that can be applied under lipstick, over lip colour, or worn alone for a soft, pearlised sheen.
Infused with moisturising Beeswax and cooling Menthol, the luxurious lip balm softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors and harsh weather conditions for long-lasting comfort. Lips are smooth and sumptuous with subtle colour.
name: Lom Kiss Mix Colour 7ml - Lippy

product_description:
skinChemists Lip Plump Extreme will allow you to achieve fuller, plumper and more defined lips, without the need for invasive cosmetic procedures. Infused with super-strength hyaluronic acid, the serum will visibly increase the volume of your lips, whilst providing hydration to keep them feeling smooth and soft. You'll be able to achieve the perfect pout in an instant! - L.M.
Directions for Use: Apply directly to clean, dry lips.
name: Lip Plump Extreme (7ml)

product_description:
The Calendula Redness Rescue Soothing Moisturising Cream by Jurlique is a unique and effective cream designed to restore the skin's epidermal defences. It gives long lasting hydration amongst anti-irritant benefits to soothe and nourish the skin for a relaxing, softening effect.
Redness will be visibly reduced, whilst this serum protects against external aggressors and hydrates the skin. Containing a Comfort Complex boasting extracts of Calendula, Chamomile, Echinacea, Self Heal, Spilanthes and Marshmallow, this luscious product will leave your skin feeling and looking as good as new! K.D.
name: Calendula Redness Rescue Soothing Moisturising Cream (40ml)

product_description:
Enhance your pout with Eve Lom's Kiss Mix Colour; an ultra-hydrating formula that can be applied under lipstick, over lip colour, or worn alone for a soft, pearlised sheen.
Infused with moisturising Beeswax and cooling Menthol, the luxurious lip balm softens and conditions, whilst defending against environmental aggressors and harsh weather conditions for long-lasting comfort. Lips are smooth and sumptuous with subtle colour.
name: Lom Kiss Mix Colour 7ml - Demure

product_description:
Unique and effective, the Instant Calm: Chamomile & Rosehip Calming Day Cream by Pai is formulated with super soothing ingredients which work to minimise risk of irritation whilst reducing redness. With Matricin and Azulene to soothe, Omegas 3, 6, 7 and 9 to keep skin hydrated and CO2 extracts of German Chamomile and Rosehip to restore, this cream is a must have.
It's designed to quickly calm any flare ups on the skin, ensuring that your complexion is kept looking and feeling soft, smooth and supple. K.D.
name: Instant Calm: Chamomile & Rosehip Calming Day Cream - 50ml

product_description:
Make sure you keep your flawless skin perfectly balanced with the lush Jurlique Balancing Foaming Cleanser. Rich in the living energy of calendula, daisy and peppermint it gently lifts away surface impurities to leave skin beautifully cleansed.
Jurlique values life, energy and beauty, all of which can be found in the Balancing Foaming Cleanser. Experience the hydrating benefits as you work this cleansing foam it into a luxurious lather to invigorate your skin and refresh your soul.
Directions of use:
name: Balancing - Foaming Cleanser (200ml)

product_description:
Perfect for all skin types, the First Aid Beauty FAB 'Faves to Go' Kit combines everything you need to achieve clear and radiant skin. In handy travel sized bottles, these 'FAB' faves will keep your skin cleansed, exfoliated and moisturised on the go. - K.N.
FAB Face Cleanser (56.7g):
Suitable for sensitive skin, this face cleanser gently but efficiently cleanses the skin, working to remove impurities, makeup and dirt to leave you with a crystal clear complexion. The pH balanced formula features a powerful blend of antioxidants which fight against free radicals to keep the skin healthy. Designed to be used daily to reduce flare ups and skin reactivity.
FAB Facial Radiance Pads (28 pads):
Perfect for all skin types, even the most sensitive, these facial radiance pads work to effectively improve skin clarity and visibly reduce pores. Combining cucumber and Indian gooseberry with lemon peel and liquorice root, the toning pads professionally brighten and tone the skin whilst smoothing out the appearance of fine lines. Expect radiant, glowing skin with a more even complexion.
FAB Ultra Repair Cream (56.7g):
Perfect for those exposed to harsh weather or living with severely dry skin, this repair cream delivers an unrivalled hydrating experience, helping to alleviate and visibly improve dry and scaly skin. Thick, rich and non-greasy, the emollient formula soothes agitated skin by penetrating deep down and immediately relieving distressed skin. Fortified with shea butter, colloidal oatmeal and soothing eucalyptus oil, the cream with added antioxidant booster and ceramides improves the natural barrier function of skin whilst helping to relieve irritation and itching caused by eczema. Defends from free radical damage and is suitable to use all over the body and face.
name: Aid Beauty FAB Faves to Go Kit

product_description:
The Perricone MD Brightening Eye Cream is a lightweight, non-greasy moisturiser that works to combat premature signs of ageing such as dark circles, puffiness and fine lines.  
Utilising advanced scientific technologies, the treatment features Dr. Perricone’s patent-pending Nrf2 Antioxidant Support Complex™, a naturally derived formulation that helps activate antioxidant pathways to enhance absorption, thus improving skin’s own natural ability to fight environmental aggressors and free radicals that cause premature ageing.
Infused with light-reflecting pearls, the eye cream balances essential hydration levels and brightens the overall area, leaving skin looking refreshed and more awake, with the appearance of wrinkles and discolouration reduced.
name: MD Brightening Eye Cream

product_description:
Wave goodbye to visible signs of ageing with the Shine Bright Moisturising and Anti-Ageing Glove Masks from FACEINC by nails inc. Designed to revive hardworking hands, the glove masks reveal radiant and youthful skin.
Fortified with a skin-loving blend of Collagen and Multivitamins including Retinol, the gloves nourish the skin and work to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The glove masks also boast Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramide, which hydrate hands and leave skin smooth and supple.
name: by nails inc. Shine Bright Moisturising and Anti-Ageing Glove Masks - Deeply Hydrating, Brightening and Firming

product_description:
The Murad Age Reform Starter Kit is a three-step regime that works to cleanse, tone and hydrate skin whilst diminishing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles for a youthful-looking complexion. The perfect treat for maturing skin. - K.N.
Age Reform Refreshing Cleanser:
This foaming wash super cleanses all traces of surface impurities and makeup without drying; leaving your skin soft and smooth. Fortified with cucumber extract, which soothes and refreshes the skin, along with Hawaiian white ginger and algae extracts to soften and smoothen.
Age Reform Rapid Collagen Infusion:
Restore and hydrate skin with this Collagen Infusion, a lotion designed to target signs of ageing. Formulated with Collagen Support Complex to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and Cellular Hydro-Lock to increase water levels, it leaves you with supple and smooth skin.
Age Reform Perfecting Day Cream SPF30:
This luxuriously rich cream provides maximum hydration and sun protection, whilst restoring suppleness and delivering powerful antioxidants. Fortified with essential fatty acids to provide superior hydration; soy flower to protect elasticity and soften lines; and lecithin, which helps lock in moisture to restore the suppleness of your skin.
name: Age Reform Starter Kit

product_description:
This Natio For Men Purifying Face Scrub clears pores and prepares skin for shaving and moisturising. Fine exfoliating grains gently polish away dead skin for a razor-close shave every time.
Infused with 100% pure essential oils, this Natio For Men Purifying Face Scrub is the perfect way to prep your skin for shaving. Preparing skin for ideal moisture absorption too, this scrub is a great first step in every grooming routine.
Directions of use:
name: For Men Purifying Face Scrub (100g)

product_description: Gently remove even waterproof make-up with these PIXI Makeup Melting Cleansing Cloths. The make-up wipes are pre-moistened and gently dissolve impurities and make-up from the day. Perfect for on-the-go use. Infused with Chamomile and Grape Seed Oil, each cloth calms the skin, leaving it clean and balanced. – E.W.
name: Makeup Melting Cleansing Cloths

product_description:
Discover all of your STARSKIN favourites in one convenient collection with the STARSKIN Hollywood Party™ Gift Set; a limited edition box that hosts six coveted masks and a bonus STARSKIN headband to help with application. With masks for that cover all occasions and facial features, the comprehensive gift set ensures skin is in optimum condition to go and party.
Glowstar Foaming Peeling Perfection Puff x 1
The Glowstar Foaming Peeling Perfection Puff offers the visible results of a skin peel with the convenience of a cost effective, at home treatment. Utilising innovative exfoliation technology, the puff lathers and gently lifts away dead skin cells and impurities, revealing a luminous, natural and soft complexion. The puff is infused with a balance of Fruit Acids, Carrot and Broccoli Extract, which work to slough away the dead cells, impurities and product build-up, promoting smoother and brighter skin whilst also visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio-Cellulose Face Mask x 1
Restore dewy radiance to dry, dull and dehydrated skin with Red Carpet Ready Hydrating Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask. Ideal for prepping skin before a special occasion, the coconut mask contours close to the face and is designed with a powerful serum complex to deeply hydrate, smooth and rejuvenate skin. The innovative treatment utilises STARSKIN's exclusive Bio Cellulose, which is concentrated with vitamin-rich Coconut Juice and infuses the skin with a conditioning blend of Amino Acids and Brown Algae for visible anti-ageing results.
After Party Brightening Bio-Cellulose Face Mask
Brighten and illuminate even the most dull and tired skin with the After Party Brightening Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask. Formulated with STARSKIN's Vitamin rich Coconut Juice and Bio Cellulose, the After Party face mask hydrates, visibly revives and conditions the skin. The transparent, cooling sheet mask contours closely to the face and delivers a boost of Vitamin C, which works to improve the appearance of dark spots and visibly correct uneven skin tone. The mask is drenched in a skin revitalising Organic skincare serum, which transforms skin that has been up all night partying, visibly restoring luminosity and brightness.
Eye Catcher Smoothing Bio-Cellulose Eye Mask x 2 Pairs
Rejuvenate and brighten eyes with the Eye Catcher Smoothing Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Eye Masks. Easy to use, the masks are infused with a revolutionary serum containing Bio Cellulose, which effectively reduces the appearance of eye puffiness, fine lines and dark circles.  The masks are intelligently shaped to contour the delicate eye area, and are formulated with vitamin-rich Coconut Juice to offer exceptional hydration, whilst visibly smoothing wrinkles and brightening skin. The visage is left luminous and rejuvenated, whilst fine lines, dark circles and under eye puffiness is visibly eliminated.
Dreamkiss Plumping & Hydrating Bio-Cellulose Lip Mask x 2
No longer dream about enviable lips with Dreamkiss Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Lip Mask; a potent mask designed especially for the delicate skin of the lips. Formulated with naturally fermented, Vitamin-rich Coconut Juice, the ‘Dreamkiss’ lip mask closely follows the contours of the lips with a skin-tight fit, delivering innovative skincare serum to be absorbed into the skin. A blend of Sea Fern, Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid instantly work to visibly plump lips, improving the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, resulting in a more youthful look.
VIP The Gold Mask Revitalizing Luxury Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask x 1
Lavish your skin in luxury with The Gold Mask™ VIP Revitalizing Luxury Bio-Cellulose Second Skin Face Mask; a rejuvenating sheet mask that delivers a star-like glow. Working to transform dull, dry and lacklustre complexions, the mask fits closely to the contours of the face and delivers a rich and creamy serum to skin, which acts like a decadent treat. The bio-cellulose sheet mask is drenched in a serum that comprises Evening Primrose extract to dramatically soften skin, whilst pure Colloidal Gold works to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and sun damage. Working wonders in just fifteen to twenty minutes, the VIP mask reveals a replenished visage with an opulent and radiant glow.
name: Hollywood Party™ Gift Set

product_description: Vinoperfect Radiance Moisturiser Broad Spectrum SPF20 from Caudalie is a lightweight cream that works effectively to reduce the appearance of imperfections, dark spots and blemishes to deliver a healthy-looking, radiant complexion. The oil-free moisturiser provides a light veil of protection to shield skin from damage caused by the sun's harmful UV rays and leave skin hydrated. Suitable for use as a skin primer to remove excess sebum and control oil for an even skin tone. E.N.
name: Vinoperfect Radiance Moisturiser Broad Spectrum SPF 20

product_description:
Brighten and lift tired peepers with the Brightening Eye Mask from Skin Republic, an anti-ageing treatment that’s brimming with vitamins and antioxidants to minimise the appearance of fine lines and dark circles.
Utilising the Transdermal Delivery System to ensure efficient absorption of beneficial ingredients, the powerful serum has been expertly formulated with plant extracts and minerals to help reduce visible signs of ageing.
Vitamin C and B3 work to illuminate and even tone, whilst extracts of Coffee Bean and Green Tea re-energise and stimulate blood circulation to leave the delicate area looking refreshed and more awake. Delivering nutrients and intense moisture with close and continuous contact, the treatment minimises the look of fine lines and wrinkles, unveiling radiant and hydrated eyes.
name: Republic Brightening Eye Mask 18g (3 Pairs)

product_description:
NIOD Low-Viscosity Cleaning Ester delivers a deep cleansing action to remove all traces of make-up and impurities in a single step, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness.
Formulated with isolated sugar and avocado esters, its skin-friendly approach penetrates skin to dissolve dirt and grime, whilst regulating sebum activity to rebalance both dry and oily skin types.
Infused with antioxidant vitamin E, the cleanser repairs and protects against environmental damage so you can experience a hydrated, purified and refined complexion and unclogged pores. E.N.
name: Low-Viscosity Cleaning Ester (240ml)

product_description:
Avocado oil is packed full of vitamins and antioxidants that are perfect for maintaining a healthy complexion. Antipodes have used this to formulate their Divine Avocado and Rosehip Face Oil (30ml); a daily hydrating oil treatment that protects against environmental damage whilst promoting a firmer complexion.
The facial oil has been scientifically proven to stimulate Type 1 collagen in skin cells by up to 51%, meaning lost collagen is replaced and optimum collagen in the face is maintained for a youthful flawless face whatever the age or skin type. - K.R
name: Divine Avocado and Rosehip Face Oil

product_description:
Achieve smoother, glowing skin with the Refining Facial Polisher from Omorovicza. Enriched with calcium and magnesium, the polisher exfoliates skin to remove dead skin cells and impurities, leaving pores purified. Hydro Mineral Transference™ deeply penetrates minerals into skin and marine micro-algae boost radiance to give you a brighter, younger-looking complexion. Its unique formula contains exotic fruit extracts which plump and tone skin, whilst strengthening the surface barrier to improve firmness. Experience skin that is supple and revitalised. E.N.
Directions for use: Massage in a circular motion from the nose area outwards. As you buff, the colour will change from emerald green to pearlescent grey. Leave on for 2 minutes, then rinse thoroughly with warm water.
name: Refining Facial Polisher (100ml)

product_description:
Hydrate dry skin with REN Ultra Moisture Day Cream. Originally called Phytostimulene Instant Replenishment Moisturiser, its improved formula infuses dry skin with long lasting moisture for smooth, comfortable and healthy skin.
REN Ultra Moisture Day Cream is ideal for dry skin. Not only does it provide immediate moisture but it’s osmotic regulator carries water deep into the skin, releasing it when extra hydration is needed. Still containing phytostimulene, REN Ultra Moisture Day Cream nourishes and protects your skin while combating tightness and discomfort. Your skin will feel smooth, supple and comfortable.
Directions of use:
name: Ultra Moisture Day Cream 50ml

product_description:
Polish, protect and perfect hair with the Alterna Caviar CC Extra Hold Leave-In Hair Protector; a miracle, multi-tasking treatment that delivers ten benefits in one.
Enriched with the proprietary Caviar Complex, the correction cream for hair replenishes moisture levels, enhances strength and improves manageability to limit breakage and maximise shine. Delivering UV protection, heat protection and long lasting, extra-strong hold, it is the perfect styling product to leave locks looking sleek, soft, smooth and refined.
name: Caviar CC Extra Hold Leave-In Hair Protector (74ml)

product_description:
Rediscover youthful-looking skin with KORRES Black Pine Advanced Firming Active Oil, a concentrated, anti-ageing serum with firming and lifting effects.
Working to plump and restore skin's contour, the serum combines a host of beneficial ingredients, including: naturally derived hexapeptide 11, black pine polyphenols and hyaluronic acid. The innovative components work in synergy to promote a younger-looking complexion; strengthening the skin whilst, enhancing firmness and boosting resilience. Skin looks restored and youthful.
name: Black Pine Advanced Firming Active Oil

product_description: Dr. Hauschka Quince Day Cream boasts a lightweight formula that helps to tone and balance your skin, leaving your complexion looking healthy and radiant. Enriched with quince wax which forms a breathable, protective layer over your skin to maintain moisture balance, it also contains oils of jojoba, apricot and avocado to hydrate and firm your skin. Suitable for normal skin, this refreshing cream is the perfect addition to your skin care routine. - L.M.
name: Hauschka Quince Day Cream 30ml

product_description:
Wake up every morning with youthful skin to match the bounce in your step with L’Oreal Wrinkle Decrease Collagen Re-Plumper Night Cream.
Every expression you make will cause your face to have micro-contractions. L’Oreal Wrinkle Decrease Collagen Re-Plumper Night Cream understands these reactions are best treated at night when the majority of your facial muscles are rested. The rich formula will slowly soak into each skin cell giving the collagen ample time and space to work its magic, allowing you to wake up on the right side of bed in the morning.
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Collagen Wrinkle De-Crease Replumping Night Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Enjoy a rose infused rich texture that only enhances the skin and does not strip away it’s natural oils. Nuxe Eau Démaquillante Fondant – Melting Cleansing Gel is the perfect way to cleanse and moisturise your skin in one easy step.
Cleanse, remove make up and hydrate your skin in one well deserved easy application of Nuxe Eau Démaquillante Fondant – Melting Cleansing Gel. Infused with coconut and macadamia oil skin is simultaneously soothed an smoothed.
Directions of use:
name: Gel Demaquillant Fondant - Melting Cleansing Gel (125ml)

product_description:
Deeply replenish thirsty skin with the Vitamasques Hydrogel Face Mask; an innovative treatment that has been clinically proven to keep your complexion hydrated for up to 120 hours.
Fortified with Rose of Jericho Extract and the patented AMF (Artificial Moisturising Factor), the Korean face mask enhances the skin's ability to retain moisture, whilst nourishing and conditioning to leave you with a soft, smooth and revitalised complexion. A weekly boost for dull, dehydrated skin.
name: Hydrogel Face Mask

product_description:
Need quick and easy long lasting UVA/UVB protection with a high SPF factor? Ultrasun Clear Spray SPF 30 Sports Formula could be just what you’re looking for.
The Ultrasun Clear Spray SPF30 Sports Formula benefits from the spray bottle design making it easy to apply even when you only have one hand to spare. This combined with the light weight non-greasy liquid formula makes it perfect for even the most energetic watersports and outdoor adventures.  It is also perfect for those with delicate skins as it does not contain any nasty oils, emulsifiers or perfume. This cleverly reduces the risk of allergy and makes it great to use on sensitive areas like the scalp where there is perhaps a little less hair then there used to be.
name: CLEAR SPRAY SPF30 - SPORTS FORMULA (150ML)

product_description:
Elemis presents the Pro-Collagen Super System, an advanced 5-step skincare programme that works to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst leaving skin feeling intensely nourished and moisturised. The anti-ageing set features 6 must-have treatments housed in an elegant gift box, making this a wonderful gift for a loved one or an indulgent treat for yourself.
Pro-Collagen Marine Cream (30ml)
Intensely hydrate skin with the anti-ageing moisturising cream, enriched with collagen-boosting marine extract Padina Pavonica to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Its ultra-rich, powerful formula is infused with Mediterranean Algae to moisturise skin, leaving it firmer with increased suppleness and an even tone.
Pro-Collagen Oxygenating Night Cream (15ml)
Wake up to a brighter, smoother complexion with this non-greasy night cream. Suitable for all skin types, the cream absorbs quickly into skin to support its natural regeneration process, revealing firmer skin and delaying signs of premature ageing. Fortified with a blend of Laminaria Digitata and Red Coral to condition skin, whilst Padina Pavonica boosts elasticity for a smoother appearance and antioxidant Avocado Oil provides free radical protection.
Pro-Collagen Marine Mask (15ml)
The luxurious face mask works to smooth, firm and tone the appearance of your skin. Enriched with marine active Padina Pavonica as well as natural extracts of Moringa and Argan Tree Oil, its deeply moisturising formula helps reveal a youthful-looking, refined complexion, plumping out skin to reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
Pro-Collagen Neck and Décolleté Balm (15ml) 
The anti-ageing balm helps to increase the skin’s firmness and reduce the appearance of crepe-textured skin, leaving the neck and bust area smooth and more youthful-looking. It’s formulated with Omega-7 rich Sea Buckthorn oil and is expertly blended with the unique Mediterranean algae Padina Pavonica to help hydrate and nourish. Liftessence, a natural skin tightening material, forms an elastic, resistant and continuous lifting 3D network to help tighten the skin.
Pro-Collagen Super Serum Elixir (15ml x 2)
Powered by antioxidant African Birch Bark, Red Seaweed and Padina Pavonica, the serum’s unique formula boosts elasticity and firms skin to reveal a younger-looking complexion. A potent cocktail of Hyaluronic Acid and omega-rich Camelina Oil delivers intense moisture, plumping and hydrating skin for a smoother, softer texture.
name: Pro-Collagen Super System

product_description:
Protect the delicate eye area with Ultrasun's SPF30+ Eye Cream; a lightweight, hydrating formula that works to shield from photo-ageing and harmful UVA and UVB rays.
Fortified with Biophytex® and antioxidants, the fas-absorbing cream delivers high protection to the thinnest and most sensitive area of the face, whilst minimising the appearance of dark circles and fine lines to reveal a smoother, brighter and more refined eye contour.
name: SPF30+ Eye Cream (15ml)

product_description:
Tackle problematic, breakout-prone skin on-the-spot with the ESPADA™ Acne-Clearing Pen from Swedish beauty brand FOREO; a pioneering, at-home treatment that combines their renowned T-Sonic™ pulsations with powerful blue light technology to deliver unparalleled results.
The intelligent device utilises 415NM of blue light LEDs that penetrate deep below the surface layer of skin, clinically proven to kill acne-causing bacteria at the source without causing pain or discomfort, with targeted light application ensuring surgical-like precision to treat even the smallest blemish right from when it emerges for instant action.
The gentle T-Sonic™ pulsations activate upon contact with skin, working to diffuse the light into pores to enhance efficiency while stimulating micro-circulation to promote skin renewal and repair. With continued use, the overall complexion appears healthier looking and more refined with a noticeable decrease in breakouts.  
Ergonomically designed with the head coated in ultra-hygienic, 100% waterproof silicone, ESPADA™ prevents the spread of acne-causing bacteria and feels smooth to touch for optimum comfort even on sensitive skin, with one charge providing up to 60 2-minute treatments. With no need to replace cartridges, it provides a long-term investment for visibly clearer skin.
name: ESPADA Acne-Clearing Pen - Magenta

product_description:
Counteract the signs of ageing with the Time Retreat Regenerative Night Cream from Eve Lom. Harnessing regenerative technologies and age-defying actives, the rich anti-ageing treatment works overnight while you sleep to deliver drastic results.  
Everyday, skin is subject to harsh environmental factors, pollutants and UV exposure that result in the production of stress hormone Cortisol, which effectively slows down cell reproduction and leads to premature ageing.
Widely used within Ayurvedic medicine, Wild Indigo Seed extract works to combat Cortisol and promote the release of beta-Endorphins. Combined here with Liposome Encapsulated Retinol, the advanced face cream boosts cell turn over and stimulates repair while your skin is at its most receptive to treatment.
Fortified with a wrinkle-smoothing Tripeptide and moisture-rich Shea Butter, the supercharged formula leaves skin feeling replenished and smooth with an enhanced protective barrier function and a visible reduction in wrinkles. Awaken to a more even and balanced complexion with a revitalised, healthy looking radiance.
name: Lom Time Retreat Regenerative Night Cream 50ml

product_description: Specially formulated to soothe and refresh tired or irritated eyes, Dr. Hauschka Eye Revive will give your eyes some serious pampering. Formulated with extracts of eyebright, anthyllis and chamomile to calm the skin, it also contains fennel extract to visibly reduce puffiness. Suitable for all skin types, the treatment also helps to relieve itching to leave your delicate eye area looking vibrant and feeling comfortable. - L.M.
name: Hauschka Eye Revive (10 x 5ml)

product_description:
Soften and hydrate tired, weary-looking eyes with the Golden Snail Intensive Essence Gel Eye Patch from Korean skincare brand, Skin79.
Each golden, petal-shaped eye patch is infused with a patented complex, comprising Plant Extracts, Gold and regenerative Golden Snail Filtrate to expertly soften, replenish and moisturise delicate under eye skin. Helping to preserve moisture and smoothen skin, its blend of Niacin and Irish Moss boost moisture levels for long-lasting hydration, and its cocktail of oriental ingredients have a deeply nourishing effect. The gel masks allow for better penetration of active ingredients into skin, so moisture, nutrients and elasticity are restored.
name: Golden Snail Intensive Essence Gel Eye Patch

product_description:
Catering for all skin types, Caudalie's Gentle Cleansing Milk promises to leave your complexion refreshed and revitalised without over-drying or tightness.
Infused with Grape Seed Oil, Oat Extract and Organic Shea Butter, the luxurious cleanser expertly dissolves dirt, make-up and impurities, whilst soothing and nourishing the face and eye area. Its blend of Sweet Almond and Jojoba Seed Oils moisturises and softens skin for long-lasting comfort.
name: Gentle Cleansing Milk Duo 200ml (Worth £30)

product_description:
Are your peepers partied out? Kick back and let your eyes enjoy the exotic cocktail of hibiscus flower, beech tree, olive leaf and cucumber extracts found within Alpha H’s Absolute Eye Complex. It’s all you need to tighten, firm and brighten the delicate eye area. After all, don’t they deserve it?
For ageless looking eyes, this cooling and soothing gel features the latest in cosmetic technology for an instant pick-me-up for tired eyes. Containing hibiscus flower acids which gently resurface the skin, minimising fine lines and wrinkles. Cucumber extracts refresh and tighten whilst peptides reduce sagging and puffiness.
Directions for use:
name: Absolute Eye Complex (15ml)

product_description: Restore your eye's youthful glow with this Dr. Brandt Glow by Dr. Brandt Revitalizing Retinol Eye Cream. Formulated to instantly illuminate and diffuse light, this eye cream is ideal for softening the look of fine lines and wrinkles, making your skin softer and smoother. It also works to improve circulation around the eye area, which in turn counteracts the effects of stress and tiredness and keeps any inflammation or redness in the area to a minimum. - E.D
name: Brandt Glow by Dr. Brandt Revitalizing Retinol Eye Cream

product_description:
The 'Resurfacing Radiance Collection' from Elemis includes three of the brand's skincare products that promise to rejuvenate, brighten and perfect your complexion. Achieve silky soft skin and reignite a healthy-looking glow. E.N.
Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Wash (200ml)
Purify your complexion with this skin-refining face wash. Infused with patented Tri-Enzyme technology, the award-winning cleanser resurfaces and smoothens skin by exfoliating dead cells and dullness, whilst Brazilian Babassu oil replenishes moisture so you can experience a silky soft, brighter complexion. Antioxidant Moringa oil shields from environmental damage and white truffle soothes skin to reveal a revitalised, radiant appearance.
Soothing Apricot Toner (200ml)
Suitable for sensitive and delicate skin, this alcohol-free toner soothes and calms skin to deliver a brighter, youthful complexion. Hy2 - A deeply moisturising property that restores and retains hydration, helping to reduce gradual moisture loss. Boosting collagen, this ingredient also plumps, tightens and firms skin for a younger complexion.
Ao2 - A reparative and protective ingredient that enhances the skin's natural defences whilst reducing free radical production. Protects against UV rays.
Po2 - A protective ingredient which defends against pollutants. Works to enhance the skin's natural purification process whilst preserving antioxidants and preventing cell death. The activation of keratinocyte growth reinforces the cutaneous barrier.
Re3 - With anti-inflammatory and antibacterial action, this deeply reparative ingredient boosts cellular renewal and helps rebuild injured tissue.
Dx3 - Stimulating natural detoxification, Dx3 works to repair proteins and eliminate toxins for energised skin that glows.
Ec3 - Providing a variety of skin beneficial results, this mix of ingredients helps to reveal overall radiant skin. Skin cell renewal is promoted, moisture is retained and antioxidant properties help to protect.

product_description:
Lancer Skincare's The Method: Travel Bag is a three step skincare routine with additional eye and body treats to achieve beautifully restored, youthful looking skin. Combining a range of highly coveted, travel-sized products, the set is your answer to perfect skin, wherever you are. Housed in a handy travel bag.
STEP 1: The Method: Polish (Travel Size 28g)
A gentle treatment formulated to visibly improve skin tone and texture. Pure minerals are combined with magnesium oxide and sodium bicarbonate crystals to exfoliate the skin's surface, combating dullness, removing the build-up of debris for a refreshed, youthful-looking complexion. Fortified with pumpkin and pomegranate extracts, the anti-ageing polish works to break down dead skin cells, whilst brown sea algae replenishes moisture to reveal a visibly smooth, supple complexion and healthy glow.
STEP 2: The Method: Cleanse (Travel Size 60ml)
A gentle, foaming cleanser formulated to eliminate debris and daily impurities, preparing skin for the application of further skincare products. Its rice amino acid complex is combined with hydrating ingredients to reveal a soft, smooth looking complexion and improved skin tone, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Sodium PCA retains moisture to restore a healthy-looking glow.
STEP 3: The Method: Nourish (Travel Size 15ml):
Deeply hydrating, the moisturisre helps skin retain moisture for a healthy, youthful glow. A unique biopeptide decreases the appearance of wrinkles and inspires smooth, supple looking skin. Expect nourished skin with renewed radiance.
Eye Contour Lifting Cream (Deluxe Sample 5ml)
An ultra-rich eye cream infused with MDCP Complex and a blend of sheer light diffusers that work to visibly diminish the look of dark circles, fine lines and puffiness around the eyes. Fortified with expert technology, including caffeine-based agents, the targeted eye cream helps skin appear firmer and increases hydration by providing a moisture barrier. Skin around the eyes looks and feels firmer and younger with diminished dark circles. Fine lines and crow's feet appear to disappear, and eyes feel treated.
The Method: Body Polish (Travel Size 60g)
Working to improve skin tone and texture, pure quartz exfoliating crystals and salicylic acid help eliminate dead, dull skin cells, whilst a blend of Kigelia fruit extract and marula oil rejuvenate and soften. Fortified with zeolite; a natural mineral that creates a pleasant warming sensation on contact with the body, the polish leaves skin feeling smooth, supple and fresh with a healthy-looking glow.
The Method: Body Cleanse (Travel Size 60ml)
Formulated with glycolic and salicylic acids to help improve skin tone and texture, the gel cleanser works to reduce the appearance of dark spots and discolourations for a radiant, younger-looking glow. Enriched with watermelon seed oil and Kigelia fruit extract, the foaming formula eliminates impurities and dull skin cells without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness, whilst keeping skin hydrated and maintaining moisture levels. Skin feels smoother, softer and purified.
The Method: Body Nourish (Travel Size 60ml)
An innovative treatment powered by 10% glycolic acid to help improve skin texture, tone and discolourations, whilst minimising signs of ageing. Fortified with HYLAPLEX™, a hyaluronic acid-based compound that works to plump fine lines, the nourishing treatment is packed with African moisturising agents, including marula oil, kigelia fruit extract and shea butter to hydrate and maintain the skin's moisture level. Skin is softer, smoother and younger-looking.

Hy3 - A moisturising property that restores and retains hydration. Boosting collagen, this ingredient also plumps, tightens and firms skin for a younger complexion.
Ao3 - Reparative and protective, this antioxidant rich blend protects against free radical and UV ray harm whilst repairing present damage in the skin.

Antioxidant properties prevent from skin ageing, while collagen stimulation helps to plump and firm for youthful looking skin.
Ri3 - Targeting fine lines and wrinkles, it improves firmness and strengthens skin's structure, as well as preventing from further signs of ageing.
Dx3 -  Detoxifying, it helps to remove harmful toxins while providing a protective shield to prevent others from entering. Repairing damaged proteins and boosting skin cell energy, it reveals a radiant complexion.
Ec3 - Providing a variety of skin beneficial results, this mix of ingredients helps to reveal overall radiant skin. Skin cell renewal is promoted, moisture is retained and antioxidant properties help to protect.
Cn3 - Targeting pigmentation, visible capillaries and puffiness, it soothes the eye area to reduce the signs of fatigue and ageing.
Pc3 - Acting as a 'drain' for puffy eyes, it increases skin elasticity and relieves puffiness. The skin around the eye is smoothed with an even tone.

What is Moderate Acne?
Numerous and/or relatively frequent inflamed pimples that cover larger areas of the face and forehead, and are generally more persistent. Also for those who have suffered for 2 or more years with Mild Acne
About the Brand:
AcnEase® is a most effective Botanical Therapeutic® that treats existing acne and prevents new cysts and pimples from forming.  In addition, with recommended use, the ingredients in AcnEase® will make your skin clearer and healthier with less blackheads, whiteheads and redness.
AcnEase® works to restore the natural internal balance that is disrupted by endocrine changes, environmental factors, some medications, mental tension, stress and diet.  Acne is viewed as an external manifestation of an internal disorder. AcnEase® is unique in that it doesn’t simply treat the external symptoms of the disease, but it addresses the underlying causes of Acne and other skin related problems such as Rosacea from the inside.
AcnEase is perfect for those who suffer from: Adolescent Acne, Hormonal Acne, Menopausal Acne (women), Chronic Acne, Acne aggravated by spicy and greasy food, smoking, stress, consumption of alcohol or other medicines, Facial and Body Acne, Cystic Acne.

Infused with Tea Tree Extract and an Omega-rich blend of Organic Evening Primrose, Sweet Almond and Avocado Oils, the luxurious cleanser gently eliminates dead skin cells and impurities without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Experience a smooth, supple and rebalanced complexion with renewed radiance.

product_description:
Reignite a radiant glow with Pestle & Mortar's Renew Gel Cleanser; a lightweight, refreshing formula that promises to purify and brighten your complexion.
Harnessing the powers of Papaya and Mango Enzymes, the luxurious cleanser expertly eliminates dirt and impurities, whilst helping to tighten visible pores and minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Its dose of Meadowfoam Seed Oil decongests and clarifies to leave skin smooth, hydrated and illuminated with improved tone and texture.

product_description: Wake up and reenergise your eyes with the First Aid Beauty Detox Eye Roller. Perfect for those suffering with under-eye puffiness, dark circles and hectic schedules, this innovative formula with caffeine, hyaluronic and advanced peptides works to constrict the fine blood vessels that cause dark circles whilst increasing collagen production to smooth out ageing fine lines. Witch hazel ensures the delicate under-eye area stays soothed and the unique roller ball provides a cool sensation whilst gently 'rolling out' baggy looking skin. Expect brighter, more awake eyes in minutes. - K.N.

product_description:
Dr. Hauschka Lip Balm intensively hydrates and soothes dry, chapped lips. Rich and luxurious, the balm is enriched with moisturising jojoba and wheat germ oils and fortifying silk and anthyllis to strengthen the delicate skin on your lips. With calendula and St. John's wort extract to encourage renewal, the balm also smooths fine lines and wrinkles whilst enhancing your lips with a translucent shine. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Apply to your lips as often as needed.
name: Hauschka Lip Balm 4.5ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to the multi-tasking benefits of Garnier Pure Active 3-in-1 Wash, Scrub, Mask, an all-in-one formula designed to cleanse, exfoliate and mattify the skin.
With triple functionality, the antibacterial emulsion works as an effective cleanser, utilising mineral zinc to rid skin of impurities whilst protecting from future breakouts, and performs excellently as a scrub with added pumice, a natural exfoliant that sloughs away dead skin cells and decongests clogged pores. As a mask, the formula's blend of white clay delivers smoothing, absorbent properties, mattifying the skin to reduce shine and leave the complexion perfectly balanced. - K.N.

product_description:
Reveal glowing skin with the Mizon Good Night White Sleeping Mask; a brightening, overnight face mask that works to nourish skin, while offering a relaxing Lavender fragrance that promotes a good night’s sleep.
Utilising a potent blend of Niacinamide, Mulberry root extract and Pantethine, the creamy mask works to block melanin and encourage a visibly bright, even and radiant complexion. Placental Protein, Natto Gum and Sclerotium Gum work in synergy to deliver a protective veil to the face, which shields skin from environmental damage and prevents sensitivity.
Working whilst you sleep, the effortless mask leaves skin comfortably hydrated and ultra-bright.

product_description:
Wake up with a fresh, radiant complexion with the Dr. Hauschka Night Serum, a revitalising, oil-free night treatment that works to balance the skin whilst supporting its natural, nightly regeneration process.
Enriched with apple fruit hydrosol and apple blossom extract, the fragrant formula stimulates your skin's renewal process, supporting its natural rhythms whilst toning and refreshing for a brighter complexion come morning. Its oil free blend allows skin to breathe freely, and added witch hazel helps all skin types achieve a balanced, well-toned finish. - K.N.

product_description: Enjoy the sun with maximum protection from Institut Esthederm No Sun Lotion. The formula offers extremely high sun protection, with 100% mineral origin. Ideal for prolonged sun exposure and those unable to go into the sun due to scar tissue, medication or post cosmetic skin treatments.
name: Esthederm No Sun Lotion 50ml

product_description: Perfect for those with oily/combination or problematic skin, the First Aid Beauty Skin Rescue Deep Cleanser works to cleanse and detoxify skin to reveal a clear complexion with visibly reduced pores. Combining red clay with rosemary leaf oil and powerful botanical antioxidants, the rescue formula helps prevent breakouts by drawing out skin's toxins, removing excess oils and unclogging pores for a balanced and invigorated appearance. Deeply cleansing, the gel will effectively remove grime and makeup whilst reducing sebum production for a clean and clear complexion. - K.N.

product_description:
This ultra mild, hypo-allergenic, cooling Elemis Soothing Chamomile Cleansing Milk contains harmonising extracts of German chamomile, lethicin, vitamins E& F to calm and desensitise even the most sensitive skin.
This treatment cleanser is egg yolk based and infused with active ingredients to soothe your delicate, hormonal and sensitive skin.  This Soothing Chamomile Cleanser has a light non-sticky texture and will treat and nourish your skin while cleansing.
Directions of use:
name: Soothing Chamomile Cleanser (200ml)

product_description:
Antipodes Rejoice Light Facial Moisturiser (60ml) is an antibacterial, lightweight daily moisturiser that helps to keep skin clear alongside hydrating without leaving a greasy residue.
Manuka honey cleans up blemishes and prevents future ones for clearer skin, whilst avocado oil encourages the production of collagen to smooth our fine lines and reveal firmer skin. Leaving a delicious vanilla pod and sweet almond scent behind, the organic Rejoice moisturiser feels like a daily treat as well as a necessity. - K.R

product_description: Moisturise, even skin tone and banish blemishes with the Shiseido IBUKI Refining Moisturiser (75ml). The multifunctional formula absorbs quickly, softening skin whilst working to correct the appearance of visible pores, breakouts, and skin texture. Soft red and gold particles in the moisturiser produce a radiant, healthy glow on the complexion. - K.R

product_description:
Revitalise your eyes with Omorovicza Reviving Eye Cream. Blended with natural ingredients derived from arnica, the cream works to reduce puffiness around the eyes and banish dark circles to soothe delicate skin.
Cucumber extract soothes and refreshes the eye contour whilst hazelnut peptide firms and lifts your eye areas to minimise the appearance of fine line and wrinkles. -SA
Directions for use:
Dab gently around the eye area after cleansing.

product_description:
Experience optimum standards of facial rejuvenation with the NuFACE Gel Primer 24K Gold Complex in Firm. The lightweight primer is an essential first step to using the NuFACE device.
Arriving with an integrated brush applicator, the primer is effortlessly to apply and allows the NuFACE device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. The anti-ageing 24K gold complex boasts multiple firming ingredients and Alpha Lipoic Acid, which visibly tightens and tones the skin, creating a younger looking complexion. The formula can be left on all day or washed away after use of the device.
name: Gel Primer 24K Gold Complex - Firm

product_description: Elemis Deep Cleanse Facial Wash is infused with an effective blend of oak bark, spearmint and peppermint to rejuvenate and awaken skin, whilst removing excess oil, dirt and impurities. Milk protein delivers essential nutrients and promotes healthy skin for a restored, brighter complexion and lifts facial hair to allow a closer shave. With a lightweight gel formulation, the daily face wash penetrates skin to leave you feeling refreshed all day long and shields from environmental aggressors. E.N.

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Cream utilises advanced anti-ageing biotechnology to leave skin looking visibly younger, with the appearance of fine lines and deep-set wrinkles smoothed away.
The pioneering formula is the first of its kind to combine Alguronic Acid, a patented anti-ageing ingredient, with a new, sustainably sourced Microalgae Oil, a patent-pending, plant-based collagen, which work in synergy to enhance skin resilience and elasticity levels.
Even the most fragile skin appears strengthened and replenished, with the look of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced. Facial contours are nourished and revitalised, with your complexion left feeling toned, firmer and tighter. Suitable for daily use, the rich, luxurious face cream effectively reverses the impact of time on skin to impart an age-defying radiance.
name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Cream 60ml

product_description:
Treat your skin to MÁDARA Become Organic Starter Set, a trio of kind-to-skin formulas that work to cleanse, hydrate and renew the appearance of your complexion.
Purifying Foam Face Wash (150ml Full Size):
A rich cleanser that works to lift away makeup and impurities to leave the complexion clean and purified. Infused with Northern Yarrow Extract, the cleansing foam delicately eliminates dirt and grime from skin, removing makeup whilst regulating oily areas and hydrating dry patches. After use, skin will feel soft and refreshed. Gentle enough for use around the eyes. Suitable for all skin types.
Deep Moisture Fluid (20ml):
An intensely hydrating day cream that moisturises and protects your complexion. Enriched with extracts of Northern Plantain and Sea-buckthorn to maintain optimal moisture levels, the cream delivers a veil of comfort onto skin, alleviating the discomfort of tightness whilst providing 24 hour hydration. Its nourishing and protective properties leave skin looking soft and supple. Suitable for dry and very dry skin.
Regenerating Night Cream (20ml):
A rich formula that works while you sleep to promote softer, supple looking skin. Infused with host of antioxidants and natural plant essences, the night cream enhances the skin's natural ability to repair itself whilst combatting the onslaught of environmental aggressors. Melting effortlessly into skin, the rejuvenating cream will leave skin looking soft and youthful come morning. Suitable for all skin types.

product_description:
This Creme  Prodigieuse Night from Nuxe is an innovative re-energising night cream  that's effective on all skin types. Working to fight against damage  caused by daily stress, which prevents ageing, this cream improves the  skin's radiance and texture.
Gently assisting with cellular  renewal, this cream works overnight to transform the skin and leave you  feeling fresh in the morning
name: Creme Prodigieuse Night All Skin Type

product_description:
Rediscover a younger, firmer-looking complexion with the NuFACE Trinity Facial Toning Device. Combining a facial toning device with a skin-prepping primer, the duo will contribute to a smoother, lifted and younger-looking complexion with regular use.
Trinity Facial Toning Device
An award-winning microcurrent treatment packed into an innovatively-designed device with interchangeable treatment attachments. Designed to combat visible signs of ageing, the device stimulates both the large surface areas and small contours of the face, creating similar results to a facelift, however the treatment is pain free and can take only 5 minutes. Mircrocurrent devices mimic the natural current of the body, which slows as we age. Going deeper than the surface, the device visibly tones the facial muscles, improving the contour, evening the appearance of skin tone and visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles. Safe and effective for all skin types, it leaves the complexion looking youthful and visibly supple.
Gel Primer (59ml)
Prepare for the NuFACE Trinity device with the Gel Primer. The lightweight formula allows for the device to glide across the skin easily, whilst ensuring maximum microcurrent conductivity for optimum results. Suitable for all skin types, the formula is water-based and extremely easy to remove.

product_description:
Experience unrivalled hydration with Time Bomb's Power Ball Intensive Moisturiser, an exceptional moisturising formula that works to replenish critical water and counteract acute to chronic dehydration.
Water is crucial for skin's health; it makes up 64% of skin's cell structure and ensures skin stays healthy, plump and well-functioning. Promoting intense hydration, the moisturiser saturates skin with 21 naturally hydrating agents and expertly delivers and retains essential water to leave the complexion soft, smooth and moist. Infused with Ectoin (a moisture holding protein that enables organisms to thrive in harsh desert environments), Bio-protectant Trehalose, Hyaluronic Acid and an Aqua Cell Complex (Lentil, Apple and Watermelon extracts), the formula helps preserve skin's internal fluidity for improved suppleness and elasticity, and refills essential moisture reserves to leave your complexion softer, smoother and plumper.

product_description: Pai Rice Plant & Rosemary BioAffinity Toner is full of natural ingredients, formulated to rebalance your skin and give it a healthy, hydrated and smoother tone. Used regularly, the BioAffinity Toner calms your skin, helping its tone improve and softening its texture. The toner uses an innovative combination of hydro-soluble compounds. These plant-based compounds contain amino acids, vitamins and mineral elements. Pai does not use alcohol in its range of toners, which can remove natural oils from the face. Instead, its plant-based formula centres on rice plant extracts, which benefits all skin types with its combination of calcium, sodium, magnesium and potassium.
name: Rice Plant & Rosemary BioAffinity Toner 50ml

product_description: Enjoy the sun whilst visibly brightening and evening skin tone with Institut Esthederm Photo Reverse Lotion. The treatment aims to prevent the appearance of brown spots and visibly reduce the appearance of pre-existing spots. Featuring high UVA/UVB protection, the cream protects hyper-pigmented skin against the visible signs of photo-ageing and the appearance of new pigmentation.

Enhanced with vitamin C, Perricone MD Citrus Facial Cleanser thoroughly cleanses your skin and helps to prevent the appearance of redness and blotchiness that are normally caused by irritation. Your skin will feel balanced and crystal clean.

This cleanser helps to provide a firmer more youthful appearance to your skin and will leave it feeling refreshed and clean without stripping it of its natural oils.
Directions of use:
name: MD Citrus Facial Cleanser (177ml)

Targeting areas of shine and imbalance, the day cream will leave skin feeling fresh, shine free and intensely moisturised.
Consumer Trial Results:
87% Agreed that it left skin feeling soft and smooth*
76% Stated that it left skin feeling fresh and revitalised*

Heat the pillow, lie back and relax as it soothes tense facial muscles and encourages blood circulation to relieve eye strain, irritation, headaches, sinus pressure and stress. Directions of use:

Independent laboratory testing confirmed that when used as part of a 4 step regime for 4 weeks 87% of women saw an improvement in skin luminance while 82% saw an improvement in skin texture and evenness.

Alchemilla (Quercetin), Apple (Quercetin), Basil (Terpens, Vitamin K), Maté (Caffeine, Proanthocyanidins, Quercetin), Jojoba.

Dermatological tests shown that after 28 days of use depth of wrinkles reduced by 29%* and skin moisture levels increased by 39%**.
*Measurement of depth of wrinkles with PRIMOS, test with 20 subjects between 41 – 65 years of age, application of the product twice daily for 28 days.
**Measurement of skin moisture with a corneometer, test with 23 subjects between 41 – 70 years of age, 30 minutes after application.

Reduces signs of skin fatigue and premature ageing by attacking the glycotoxins that build up when you don't get enough sleep.

product_description:
Help balance your complexion with the Splendieuse Intensive Anti Dark Spot Serum from NUXE, a potent formula enriched with hyaluronic acid to moisturise skin whilst unifying tone and diminishing the appearance of dark spots and pigmentation.
Quickly absorbing into the skin, the serum's combination of precious flower molecules and prickly pear gently exfoliate, boosting cell renewal to inspire a radiant, luminous complexion whilst actively reducing the size and pigment of dark spots on the skin. Not only does it reduce the appearance of current skin imperfections, it also prevents the appearance of new dark spots. Skin will look bright and radiant with a more even tone. - K.N.

product_description:
The ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Foaming Cleanser gently purifies skin without stripping away essential moisture to leave your complexion feeling refreshed and comfortable, with additional anti-ageing benefits.
Developed through extensive biotechnological research, the mild formula dissolves daily dirt and makeup, with patented marine-sourced extracts of Alguronic Acid and Microalgae Oil working in tandem to infuse skin with Oleic Acid, Phytosterols, Tocopherols and Tocotrienols that deliver intensified hydration and nutrients.
As a result, the look of fine lines and wrinkles is visibly reduced, with skin appearing smoother, softened and brightened. Mild enough for daily use and can be used in conjunction with the ALGENIST Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Melting Cleanser for a deep, double cleanse.
name: Genius Ultimate Anti-Ageing Foaming Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
Treat your dull, lack-lustre complexion to the ALGENIST Algae Brightening Mask; a detoxifying, radiance-reviving formula that works to improve skin tone and texture as it cleanses and hydrates.
Harnessing the powers of nutrient-rich Algae and Sea Kelp, the revitalising treatment expertly exfoliates and polishes skin, whilst helping to combat uneven tone and enlarged pores for a smoother, more refined appearance and a fresh, dewy glow.
Alguronic Acid, the brand's patented, powerful compound, regenerates and shields skin; it absorbs quickly and creates a protective veil that defends against environmental aggressors and provides anti-ageing benefits to minimise the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Expect a bright, youthful-looking complexion with a pleasant, rejuvenating scent.
name: Algae Brightening Mask 60ml

product_description:
Polish the complexion with the Polaar Arctic Cotton Gentle Scrub; a gentle yet effective exfoliator that offers dual-action benefits.
The soft texture provides peeling and polishing action that sloughs away dead skin cells and leaves the complexion refreshed. Expect improved skin that is cleansed and healthy looking.

product_description:
Deeply cleanse skin with the Face Buff from Jack Black, a brand who create products that you can trust to perform and work as hard as you do. Its lightweight formula with eco-friendly exfoliating beads penetrates skin to remove dirt, excess oil and dead skin cells, revealing a smoother, refreshed complexion.
Enriched with vitamin C and licorice extract, the face scrub reduces signs of ageing and allantoin softens and hydrates skin. Prepares for shaving by preventing ingrown hairs, burns and irritation and lifts facial hair to allow a closer shave, whilst menthol cools and soothes skin. E.N.

product_description:
L’Oreal Revitalift Total Night Cream has been devised with the knowledge that a greater rate of skin renewal occurs in the epidermis overnight, improving a radiance and brightness.
L’Oreal Revitalift Total Night Cream has been enriched with Criste marine extract that increases the skins natural cell renewal, providing 24 hour hydration. Experience and advanced wrinkles can need special attention and this lotion provides round the clock relief.
Directions of use:
name: Paris Dermo Expertise Revitalift Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Night Cream (50ml)

product_description:
The Menage Performance Pack provides practical anti-ageing skincare for men. The pack contains four coveted Menage invisible skincare products to help revitalise, hydrate and protect skin. Ideal as a starter kit to find new skincare essentials or even to take travelling.
Deep Pore Cleansing Face Scrub (20ml): The natural volcanic scrub revitalises and brightens the face, as well as giving it a smoother appearance. The low lather micro foam helps to thoroughly hydrates skin.
Hydrating Age Defence Gel (15ml): The ultra-light gel absorbs into the skin instantly, creating a fresh feeling and long lasting matte-look hydration. The powerful antioxidant-packed formula reduces visible signs of ageing by combating free radicals.
Anti-Ageing Moisturiser SPF15 (15ml): The fast absorbing moisturiser provides invisible hydration, creating a matte-look for everyday use. The treatment also combines 5* UVA protection to prevent skin ageing and Vitamin A’s including skin-repairing retinoid molecules, leaving skin nourished and smooth looking.
Daily Hand Repair (25ml): The non-greasy hand repair cream instantly absorbs to help rehydrate and visibly repair damaged skin, leaving hands ready to carry on working.

product_description:
Revive your complexion with The Jojoba Company Skin Refining and Brightening Face Mask, a hydrating mask that works to visibly brighten the look of skin.
Formulated on a base of Ivory Clay, the face mask utilises 100% natural Australian Jojoba that mimics the skin's natural oils, absorbing below the surface to deliver vitamins and antioxidants deep down. Its cocktail of Bearberry and Vitamin A repair and boost radiance, helping to brighten the complexion whilst diminishing the look of age spots and pigmentation. Skin is left with a smooth and flawless appearance.

product_description: Accentuate the skin with a subtle yet enticing aroma whilst deeply hydrating with the Crabtree & Evelyn body lotion. Containing extracts of fresh verbena and soothing lavender, in addition to lemon for a zesty scent, this luxurious moisturiser contains glycerine, panthenol and allantoin to condition and nourish. Suitable for all skin types. K.D.

product_description:
Su-Man's Essential Discovery Collection combines a trio of skincare products to leave your complexion feeling fresh, supple and renewed. Infused with beneficial and ingredients, the cleansing gel, exfoliator and serum work in synergy to promote brighter, softer, younger-looking skin.
Purifying Cleansing Gel (40ml):
An award-winning oil and water-based cleanser that performs a deep yet gentle cleanse without upsetting skin’s natural balance. Lifting away all signs of makeup and impurities (including waterproof mascara), the residue-free face cleanser combines Wintergreen, Dragon’s Blood extract and Rosehip Oil to purify, nourish and reinforce the skin's natural barrier; enhancing protection against environmental factors. Its deep yet delicate cleansing action cleans congested pores and replenishes the skin, leaving it feeling fresh, soft and supple.
Exfoliating Facial Polish (40ml):
An oil-based exfoliator that works to reveal brighter, smoother, younger-looking skin. Infused with a host of brightening and antioxidant ingredients, including Camu Camu, White Lilly and Dragon’s Blood extract, the facial polish gently buffs away dead skin cells with caffeine-rich Coffee Grains; the particles delicately resurface skin and comfort inflammation for instant revitalisation. Leaving the complexion feeling smooth, refreshed and invigorated, the exfoliator also reinforces the skin's natural barrier, minimises the appearance of pores and promotes firmer, supple-looking skin.
Velvet Skin Brightening Serum (15ml):
An anti-ageing elixir that works to brighten, comfort and soften your complexion. Utilising a signature blend of Antioxidants, Hyaluronic and Traexamic Acids, Omegas, Ceramides and Dragon's Blood extract, the velvety soft essence expertly invigorates your skin whilst reinforcing its natural barrier; its brightening and anti-ageing properties help diminish the look of dark spots whilst smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
name: Essential Discovery Collection

product_description:
Comfort, smooth and plump the appearance of your lips with the Sarah Chapman Lip Enhancer, an innovative, two-step treatment that targets signs of ageing whilst moisturising and enhancing your pout.
The double-ended, anti-ageing lip formula combines a 'Power Base' with a 'Tint Balm'; the pair work in synergy to hydrate and nourish whilst redefining the lip contour for a plumped-up, youthful appearance.
The First Step (Power Base 6ml):
This preps and treats your lips with its non-greasy, quick-absorbing formula. Delivering intense hydration, the youth-boosting treatment is enriched with high performance actives Neodermyl® (a youth boosting lip filler), Vitamin A and Hyaluronic Acid filling spheres to visibly plump out fine lines whilst softening, nourishing and fighting irritation and inflammation. Lips are smoothed and younger-looking.
The Second Step (Tint Balm 6ml):
This expertly moisturises and volumises to enhance the fullness of your lips. Its combination of Plumping Volulip™, Sym3D™ and intelligent adaptive colour tint enhance the natural colour of your lips whilst redefining the contour and boosting hydration. Enriched with a cocktail of high performance actives and Abyssinian Oil, Cocoa and Shea Butter to comfort and nourish.
Expect restored, healthy-looking lips with youthful volume and incredible moisture. Infused with the fragrance of Rose Otto.

product_description:
Regain youthful vitality with Bee Good Youth Enhancing Hydrate, Smooth and Prime Facial Serum, a potent anti-ageing concentrate dedicating to smoothing, replenishing and hydrating your skin.
Enriched with a host of natural, high performance ingredients, the serum expertly targets fine lines, wrinkles and uneven tone. Its antioxidant-rich formula combines collagen stimulating peptides with British Wildflower Honey and British Camelina Oil to improve elasticity, moisture and suppleness. Fine lines and wrinkles appear smoother. Skin is plump, radiant and intensely hydrated.

Polish the complexion with The Jojoba Company Jojoba Bead and Bamboo Facial Exfoliant; an effective facial exfoliator that is suitable for all skin types and gentle enough for sensitive skin.
Harnessing eco-friendly Bamboo and Jojoba beads, the formula thoroughly sloughs away dead skin cells from the surface of the face, leaving skin smooth and visibly radiant. The exfoliator is complete with a healthy dose of Australian Ivory Clay and Shea Butter, which combine to offer deep hydration and optimum nourishment.
Expect a revialised complexion.

Perfect for daily use, this lavish cream also boastsp ear and pink magnolia blended to give skin a silky smooth texture and a fruity, floral scent. Suitable for all skin types, it's free from parabens and mineral oil. K.D.

Diminish wrinkles and puffiness with Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Eye Cream. This light cream has been formulated specially for the delicate eye area and works to soothe tired and strained eyes whilst enlivening the skin and tissue around your eyes.
The graceful combination of biodynamic euphrasia and organic rosehip oil soothes the area around the eyes while the extract of sedum helps to reduce the signs of ageing. The natural rose extracts in Weleda Wild Rose Smoothing Eye Cream are well suited to maturing skin, and the intensive yet gentle action rejuvenates the skin and helps reduce the appearance of fine lines, leaving the skin supple and soft.
Directions for use:
name: Wild Rose Smoothing Eye Cream (10ml)

Formulated as a high performance, daily skin moisturiser, this skin treatment cream is the optimum solution for sensitivity, irritation, dryness and blemishes. Elemis Men SOS Survival Cream will regenerate and tone your skin.
It has a powerful formula of marine extracts, Lavender and Myrrh that instantly soothes problem areas and leaves your skin perfectly hydrated and comfortable. It’s ideal to use after sports and outdoor actives.
Directions for Use:

This amazingly effective Elemis Pro-Collagen Eye Renewal cream has taken over 3 years to develop. With a potent anti-ageing formula, your delicate eye area will look significantly younger, while feeling noticeably firmer and smoother.
This revolutionary Pro Collagen Eye Renewal cream from Elemis has a highly regenerative formula that captures the anti-ageing power. In just 28 days the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the delicate eye area was found to be visibly refined..
