product_description:
Featuring two treatments to tone and firm your face, the Rio Lift Plus will help your skin to maintain a youthful appearance. The faradic facial toning uses EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) which contracts and relaxes the muscles to lift and tighten, whilst increasing circulation and removing toxins to leave your complexion looking bright and refreshed.
Meanwhile, the Galavanic Infusion treatment uses small micro currents to carry vital ingredients needed for skin repair deep into your skin, whilst the lift gel patches contain positively charged collagen and retinol which help to target lines and wrinkles. - L.M.
The Faradic Treatment practised in beauty salons for over 40 years, offers gentle muscle toning to help tighten and tone sagging features in short 60 second treatments using EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation). EMS gently contracts and relaxes facial muscles to help tone, lift and tighten and the stimulation also increases local circulation, bringing more oxygen to the skin cells and removing toxins more rapidly.
There are four treatment programmes; Firming, Extended Firming, Tap Toning and Infusion. The first three programmes are faradic and the last, galvanic, with each programme offering a different benefit to your beauty regime.
The Galvanic Treatment uses small micro currents to carry the active ingredients for skin repair and rejuvenation deep into the skin, known as Galvanic Infusion or Iontophoresis, infusing collagen and retinol to help further combat the appearance of frown lines, crow’s feet and marionette lines. Your skin will feel instantly refreshed and rejuvenated.

Deep Sea Soil Hydra-Gel Masque (Black):
The Deep Sea masque is designed to nourish and aid skin in its natural repair process. A blend of Aloe Vera, Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid, alongside Deep Sea Soil provide intense nourishment and hydration for skin. Ideal for mature skin or skin damaged by environmental factors.

Collagen Hydra-Gel Masque (White):
The Collagen masque provides deep hydration to the skin. A combination of Collagen, Allantoin and Hyaluronic Acid allow the masque to boost the skins moisture levels, leaving skin thoroughly hydrated and nourished. This masque is best suited for particularly dry skin or for use in colder or dryer climates. Also ideal after exfoliation or use of a scrub.

Keeping skin hydrated and healthy, its dose of Aloe Vera ensures optimum moisture levels are maintained.

product_description: Replenish and nourish your complexion with the Facial Treatment Oil from Australian brand Sukin, who aim to deliver 'Skincare that doesn’t cost the earth™'. The 100% natural blend of antioxidant-rich argan oil, moisturising jojoba oil and hydrating rosehip oil softens skin and restores an even tone to leave you with a healthy-looking, radiant complexion. Infused with maracuja oil to deliver vitamin C for a brighter appearance, whilst vitamin E fights signs of ageing to reveal smooth and supple skin. E.N.
name: Facial Treatment Oil 25ml

product_description:
BAKEL stands for ethical, high quality skincare products. Cruelty free and vegan, the products are suitable for all skin types and clinically proven as well.
BAKEL’s star product, BAKELONLY Intensive Regenerating Serum, has convinced many around the world. Its prime anti-ageing ingredients deliver an intensive treatment over two months, after which wrinkles and fine lines diminish in depth and number. Helichrysum Italicum Flower Water soothes and protects from free radicals that can cause damage whilst Sodium Hyaluronate hydrates the skin intensely. The product provides further anti-ageing benefits with Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin for regeneration, Calcium Ketogluconate for toning, Radish Root Ferment Filtrate to protect the hydrolipid film and to impede moisture being lost as well as Emollients to provide important nutrients.
This serum makes your complexion look significantly more taut, toned and youthful - all backed by scientific and clinic testing. Your skin will regain its radiance, health and energy with just two treatment courses per year.
BAKELONLY is a long term anti-ageing solution for the reduction of wrinkles and the recovery of your skin’s youth. LB
Use: BAKELONLY Intensive Regenerating Serum consists of three vials each of 10ml for a treatment lasting 2 months. Use each vial in the space of 20  days. Apply it in the evening on perfectly cleaned skin on the face, around the eyes, eyelid area, neck and decolleté. Gently massage until completely absorbed. Follow up, if necessary, with the most appropriate BAKEL hydrating/nutrient treatment.
Suggestion: Two treatments per annum are recommended. For particularly lined skins, the use of a vial every other day in the evening between the two treatment cycles is recommended. BAKELONLY is absorbed completely and rapidly.
name: BAKELonly Intensive Regenerating Serum (3x10ml)

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the Ila-Spa Gold Cellular Age-Restore Face Toner; an ultra-hydrating spray that caters for all skin types.
Fortified with Orange Blossom Hydrolat (the purest form of Orange Blossom), the lightweight toner calms and soothes skin, whilst eliminating any remaining impurities after cleansing without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. The rejuvenating formula can be used throughout the day to boost tired skin or cool irritation.
name: Gold Cellular Age-Restore Face Toner 100ml

product_description:
Treat dry skin to the luxurious blend of baobab oil, mango seed butter and cupuacu butter found in the BAKEL Nutrifill Extra Nourishing Cream. Working to nourish and tone the skin, the cream features a number of activating ingredients including Superoxide Dismutase which fights against damage caused by free radicals therefore reducing the tell-tale signs of ageing. The BAKEL Nutrifill Extra Nourishing Cream is effective and works quickly to give your skin immediate comfort. A.B.
BAKEL utilise 100% natural active ingredients in all of their products, ensuring whatever touches your skin is good, natural and pure. With no perfumes, alcohol, artificial colours, preservatives or animal derivatives, every BAKEL treatment is dermatologically tested and boasts minimal allergy risks. Built upon a strong foundation of objective confirmed and scientifically proven formulas, BAKEL products are suitable for all skin types and fight against the main causes of skin-ageing.
name: Nutrifill Extra Nourishing Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Discover a three step routine with the ModelCo Hydro Glow Miracle Mask; an innovative sheet mask that arrives alongside a single use facial cleanser and a potent boosting serum. The three products are designed to work in synergy to deliver a complete regime that will transform the complexion. Suitable for all skin types.
The daily facial cleanser is infused with fine beads that effectively remove dead skin cells and impurities. After cleansing, the skin is prepared to absorb the most benefit from the Miracle Mask. The highly concentrated Boosting serum is enriched with Hyaluronic acid, which delivers hydration that replenishes dull and dehydrated skin.
The Hydro Glow Miracle Mask completes the regime and treats the skin to deep moisturisation, as well as an array of anti-ageing benefits. Enriched with Adenosine, the natural cellulose mask visibly plumps the complexion, to reveal smooth and youthful skin. The mask is complete with Chamomile Leaf extract, which has a soothing effect on the face.
Expect a refreshed complexion, with skin that is visibly bright, youthful and radiant.
name: Hydro Glow Miracle Mask

product_description:
Achieve a youthful-looking complexion with the bliss Bright Future Moisturiser set. The duo includes an age-fighting eye cream and peeling facial serum, presented in a bliss cosmetic bag. – E.W.
Anti-Aging Eye Cream
A reparative periorbital cream that works on the delicate eye area to treat dark circles, crow’s feet, under eye pillows and saggy skin. The cream is formulated with collagen and elastin protectors, which provide anti-oxidant action and support collagen maintenance, anti-crow’s feet peptides, which assist in activating skin repair, improving under eye firmness and diminishing the appearance of lines and wrinkles, and eye-brightening boosters, which encourage cell renewal to soothe, smooth and brighten the eye area.
Peeling Groovy Facial Serum
This facial serum is a dermatologist-developed, oil-free, non-irritating, amino acid exfoliating serum that smoothes fine lines, minimises pores and brightens skin discolourations. An even, exfoliated, glowing skin complexion is achieved.
name: Bright Future Moisturiser (Worth £104.50)

product_description:
Clarify and refresh your complexion with the ModelCo Double Sided Facial Wipes; a pack of easy-to-use towelettes that gently eliminate make-up and impurities without over-drying skin.
Infused with a soothing, antioxidant-rich blend of Aloe Vera, Cucumber Extract and Green Tea, the exfoliating face wipes expertly cleanse all skin types, whilst delivering intense moisture and hydration to reveal a smooth, radiant complexion. Ideal for home, post-workout or travelling.
name: Double Sided Facial Wipes

product_description:
Rescue dehydrated, dull and dry skin with the 2 Step Water Splash Mask from Korean beauty brand, Skin79. The innovative dual pouch contains a pure cotton sheet mask and a water tank section to maintain freshness and avoid the use of preservatives.
Fortified with Lava Sea Water, it delivers an intensive cooling sensation while infusing skin with essential nutrients, moisture and minerals. Helping to maintain optimum hydration levels, skin feels soothed, revitalised and replenished.
name: 2 Step Water Splash Mask (1 Piece)

product_description:
Expertly blended to promote well-being, the Aromatherapy Balancing Mist from Jurlique can be used on the face and body, or as a room spray to infuse a harmonising fragrance.
Enriched with specially selected Lavender, Rosewood, Patchouli, Clary Sage and Basil Pure Essential Oils, the rejuvenating spray instantly hydrates and rebalances skin, whilst delivering a luxurious scent to calm the mind and body.
name: Aromatherapy Balancing Mist (50ml)

product_description:
Target clogged and enlarged pores with the Black Clean Up Pore Tightening Serum from South Korean skincare brand Mizon.
Targeting the root cause of blackheads and enlarged pores, the lightweight serum combines a blend of active vegetable extracts with Salicylic and Glycolic Acids, working to gently exfoliate the surface layer of skin and eliminate toxins that cause congestion and build up.
A complex blend of Copper Tripeptide-1 and Cocoa extracts seek to restore elastin and collagen levels, effectively stretching skin tissue to leave skin feeling toned and clear. Excess oil production is regulated and your complexion is left looking refined, balanced and smooth.
name: Black Clean Up Pore Tightening Serum 50ml

product_description:
Tackle unruly blemishes with Mizon Acence Tea Tree Tock Blemish Spot Treatment, a clear spot treatment gel infused with 15% Tea Tree extract to calm, protect and eliminate imperfections. 
Fortified with antibacterial Tea Tree and a small dose of astringent Witch Hazel, the formula forms a protective layer over blemishes, sealing them in to shield against further damage whilst keeping angry redness at bay. It helps to reduce the appearance of pores and inflammation without drying out skin or causing further irritation. Sealing in the blemish creates the perfect healing environment, and its dose of Hyaluronic Acid ensures skin stays happy and moisturised. Ideal for acne-prone skin but suitable for all skin types.
name: Acence Tea Tree Tock Blemish Spot Treatment 15ml

product_description:
Reawaken weary eyes with FIT's Eyedrate+ Repair Serum, a high tech eye serum for men that works to energise and refresh tired eyes.
Infused with cooling cucumber extract, hydrating hyaluronic acid and acetyl tetrapeptide 5, the treatment gets to work on dark circles, under eye bags and fine lines, helping to reduce their appearance for eyes that look revived and awake. Utilising a unique oxygen delivery system 'OXY-FIT-10', the eye serum helps boost cell regeneration so skin around the delicate eye area feels more energised and refreshed. - K.N.
name: Eyedrate+ Repair Serum 20ml

product_description:
Transform tired, dull and ageing skin with the PRAI PRAIMORDIAL Collagen Restorative Serum; an innovative, lightweight serum to help repair and restore skin’s natural structure for a more resilient and youthful looking complexion.
Fortified with Iron Rose Crystal, Prai Oil and Glycerin, the treatment quickly absorbs into skin, delivering essential moisture and enhancing the lipid barrier to optimise natural hydration levels.
A complex blend of SYN®-COLL and NULASTIC™ SILK work to simulate cell regeneration and natural collagen production, while Vitamin C provides essential protection from free radicals and environmental aggressors. Skin feels firmer, stronger and revitalised with the look of fine lines and wrinkles reduced.
name: PRAIMORDIAL Collagen Restorative Serum 30ml

product_description:
Maintain a bright, youthful-looking complexion with the PRAI 24K GOLD Concentrate Retinol+; a luxurious, anti-ageing treatment that works to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Harnessing the powers of micro-encapsulated Retinol and 24K Gold, the fast-absorbing formula defends against environmental aggressors and free radical damage. NULASTIC™ Silk helps to strengthen the skin's structure, whilst the brand's precious PRAI Oil restores a soft, supple complexion with a firmer, smoother finish.
name: 24K GOLD Concentrate Retinol+ 30ml

product_description:
Improve the brightness and clarity of your complexion with Mizon Herbal Orange Blossom Ampoule Serum, a skin-brightening solution infused with highly concentrated essence of Orange Blossom to promote clear, radiant skin.
Revitalising and invigorating, the serum expertly brightens, firms and moisturises; its blend of Orange Blossom, Lily of the Valley and Edelweiss flower extracts restore vitality and suppleness, whilst Arnica and Gentiana calm, relieve and protect sensitive skin against external aggressors. Promoting a youthful complexion, it helps to prevent enlarged pores and blemishes, and utilises Panthenol and Trehalose to maintain skin's moisture.
After use, skin looks brighter, clarified and refined.
name: Herbal Orange Blossom Ampoule Serum 30ml

product_description:
Achieve a youthful neck and décolletage with the PRAI AGELESS Throat Ionic Serum. Combine the innovative serum with the AGELESS Throat Ionic Device, allowing them to work harmoniously to achieve optimum results.
Utilising Iontophoresis Technology, the device works to visibly firm, lift and smooth the skin at the throat. The serum is activated by the device and therefore produces better results. Enriched with the signature, precious PRAI oil, the formula smoothes the skin and delivers a supple appearance, as well as working to optimise skin collagen and achieve a visible firmer look. Expect the delicate skin to boast a transformed, youthful appearance.
name: AGELESS Throat Ionic Serum 30ml

product_description:
Suitable for all skin types, the Green People Anti-Ageing Facial Oil fights signs of ageing to maintain a youthful-looking complexion. Its blend of organic rosehip, avocado and almond oils combine with antioxidant vitamin E to soften, restore and revitalise skin, boosting elasticity and increasing suppleness.
Rich in omega fatty acids, the non-greasy oil supports the skin's structure, whilst minimising the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and delicately fragrancing with a luxurious scent of rose geranium and rosemary, without clogging pores. E.N.
name: People Anti-Ageing Facial Oil (30ml)

product_description:
This Balancing Day Lotion by Living Nature is perfect for combination, oil and acne prone skin and works to nourish your skin throughout the day. Formulated with Active Manuka Honey and Manuka Oil to combat irritation and infection on the skin whilst deeply hydrating.
Also containing an innovative mix of anti-oxidants that work to leave your skin super fresh and balanced, this Balancing Day Lotion is a light moisturiser that's fast absorbing and protects the skin from everyday wear. K.D.
Made with 100% natural ingredients, Living Nature has harnessed the purifying, healing and nourishing power of New Zealand's unique native botanicals including: Harakeke Flax Gel, Totarol, Manuka Honey, Manuka Oil, Hallo Clay and Kelp. Living nature has never and will never test on animals.
Living Nature contains absolutely no synthetic ingredients or endocrine disruptors. The full range is Certified Natural by BDIH Germany, and many of the products carry the Whole Foods Premium Body Care standard.
The products are independently verified for safety, plus they have one of the best ratings in the Skin Deep Cosmetic Safety Database.  Living Nature's policy: if there is any doubt about the safety of an ingredient, we don’t use it. 
Instead, they harness the incredible bioactive power of New Zealand’s native plants with their nourishing, purifying and healing skin benefits. Their highly effective energetic skincare is designed to enhance your skin’s own natural function. This efficacy is reviewed with ongoing independent testing.
name: Nature Balancing Day Lotion (50ml)

product_description:
Rediscover smoother, younger-looking skin with PRAI's AGELESS Frown Filler, an anti-ageing, wrinkle-smoothing formula that targets forehead wrinkles and horizontal and vertical lines between brows.

Infused with Marine Filling Spheres to reduce the appearance of surface lines and wrinkles, the frown filler temporarily minimises expression lines on the forehead, smoothing and plumping the look of skin whilst moisturising to promote a more youthful-looking complexion. It also helps to stop makeup settling into lines and wrinkles. Skin appears smoother, younger and hydrated.
name: AGELESS Frown Filler 10ml

product_description:
Refresh your face with the Aragospa Foaming Cleanser from Skin79. Formulated with micro bubbles, the formula thoroughly cleanses the skin without causing irritation. The foaming cleanser washes away dirt, makeup and impurities, resulting in a rejuvenated complexion.
Enriched with Jeju Aragonite thermal water, the lightweight wash delivers gentle moisture whilst cleaning, leaving the face clean, clear and hydrated.
name: Aragospa Foaming Cleanser 150ml

product_description:
This Purifying Cleanser from Living Nature is a lightweight, foaming cleanser that's designed to gently but efficiently remove impurities from the skin whilst balancing your natural moisture levels. Formulated with Manuka Honey which boasts antiseptic qualities and works to soothe the skin, this cleanser will leave your skin supple and crystal clear.
Also containing the gently cleansing Kumerahou, this Purifying Cleanser is ideal for combination, oily and acne prone skin. Working to give you noticeable results quickly, this cleanser is a must have addition to your skincare regime. K.D.
Directions of use:
Made with 100% natural ingredients, Living Nature has harnessed the purifying, healing and nourishing power of New Zealand's unique native botanicals including: Harakeke Flax Gel, Totarol, Manuka Honey, Manuka Oil, Hallo Clay and Kelp. Living nature has never and will never test on animals.
Living Nature contains absolutely no synthetic ingredients or endocrine disruptors. The full range is Certified Natural by BDIH Germany, and many of the products carry the Whole Foods Premium Body Care standard.
The products are independently verified for safety, plus they have one of the best ratings in the Skin Deep Cosmetic Safety Database.  Living Nature's policy: if there is any doubt about the safety of an ingredient, we don’t use it. 
Instead, they harness the incredible bioactive power of New Zealand’s native plants with their nourishing, purifying and healing skin benefits. Their highly effective energetic skincare is designed to enhance your skin’s own natural function. This efficacy is reviewed with ongoing independent testing.
name: Nature Purifying Cleanser (100ml)

product_description:
Experience innovative anti-ageing with skinChemists Advanced Wrinkle Killer Night Moisturiser, an age-defying formula fortified with Syn-Ake; a neuro peptide that mimics the effects of snake venom to reduce fine lines and wrinkles on the skin.
With a non-greasy texture, the night-time moisturiser works effortlessly to smooth and hydrate your complexion while you sleep, a time when your skin undergoes a natural regeneration process. Blending natural emollient coconut oil with anti-inflammatory vitamin E acetate, it enhances moisturise on the skin's surface and soothes dry, irritated skin. Designed to fight signs of ageing throughout the night, its dose of venom-replicating Syn-Ake restricts muscle contractions to counteract the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, so skin looks firmer and smooth.
Visible lines and wrinkles appear reduced and skin feels nourished, comforted and moisturised when you wake. - K.N.
name: Advanced Wrinkle Killer Night Moisturiser (50ml)

product_description:
The Method: Travel Set from Lancer Skincare works to exfoliate, cleanse and hydrate your complexion. Housed in a gift box, the collection combines four highly coveted travel-sized products that have been specially formulated using the brand's advanced technology and ingredients to boost the skin's repair and renewal process.
The Method: Polish (Travel Size 28g)
A gentle skin-resurfacing treatment dedicated to visibly improving skin tone and texture. Pure minerals are combined with magnesium oxide and sodium bicarbonate crystals to exfoliate the skin's surface, combating dullness, removing the build-up of debris for a refreshed, youthful-looking complexion. Fortified with pumpkin and pomegranate extracts, the anti-ageing polish works to break down dead skin cells, whilst brown sea algae replenishes moisture to reveal a smooth, supple looking complexion.
The Method: Cleanse (Travel Size 60ml)
A foaming cleanser formulated to eliminate debris and daily impurities, preparing skin for the application of further skincare products. Its rice amino acid complex is combined with hydrating ingredients to reveal a visibly softer, smoother complexion and improved skin tone, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. Aloe vera stimulates cell renewal, whilst sodium PCA retains moisture to restore a healthy-looking glow.
The Method: Nourish (Travel Size 15ml)
The anti-ageing moisturiser utilises a complex to enrich the skin. Deeply hydrating, the treatment helps skin retain moisture and collagen for a healthy, youthful glow. Skin is smooth and supple looking. Expect nourished skin with renewed radiance.
Eye Contour Lifting Cream (Deluxe Sample 5ml)
An ultra-rich eye treatment infused with MDCP Complex, a blend of sheer light diffusers that work to visibly diminish the look of dark circles, fine lines and puffiness around the eyes. Fortified with expert technology, including caffeine-based agents and anti-ageing peptides, the targeted eye cream helps skin appear firmer and increases hydration by providing a moisture barrier. Skin around the eyes looks and feels firmer and younger with diminished dark circles. Fine lines and crow's feet appear to disappear, and eyes feel treated.
name: Skincare The Method: Travel Set

product_description:
PAYOT's Milky Cleansing Oil is a lightweight, luxurious formula dedicated to purifying and caring for your complexion.
Enriched with Avocado Oil Extract, the non-greasy cleanser transforms into a silky milk upon contact with water to effortlessly dissolve dirt and even the most stubborn, waterproof make-up without over-drying or disturbing the skin's natural moisture balance. A blend of Carrot and Borage Oils delivers long-lasting hydration and soothes sensitivity for restored comfort. Suitable for all skin types, you can expect a refreshed, revitalised complexion with a healthy glow.
name: Milky Cleansing Oil 200ml

product_description:
Revive tired, weary eyes with the PRAI PLATINUM Firm & Lift Eye Crème, an anti-ageing eye cream infused with firming Platinum, one of Earth's most highly coveted precious metals.
Working to reverse signs of ageing around the delicate eye area, the innovative eye cream utilises PRAI extract to replenish moisture and help reduce the appearance of visible sagging, and Almond Proteins to firm and lift the look of skin. Rich in antioxidants, the formula intensely hydrates whilst defending against harmful free radicals and environmental aggressors. Its combination of PRAI Oil and SYN-COLL™ work in synergy to mimic the body's natural collagen production for eye that appear smoother, younger, fresher and firmer. Irritation free.
name: PLATINUM Firm & Lift Eye Crème 15ml

product_description:
Revitalise tired eyes with the Blue Diamond Eye Cream from Omorovicza. Fortified with the brand's exclusive Hydro Mineral Transference™ delivery system, the anti-ageing cream renews the delicate eye area and minimises the appearance of dark circles, puffiness and fine lines and wrinkles for a refreshed, youthful-looking appearance.
Infused with Silicium to lift and firm skin, whilst brightening vitamin C boosts elasticity and stimulates collagen production to reduce sagging that develops with age. Experience a smoother, refined and tighter eye contour with a luminous glow. E.N.
name: Blue Diamond Eye Cream (15ml)

product_description:
Care for your skin with the yes to Carrots Daily Facial Moisturiser with SPF15. Suitable for daily use, the moisturiser supplies hydration to the skin, with the added benefit of SPF15 sun protection.
Enriched with a nutritious blend of Organic Carrots and Pumpkin Seed Oil, the vitamin-rich formula protects even sensitive skin against external aggressors, alongside providing luxurious moisture, keeping skin soft and nourished. With the benefit of Zinc Oxide, the face cream protects the skin against harmful UVB rays, which can cause premature ageing. Skin is left protected and well cared for.
name: to Carrots Daily Facial Moisturiser with SPF15

product_description: Clarify and refresh your complexion with the Pore Kok Fresh Toner from Korean brand, Skin79. Harnessing the powers of Mastic Gum and Indian Herb, the lightweight, rebalancing formula helps to absorb excess sebum and eliminate unwanted shine, whilst minimising the appearance of pores for a smoother, more refined finish. Delivers long-lasting moisture and hydration to reveal a purified, rejuvenated complexion with an even tone and texture.
name: Pore Kok Fresh Toner 180ml

product_description:
Catering specifically for intolerant, sensitive skin types, the Sun Sensi Crème Visage Protective Anti-Ageing Face Cream SPF 50+ from PAYOT provides very high sun protection from UVA and UVB rays.
Fortified with a Cell Protect Complex and Vitamins C and E, the lightweight, fast-absorbing sunscreen defends against environmental aggressors, whilst soothing and hydrating your complexion for long-lasting comfort. Can be applied over foundation.
name: Sun Sensi Crème Visage Protective Anti-Ageing Face Cream SPF 50+ 50ml

product_description:
Address signs of ageing with Balance Me's Intensive Wrinkle Repair Cream; a lightweight, daily facial moisturiser developed specifically for mature skin.
Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Rosehip Oil and Blackberry Leaf Extract, the antioxidant-rich formula absorbs quickly into skin to deliver intense moisture and hydration, revealing a plump, firm complexion. Helps to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles whilst promoting a bright, youthful-looking glow.
name: Me Intensive Wrinkle Repair Cream 50ml

product_description:
Replenish your complexion with Talika's Photo Hydra Day; a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that delivers a consistent level of moisture and hydration throughout the day.
Fortified with Hyaluronic Acid and Hydra Photo Beauty®, a phyto-active amino acid, the rejuvenating day cream plumps and hydrates skin, whilst recreating the beneficial effects of natural light on cell energy.
Lipopeptides provide anti-ageing properties to minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as vitamin-rich Mango Butter defends against the damaging effects of free radicals and environmental aggressors. Skin is smooth, youthful and revitalised without greasy residue.
name: Photo Hydra Day 50ml

product_description:
Awaken tired eyes and protect against the signs of ageing with the Anthony skincare for men High Performance Continuous Moist Eye Cream (15ml). A blend of Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter, Squalane and Carrot Root stimulate circulation and provide a time release action, helping to keep eyes moisturised and brighter for longer.
Formulated with Arnica known for it's healing properties, it soothes and reduces dark circles and puffiness for a brighter look.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.
name: High Performance Continuous Moist Eye Cream

product_description:
The Perricone MD OVM Cream is an advanced anti-aging moisturiser that utilises scientific technologies to nourish and revitalise tired, dull and lacklustre skin.
The main active ingredient Eggshell Membrane is brimming with nutrients, protein and peptides, working to rejuvenate and replenish skin texture, whilst Vitamin C Ester and Vitamin E help enhance the appearance of skin’s volume and firmness. Together with Retinol, a proprietary carrier system creates a bio-matrix technology that delivers three-dimensional anti-aging effects.
Optimum moisture levels are enhanced with long-lasting results and the appearance of fine lines is reduced. Suitable for all skin types, expect a smoother and more even complexion with a healthy-looking radiance.
name: MD OVM Cream

product_description: Meticulously formulated with French pharmaceutical expertise, CODAGE Night Cream is a rich, moisturising emulsion dedicated to repairing skin overnight; a peak period for cellular regeneration. Purifying and nourishing, the cream with hyaluronic acid regenerates dermal stem cell activity whilst stimulating elastin and collagen production for smoothed-out wrinkles and a toned appearance. Expect healthy, moisturised, plump skin. Suitable for all skin types, including dry or ageing skin. - K.N.
name: Night Cream (50ml)

product_description:
Treat your complexion to Erase and Renew The Double Cleansing System from Pestle & Mortar. Combining a make-up removing balm, radiance-reviving gel cleanser and a luxurious cotton face cloth, the regime allows you to achieve clear, clarified skin with improved tone and texture.
Erase Cleansing Balm (50ml)
A lightweight, non-greasy formula that promises to purify and refresh skin without over-drying. Infused with Pumpkin Enzymes, the luxurious cleanser expertly eliminates even the most stubborn eye make-up, whilst cold-pressed Meadowfoam, Prickly Pear Seed and Grape Seed Oils nourish and protect against free radical damage. Packed with vitamins, antioxidants and omega fatty acids, you can expect calm, balanced and rejuvenated skin after use.
Renew Gel Cleanser (50ml)
A refreshing formula dedicated to purifying and brightening your complexion. Harnessing the powers of Papaya and Mango Enzymes, the luxurious cleanser expertly eliminates dirt and impurities, whilst helping to tighten visible pores and minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Its dose of Meadowfoam Seed Oil decongests and clarifies to leave skin smooth, hydrated and illuminated with improved tone and texture.
1 x Face Cloth
Enhance the effectiveness of your cleanser. Crafted from pure cotton, the dual-purpose cloths feature a muslin side that gently exfoliates and buffs away dead, dull skin, and a soft, smooth surface that polishes and perfects to leave skin with a radiant glow. Brighten dull complexions and refine skin texture.
name: & Mortar Erase and Renew The Double Cleansing System 50ml

product_description:
Banish the signs of ageing with this powerful serum from Anthony skincare for men. The Anti-Wrinkle Glycolic Peptide Serum (30ml) works to instantly plump skin, helping to smooth out fine lines and wrinkles. Buffered AHA's perform a firming and lifting action on skin, reducing sagging and skin's overall texture.
Enriched with Algae Extract, the anti-ageing serum repairs and retains moisture to help keep skin healthy with a regular skin cell renewal process. - K.R
name: Anti-Wrinkle Glycolic Peptide Serum

product_description:
Cope with daily stresses using the Aurelia Probiotic Skincare Calming Botanical Essence; a lightweight facial mist that boasts the power to protect and balance skin, as well as offering calming properties to both the skin and mind.
The facial mist is infused with filtered Glacier Water sourced from natural springs. Packed with curative properties, the water helps to hydrate, purify and balance the complexion. Suitable for all skin types, the essence utilises the therapeutic benefits of Rose Quartz Crystal Water to calm the mind and relax the senses, encouraging an inner feeling of peace.
Complete with a calming blend of essential oils and Fragonia, the comforting mist offers a deeply relaxing experience that is able to eliminate feelings of jet-lag, ideal for frequent flyers, restless sleepers and new mothers. Expect to feel and appear calm and de-stressed.
name: Probiotic Skincare Calming Botanical Essence 50ml

product_description:
Reveal youthful-looking skin with the Prevage Wrinkle Smoother from Elizabeth Arden. Formulated with LUMIFLECT™ technology and a combination of optical diffusers and soft-focus silicones, the illuminating cream targets fine lines, wrinkles and crows feet to smoothen skin and blur imperfections for an airbrushed effect.
Hyaluronic acid plumps skin and increases elasticity, whilst powerful antioxidant Idebenone Ester prevents further wrinkles developing and shields skin from environmental aggressors that lead to premature ageing. The effective blend of botanical extracts, Biomimetic Peptide and GABA Amino Complex delivers intense treatment for a visible reduction in the size, severity and number of wrinkles and expression lines. Suitable for sensitive skin, the cream maintains moisture levels and boosts radiance. E.N.
name: Arden Prevage Wrinkle Smoother (15ml)

product_description:
Reawaken your eyes with KORRES Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Eye Cream.
Targeting wrinkles, puffiness and dark circles, the velvety eye cream melts effortlessly into skin, delivering a host of skin-loving ingredients to help reduce the signs of ageing and fatigue. Fortified with molecule Active HALupeol, Castanea Arcadia (Arcadian Chestnut tree) extract and brightening Vitamin C, the advanced formula supports skin structure to leave it looking hydrated, youthful and renewed with improved resilience.
name: Castanea Arcadia Anti-Wrinkle and Firming Eye Cream 15ml

product_description:
Dr. Hauschka's Regenerating Skincare Kit combines five of the brand's best-sellers that work in tandem to renew and refine the face and body. Ideal for mature skin, you can experience a firmer, smoother texture with improved suppleness.
Regenerating Eye Cream (2.5ml)
Protect your delicate eye area from the visible signs of ageing. Enriched with antioxidant-rich red clover, sea buckthorn and acerola berries to defend against free radical damage, the cream supports the skin's natural regeneration process to reveal smoother, refined eye contours.
Regenerating Serum (2.5ml)
Refine and tone mature skin with the wrinkle-fighting serum. Fortified with quince seed extract to minimise signs of ageing and smoothen lines, whilst replenishing moisture and soothing redness-prone, sensitive skin. Expect a younger-looking, radiant complexion with a velvety soft texture.
Regenerating Day Cream (5ml)
Achieve smooth, supple skin with the luxurious day cream. Specifically developed for mature skin, the skin-renewing cream boosts elasticity, replenishes moisture and shields from environmental aggressors to restore a comfortable, soft complexion. Enriched with raspberry seed, jojoba, avocado and sweet almond oils to support the skin's barrier function.
Regenerating Neck and Décolleté Cream (5ml)
Rich in antioxidants and essential fatty acids, the powerful cream is infused with red clover, acerola berries and shea butter to neutralise free radicals, enhance skin tone and support elasticity. Works to firm, tone and minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Regenerating Body Cream (10ml)
Deeply nourish and condition from top to toe with the repairing body cream; a fragranced moisturiser scented with rose and orange essential oils and warming vanilla to calm the skin and senses. A blend of jojoba oil and candelilla wax deliver long-lasting hydration, whilst red clover, horsetail and birch provide antioxidant protection.

product_description:
Reveal true beauty with the Ole Henriksen Truth Revealed Super Crème; a rich, super concentrated moisturiser that combines elements of a powerful serum with hydrating and anti-ageing benefits for all-round results.  
Fortified with a micro-algae based Pepha®-tight complex to replenish collagen levels, the lightweight formula delivers instant firming effects while enhancing collagen synthesis to smooth the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
An exclusive ‘Omega 3 Happiness Concentrate’ of Euphoryl™ activates dopamine release (the happiness sensors) while improving microcirculation alongside Vitamin C to reveal a brighter and healthier looking complexion. The addition of SPF 15 ensures broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection.

Achieve a healthy, balanced complexion with Uriage's Hyséac Moisturising and Mattifying Pore Refiner Emulsion, a multi-tasking formula specially designed to treat combination to oily skin.
With a hybrid gel-cream texture, the emulsion performs triple action benefits: it expertly mattifies, moisturises and refines for a tighter-looking complexion. Liquorice extract regulates sebum for long-lasting shine control; Uriage Thermal Water soothes and moisturises for ultimate hydration, and enlarged pores appear reduced for a more refined skin texture. Delicately fragranced.

Target lines and plump the skin with Phytomer’s Pionniere XMF Perfection Youth Cream; a revitalising cream enriched with natural ingredients that have youth-preserving properties to keep you looking younger for longer.
With a smooth texture that glides effortlessly onto your skin, the fast-acting cream visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles in just one hour. The rich cream is formulated with XMF, a natural ingredient that smoothes lines to give the appearance of crease-free skin, and Morio Orchid Extract, a nourishing ingredient that gives antioxidant and antiglycation protection to maintain and preserve your skin’s youthfulness. – E.W. 
Please Note: Formulated with Squalene that is plant derived.

product_description:
Specially formulated to support your skin's natural processes of cell renewal, Dr. Hauschka Regenerating Day Cream will leave your skin feeling soft, supple and firm. Enriched with antioxidant-rich red clover, acerola berries, raspberry seed oil and shea butter to protect against free radicals, the cream also contains kalanchoe and marshmallow to diminish fine lines and wrinkles and promote skin resilience. Your complexion be left looking noticeably brighter and healthier. - L.M.

Visibly improve facial definition with the STARSKIN Lifting Lace™ Plumping Face Mask; an elegant lace sheet mask inspired by medical science and compression treatments. Woven with breathable, stretch cotton fibers, the mask delivers a tightening effect that visibly transforms sagging skin and simulates a natural face lift.
The innovative face mask is drenched in a powerhouse concentrate of anti-ageing extracts. Enveloping the visage in a waterless serum that is rich in reshaping actives, antioxidants and collagen, the anti-ageing mask visibly smoothes fine lines and wrinkles to reveal a rejuvenated complexion.
Working in just 15 minutes, the V-shape compression mask restores youthfulness to the visage. Skin is left visibly plumped smooth and firm.

Fight against ageing with Shiseido Benefiance Concentrated Neck Contour Treatment (50ml). The re-texturising cream has been designed to support the needs of the neck and décolletage areas. Helping to restore a feeling of firmness, the formula also reduces the appearance of wrinkles and creases to give your skin a silky smooth look.
Perfect for all skin types the treatment contains hydroxyproline, a high-technology amino acid that parallel skin's own natural building blocks and helps natural collagen production. -SA

product_description: Keep skin hydrated and looking radiant 24 hours a day with the Shiseido Men's Skin Empowering Cream (50ml). The lightweight formula quickly sinks into skin without leaving a sticky residue. Skin is left looking renewed and healthy with signs of fatigue eliminated. - K.R

With a cocktail of essential oils and Bulgarian rose; a very rare genus of rose, high in antioxidants and unrivalled in its ability to hydrate and reduce redness in the complexion, the balm promises to improve the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines and elasticity. A rich textured solution to be applied morning or night that aids in rehydrating your epidermis; absorbing into the upper layer and catalysing tissue regeneration for firm skin that radiates youth and vitality. - K.N.

A light, effective day and night moisturising lotion that thoroughly rehydrates dry skin, this Natio Ageless Extra Firming Moisture Treatment is perfect for use on cleansed skin for a fuss-free moisture boost.
Featuring a delicious cocktail of organic rosehip oil, sesame and mallow, this Natio Ageless Extra Firming Moisture Treatment helps repair and enhance skin cell renewal to leave you looking youthful and your skin beautifully soft and supple.
Directions of use:
name: Extra Firming Moisture Treatment (50ml)

Inspired by ancient Arabia, Shiffa's White Tea Moisturiser synergises nurturing, carefully sourced ingredients to transport you on a journey of well-being and calm.
Fortified with antioxidant White Tea and Pomegranate (rich in Vitamin C), the lightweight, luxurious formula absorbs quickly into skin to rebalance and regenerate, whilst promoting a soft, smooth complexion with renewed radiance.
Resveratrol provides anti-inflammatory benefits and powerful antioxidant protection to help fight fine lines and wrinkles. Skin is rejuvenated, repaired and deeply restored.

product_description: Deeply cleanse your skin with KORRES Pomegranate Mask (16ml). This intensive treatment gently yet effectively removes impurities from your skin, leaving you with a radiant and fresh complexion that exudes youthfulness.

product_description:
Instantly brighten the eye area and wave goodbye to dark circles with Dr. Brandt Dark Circle Away Eye Serum. By reducing puffiness and increasing collagen levels, eyes are left looking youthful and luminous.
Dr. Brandt Dark Circle Away Eye Serum works to stimulate microcirculation and the production of collagen so that dark circles, puffy or hollow eyes, and lines and wrinkles are all diminished, and the eye area is left looking hydrated and healthy.
Directions of use:
name: Brandt Dark Circle Away Eye Serum (15ml)

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Natural Cleansers Collection from Burt's Bees. Housed in a gift box, the trio combines a skin-refining scrub, luxurious cleanser and ultra-moisturising lip balm.
Peach and Willow Bark Deep Pore Scrub (110g)
Made from all natural ingredients, the face scrub contains ginger and sea algae extracts to leave your skin feeling refreshed and nourished. Finely ground peach stone gently exfoliates the complexion, whilst willowbark and golden seal help to remove oil and clear clogged pores. Other ingredients include Hawaiian ginger and seaweed extract to increase circulation and replenish essential minerals.
Beeswax Lip Balm (4.25g)
A 100% natural lip balm enriched with coconut and sunflower oils to nourish, condition and rejuvenate lips. Beeswax locks in moisture so you can achieve the perfect pout and refreshing peppermint oil leaves a subtle tingling sensation.
Orange Essence Facial Cleanser (120g)
Infused with orange oil and soap bark extract, the sulphate-free cleanser gently eliminates dirt, make-up and impurities, without over-drying or uncomfortable tightness. A blend of olive oil, aloe and vegetable-based glycerin deeply nourish and hydrate skin, leaving it feeling touchably soft and smooth with renewed radiance.

product_description:
Lancer Skincare presents the Lash Intense Serum; an advanced treatment expertly formulated to nourish and condition each individual hair for fuller and nourished lashes.
Harnessing the powers of an innovative Triple Peptide Complex, Biotin and Panthenol, the treatment infuses eyelashes with moisture and amino acids to stimulate healthy regrowth. Extract of Pumpkin Seed delivers essential fatty acids and antioxidants, strengthening thin and sparse lashes to result in a denser and volumised appearance. Suitable for daily use and non-irritating.

product_description: Perfect for sensitive or stressed skin that's dry, dull or damaged, Hypoallergenic Nourishing Moisturizer is formulated to soften wrinkles, repair the skin’s natural barrier, and maintain its youthful suppleness. This moisturizer leaves skin feeling soft and smooth, making it a perfect primer for makeup application. - SC

product_description:
Catering specifically for mature skin, the Natural Spa Factory Superfruit Face Polish works to cleanse, protect and exfoliate your complexion without stripping moisture.
Harnessing the powers of fine Marine Salt, the luxurious, anti-ageing face scrub decongests and refines the outer layers of skin, whilst micronised Cranberry Seeds and Pulp Powder restore a radiant glow. Omegas 3 and 6 penetrate skin to leave it luminous, youthful-looking and deeply hydrated.
name: Spa Factory Superfruit Face Polish

product_description:
Protect your complexion with the REN Flash Defence Anti-Pollution Mist; a fast-absorbing, lightweight formula to instantly defend against free radical damage and environmental aggressors.
Fortified with Biosaccharide Gum, derived from Corn and Yeast, the non-greasy mist forms an invisible barrier on the skin's surface to shield from pollutants, whilst Zinc and Manganese Amino Acids (from Wakame Seaweed) prevent oxidative stress. Suitable for all skin types, it can be used over make-up to revive radiance, or reapplied throughout the day to combat signs of fatigue.
name: Flash Defence Anti-Pollution Mist (60ml)

product_description:
Alpha-H Beauty Sleep Power Peel is a powerful yet gentle, dual-purpose resurfacing treatment and anti-ageing skin restorative. The peel boosts collagen and stimulates cellular renewal, whilst working to reduce the appearance of sun-induced ageing, scarring and fine lines.
Fruit enzymes and glycolic acid work to eliminate dead skin cells and prep the skin for the penetration of retinol, concentrated with Vitamin A to visibly improve skin’s firmness and texture. The overnight peel is created with a balance of nourishing ingredients including shea butter and mango seed butter that work overnight to leave skin feeling soft and plump with a healthy looking, illuminated glow.

product_description:
Awake to rejuvenated skin with Talika Eye Dream; a night time eye mask that promotes skin regeneration at the delicate eye contour.
The nourishing leave-on mask glides onto fragile skin and delivers a veil of essential moisture, hydrating the eye contour throughout the night when skin is most receptive to repair. Enriched with Bio-Peptides, the fluid solution encourages collagen synthesis, which reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes to restore a youthful appearance. A healthy dose of Soy Protein targets and reduces the appearance of dark circles by nourishing skin, whilst Vitamin F offers regeneration.
Relaxing the eye contour, Talika Eye Dream leaves skin comfortably hydrated, calm and healthy.

product_description: The perfect way to finish your shave, the Shiseido Men's Hydrating Lotion (150ml) soothes irritation and razor burn with its water-fresh formula. Recommended for normal to oily skin types, the light lotion hydrates whilst protecting skin from becoming dry and rough. - K.R

Clinically proven to hydrate age-damaged skin, the moisturiser combines antioxidant Blueberries with organic Cotton Thistle and Olive Fruit Oil to expertly fight free radicals whilst moisturising and strengthening the skin's natural barrier function. Its anti-ageing properties help reduce the look of fine lines and wrinkles whilst improving skin firmness.

97% Natural. Paraben, petroleum, SLS and cruelty-free.

product_description:
Hydrate your complexion with the Balance Me Restore and Replenish Face Cream; a daily moisturiser to target premature signs of ageing. Suitable for all skin types aged 25+, the fast-absorbing cream is infused with firming Hyaluronic Acid and antioxidant Blackberry Leaf Extract to help firm and protect.
Specially formulated with the brand's unique Peptide Complex, the cream delivers essential fatty acids to strengthen skin, whilst nourishing and plumping for a smoother, younger-looking complexion. Supports the skin's natural ability to repair and restore itself so you can experience a soft, rejuvenated appearance with renewed radiance.

product_description:
Replenish dry and wanting skin with Burt's Bees Intense Hydration Treatment Mask; a powerful, plant-based face mask to leave you with a fresh and healthy-looking complexion.
Scientifically proven to intensively hydrate, the rich formula veils skin with a selection of essential oils including Coconut and Sunflower Seed. Renowned for its water retention properties, Clary Seed ensures long lasting moisture. Skin feels pampered and refined, with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced.

product_description:
Lift and tighten skin with the Age-Diffusing Firming Mask from Murad. Scientifically formulated with FirmQ² to instantly restore the skin's resilience, the luxurious face mask delivers intense hydration for younger-looking skin.
Infused with Brazilian fruit extracts to boost collagen production and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, whilst moisturising shea butter leaves skin feeling silky soft. Experience plumper, smoother skin with increased elasticity. E.N.

Your skin will be left looking and feeling years younger with its elasticity improved and smoothness increased. Suitable for all skin types, this serum is sure to replenish your complexion's natural beauty. K.D.

product_description:
Soothe and protect dry, wanting skin with Uriage's Xémose Universal Emollient Cream, a lipid-replenishing, moisturising formula that works to treat dry or atopy-prone skin.
Delivering long-lasting comfort, the non-sticky texture rapidly melts into skin, helping to relieve itching and irritation. Its restorative, triple barrier actions helps strengthen the cutaneous barrier whilst Uriage Thermal Water and shea butter soothe, hydrate and moisturise.
Skin feels soft, supple and replenished. Suitable for both the face and body.
name: Xémose Universal Emollient Cream 200ml

product_description: Protect your delicate eye area from the visible signs of ageing with Dr. Hauschka Regenerating Eye Cream. Formulated with antioxidant-rich acerola berries, sea buckthorn and red clover to enhance your skin's tone and elasticity, the cream also contains shea butter and botanical oils to hydrate, soften and protect your eye area. The appearance of fine lines and wrinkles will be dramatically reduced to leave your eyes looking more youthful. - L.M.

Protect and repair wanting lips with PAYOT Hydra 24 Lèvres Moisturising and Protective Stick, a nourishing lip balm a light, sweet fragrance.
Working to soothe, comfort and hydrate damaged lips, the hydrating balm expertly heals and repairs dry, dehydrated lips; its blend of shea butter and borage oil deliver intense hydration, restructuring and moisturising whilst protecting from harsh weather conditions.
Lips feel soft, supple and replenished.

product_description:
Elemis Luxury Men's Traveller Set combines a host of face and body products to keep you pampered and preened, wherever you are. Housed in a travel bag designed by award-winning British designer, Misha Nonoo.
Skin Soothe Shave Gel (50ml)
Formulated to provide the smoothest shave, this cutting-edge gel contains primed micro-capsules that instantly release a unique complex of Marine extracts and Jojoba Oil, known for their skin-soothing action. The active base of Aloe Vera and Witch Hazel, scientifically blended with anti-inflammatory extracts of Arnica and Chamomile and cooling Menthol, complete the perfect shaving medium for even the most sensitive skins.
Deep Cleanse Facial Wash (50ml)
A cleanser infused with an effective blend of Oak Bark, Spearmint and Peppermint to rejuvenate and awaken skin, whilst removing excess oil, dirt and impurities. Milk Protein delivers essential nutrients and promotes healthy skin for a restored, brighter complexion and lifts facial hair to allow a closer shave. With a lightweight gel formulation, the daily face wash deeply cleanses skin to leave you feeling refreshed all day long and shields from stresses of life and environmental pollution. 
Daily Moisture Boost (50ml)
A lightweight, daily moisturiser developed to deeply hydrate and recharge the complexion. Ideal for use on freshly shaven skin, its powerful formula is infused with Polynesian Green Tamanu Oil and Cactus Flower extract to soothe and calm razor nicks and burns, leaving skin comfortable all day long. Chestnut and Bamboo Milk may increase elasticity.
Sharp Shower Body Wash (100ml) 
Fortified with invigorating Spearmint and Peppermint Oils, the refreshing body wash forms a rich, creamy lather upon contact with water to remove dirt and excess oil. Plant extracts of Nettle, Chamomile and Thyme are combined with Soya, Wheat and Milk Proteins for an uplifting, tingling sensation.
Instant Refreshing Gel (20ml)
A muscle-reviving body gel specially formulated to help relieve overworked, aching muscles for long-lasting comfort. Ideal for use on the shoulders, neck, temples and forehead, the revitalising gel is enriched with a refreshing blend of Arnica Birch, Witch Hazel and Menthol for an instant cooling effect. Ideal for people who travel frequently, have manual jobs, work out regularly, stand on their feet all day or just for general aches and pains.

Enriched with proprietary CELL REPAIR BIO-COMPLEX to promote lifted skin, the day cream targets loss of firmness and aims to visibly improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkle depth. Infused with rejuvenating Northern Birch Juice (clinically proven to improve signs of visibly ageing), Hyaluronic Acid and light reflecting particles, the moisturiser expertly plumps out wrinkles whilst blurring imperfections to reveal a smoother, renewed-looking complexion. Delivering instant and continuous results, skin appears lifted, firmer and younger-looking.

Visible lines and wrinkles appear reduced and skin feels nourished, comforted and moisturised. - K.N.

Containing barley extract to plump the skin, lines and wrinkles will appear reduced and pores minimised, leaving you looking younger and your skin replenished.

Directions of use:- Once or twice a week, apply product using a damp cotton pad to cleansed face and neck, avoiding the eye contour area.- Leave on for five minutes, then rinse.- Follow with your usual skincare.<small>Please note:The peeling effect can cause a slight temporary stinging sensation. It is also not advised to use this during summer and it is wise to avoid sun exposure and apply appropriate protection the week following use.</small>

Garnier Miracle Skin Perfector Daily All-In-One B.B Cream – Medium, the latest cult beauty secret, is an all in one super cream that combines the effectiveness of skincare and coverage of make up to create a formula for beautiful skin.<!-- p-->

Boasting 12 neuropeptides, the miracle treatment will prevent as well as cure, boosting the skin's volume and smoothing the texture for noticeably visible results. Works on the most unruly areas, including: forehead, eyes, nose and mouth. Expect smooth, plumped up, younger looking skin. - K.N.

Care for exhausted skin with the Mizon Night Repair Seruming Ampoule Serum; an anti-ageing treatment that revitalises the complexion whilst skin is most receptive to repair. Simply apply a few drops before going to bed and awake to youthful skin.
The potent formula is fortified with Lecithin, which boosts skin’s regenerative ability and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles to deliver a stress-free appearance. Vitamin E combines with antioxidants and an effective peptide to visibly improve skin’s elasticity and ensure the face is youthful and supple. Harnessing the powers of Lathyrus Japonicas Wild extract and Natto Gum, the serum also works to prevent future signs of ageing.
Delivering a veil of moisture, the serum controls skin’s hydration levels and eliminates the need for a moisturiser. The ampoule treatment is complete with a dose of Adenosine and Niacinamide, which work harmoniously to brighten skin’s appearance and leave the complexion ultra-smooth. Expect to wake to younger looking skin that is clear and radiant.
name: Night Repair Seruming Ampoule Serum 30ml

product_description: Suitable for all skin types, Dr. Hauschka Eye Balm works to improve the skin's elasticity and minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the delicate eye area. Enriched with carrot, calendula and anthyllis to soothe and protect, it also contains apricot kernel oil, jojoba oil and beeswax to moisturise and soften your skin. Your delicate eye area will be left looking younger. - L.M.
name: Hauschka Eye Balm 10ml

product_description:
Help unclog, refine and tighten pores while controlling oil production, provide hydration, and treat keratosis pilaris with Dr. Brandt Pores No More Pore Effect, a powerful refining cream ideal for oily/combination skin.
Formulated with tea tree oil, an essential antibacterial; salicylic acid which exfoliates and removes dead skin cells and keeps pores clean and prevents clogging; and hyaluronic acid, which attracts and retains moisture to build volume and add fullness to the skin, Dr. Brandt Pores No More Pore Effect efficiently refines and tightens pores.
Directions of use:
name: Brandt Pores No More® Pore Effect Cream (50g)

product_description: Banish spots and imperfections with the Zap & Clear Serum Spot Control from Green People. Infused with black willow bark, its powerful formula delivers a deep-cleansing action to eliminate breakout-causing bacteria and dead skin cells, revealing a clearer complexion. The perfect size for travelling, its blend of aloe vera, chamomile and tea tree soothes acne and irritation on the go, whilst calming redness-prone skin to restore long-lasting comfort. E.N.
name: People Zap & Clear Serum Spot Control (10ml)

product_description:
Dr. Hauschka Regenerating Serum helps to maintain the skin's natural regenerative functions to leave your complexion looking and feeling visibly firmer. Enriched with quince seed and kalanchoe extracts to smooth the appearance of wrinkles, the serum also contains antioxidant-rich red clover to firm and refine your skin. A great multi-tasker, it will also help to cool and calm sensitive complexions. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Apply to skin morning and night after cleansing and toning.
name: Hauschka Regenerating Serum 30g

product_description:
Rediscover your skin's youthful capacity with Chantecaille's Bio Lifting Cream Plus, an innovative anti-ageing face cream that addresses major signs of ageing to leave skin bright, hydrated and smoother-looking.
A supercharged version of the original cream, the hydrating formula targets loss of density, elasticity, wrinkles and moisture loss. It utilises potent antioxidant Tocotrienols to expertly restore the skin's protective barrier to keep moisture locked in, and plant-based Imperata Cylindrica to intensely hydrate whilst performing a lifting effect. Formulated on a base of pure Rosewater, the velvety, rich cream has been enhanced with innovative technology and five Plant Stem Cells (Bionymph, Plantago, Caffeine Free Coffee, Daphne Stem and Raspberry) to help soften the appearance of lines, plump and hydrate, and improve volume and radiance.
A boosted counterpart to the original formula, the reparative and soothing properties help skin regain a youthful appearance whilst Hexapeptides address and help prevent wrinkles.
Your complexion appears re-contoured, hydrated and younger-looking.
name: Bio Lifting Cream Plus 50ml

product_description:
Refresh and reawaken your skin with Mavala's Skin Vitality Vitalizing Alpine Micro Mist, a hydrating facial mist that delivers a veil of moisture onto skin to help wake up tired, lack lustre complexions.
Perfect for perking up skin when signs of fatigue set in, use it first thing in the morning as an invigorating wake up, or spritz over face at any time of the day as a refreshing pick-me-up. Hydrating, softening and energising, the ultra-fine spray contains decongesting Cornflower Water, and Swiss Apricot extract to help tone and exfoliate whilst delivering antioxidant benefits. Skin appears immediately glowing and feels replenished and well-rested. Can be used before makeup application, or for setting makeup in place. Delicately scented. Gas free spray.
name: Skin Vitality Vitalizing Alpine Micro Mist 125ml

product_description:
The Method: Polish from Lancer Skincare is a gentle formula to improve skin tone and texture. Pure minerals are combined with magnesium oxide and sodium bicarbonate crystals to exfoliate the skin's surface, combating dullness, removing the build-up of debris and for a refreshed, youthful-looking complexion.
Fortified with pumpkin and pomegranate extracts, the anti-ageing polish works to break down dead skin cells, whilst brown sea algae replenishes moisture to reveal a smooth, supple complexion and healthy glow.
name: Skincare The Method: Polish (120g)

product_description:
Get a natural beauty sleep with Burt's Bees Intense Hydration Night Cream; a rich, powerful treatment to transform dry, dull and lacklustre skin overnight.
Brimming with natural extracts and vitamins, the non-greasy formula quickly melts into skin, with Clary Sage helping to attract and seal in moisture for long-lasting hydration. A soothing blend of essential oils and signature Beeswax leaves skin feeling soft and supple, with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles visibly reduced. Awaken to a replenished and regenerated complexion.
name: Bees Intense Hydration Night Cream 50g

product_description:
Boost radiance with AR Advanced Retinol Concentrated Serum from StriVectin. Formulated with NIA-114 technology to rebuild the natural skin barrier and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The lightweight, yet powerful serum contains a high concentrated level of Retinol to strengthen skin and fight against signs of ageing. Imperfections are made less visible to leave skin with a smoother, refined texture and a more even tone. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply morning and night to a cleansed face before moisturising. Massage in circular movements until the serum is completely absorbed into skin.
name: AR™AR Advanced Concentrated Serum (30ml/1oz)

product_description:
Treat your skin to the reparative properties of yes to Blueberries Intense Skin Repair Serum, an anti-ageing serum that works to replenish essential fatty acids and vitamins to revive age-damaged skin.
Fortified with organic Cotton Thistle, antioxidant Blueberries and natural Alpha Hydroxy Acids from Apple, the serum delivers a veil of vitamins onto skin, helping to restore and repair whilst nourishing, calming and brightening. Fine lines and wrinkles are addressed, and dull, lack-lustre skin appears radiant, revitalised and younger-looking with a more even tone.
name: to Blueberries Intense Skin Repair Serum

product_description:
Rescue stressed dry skin with the MÁDARA SOS Hydra Recharge Cream, a soft-textured organic moisturiser that works to intensively hydrate and replenish skin.
Enriched with a potent natural blend of Northern Peony, Linseed and Hyaluronic Acid, the formula seeks to restore a youthful, healthier-looking radiance, brimming with antioxidants and vitamins to protect skin from external aggressors and environmental damage. As a result, the appearance of fine lines is reduced and your complexion is left feeling softened, nourished and calm.
name: SOS Hydra Recharge Cream 50ml

product_description:
Revive and rejuvenated weary eyes with the yes to Grapefruit Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream, a brightening eye treatment that works to visibly diminish signs of ageing and fatigue around the eyes.
Clinically proven to reduce the appearance of dark circles in four weeks, the lightweight eye cream is infused with antioxidant and Vitamin-rich Grapefruit to brighten skin, and a dose of Liquorice Root that calms and evens skin tone for a healthier-looking, more radiant complexion. Age spots appear faded and fine lines and wrinkles are diminished. Delicate skin around the eyes looks illuminated, energised and younger.
name: to Grapefruit Dark Circle Correcting Eye Cream

product_description:
Relax the mind and body with the Real Luxury Face, Body & Hair Oil from NEOM’s Scent To Instantly De-Stress™ collection. Designed to visibly improve the health of skin, hair and the scalp, the nourishing oil leaves locks and skin ultra-soft, whilst boasting a comforting scent.
The luxurious oil comprises a natural fragrance that combines pure essential oils. Enriched with a blend of French Lavender, Jasmine and Brazilian Rosewood, the multi-tasking formula envelops skin and hair in a calming aroma that banishes feelings of stress. In addition, Vitamin E and A work in synergy to repair, protect and restore.
The Real Luxury oil is complete with a hydrating combination of Safflower and Jojoba oils, which moisturise the skin and hair to leave you thoroughly nourished.
name: Real Luxury Face, Body & Hair Oil

product_description:
Hydrate and nourish sensitive skin with the Living Nature Sensitive Night and Day Moisture Promo Pack. Perfect for skin prone to sensitivity, dryness and irritation, the plant-based pair work in tandem to leave you with a complexion that feels comfortable, replenished and touchably soft.
Sensitive Day Moisture Cream (50ml)
Ideally pH balanced, the lightweight and gentle moisturiser is suitable for daily use, expertly formulated to help fortify skin’s natural barrier function and replenish elasticity levels. Enriched with organic virgin Coconut and Avocado Oils, it helps minimise the look of redness and combat signs of premature ageing.  
Sensitive Night Moisture Cream (50ml)
Working overnight while skin is at its most receptive to treatment, the rich night cream penetrates skin with a natural blend of Harakeke Flax extract and Coconut Oil. Helping to eliminate trans-epidermal moisture loss, it intensively hydrates and revitalises while effectively fighting free radicals and harmful environmental aggressors.
name: Nature Sensitive Night and Day Moisture Promo Pack (2x50ml)

product_description:
Treat your eyes to the nourishing benefits of PAYOT Clarté Lightening Eye Contour Cream, a targeted cream that works to smooth and hydrate the delicate eye contour.
Infused with brightening vitamin C and plumping hyaluronic acid, the formula's slim, hygienic packaging delivers product and gently massages to perform triple action: it addresses hyperpigmentation marks, wrinkles and fine lines and puffiness and dark circles.
Eyes feel soothed, restored and energised.
name: Clarte Lightening Eye Contour Cream 15ml

product_description:
Unlock the secret to revitalised skin with the Lifting Lace™ Revamping Meltaway Lace Eye Masks from STARSKIN.
Perfectly adhering to the delicate eye contour, the unique treatment offers the world’s first waterless lace mask, inspired by medical science and compression treatments to deliver unparalleled results to refresh and lift. Each mask has been intricately crafted from ultra-fine, stretchable cotton gauze that’s saturated in a slow-release gel concentrate, instantly infusing skin with a host of beneficial ingredients to sculpt and redefine.
Collagen, Adenosine and Sodium Hyaluronate deliver intensive moisture and create a visible plumping effect, while brightening Korean Mugwort and antioxidant-rich Green Tea soften the appearance of wrinkles and crow’s feet for a smoother, more even texture.  
Suitable for all skin types, the luxurious eye masks are effortless to apply and mess-free, leaving the eye area feeling dramatically rejuvenated and re-energised with a youthful looking glow.
name: Lifting Lace™ Revamping Meltaway Lace Eye Masks 2 x 10g

product_description:
Purify skin with the Natural Spa Factory Gel Cleanser; an iridescent, rose pink gel formula that emulsifies when applied with water.  
Enriched with multi-tasking Damascene Rose Oil, it works as a natural astringent, lifting and toning skin whilst sweeping away dirt and excess oil. It also helps to reduce the appearance of dark spots and discolouration, with naturally occurring antioxidants seeking to prevent further damage from free radicals. Non-irritating and anti-inflammatory, the lavish cleanser unveils a refreshed and revitalised complexion.
name: Spa Factory Gel Cleanser

product_description:
Achieve a radiant glow without heavy make-up with the NUXE Teint Éclat Prodigieux Tinted Moisturiser in 03 Dark. Blended with active plant and mineral pigments, skin is left smooth, radiant and hydrated.
NUXE Teint Éclat Prodigieux Tinted Moisturiser in 03 Dark contains chicory root to add a subtle colour to your skin, leaving it with a natural, glowing tint. Mineral pigments ensure that your complexion is completely even, and frangipani and jasmine flowers hydrate and protect from premature ageing. Perfect for use all year round and on all skin types, the light texture melts into the skin and leaves a natural hint of colour.
Directions of use:
name: Teint Eclat Prodigieux - Tinted Moisturiser - 03 Dark

product_description:
Treat dry skin to the Salcura Bioskin Dermaspray Daily; a lightweight formula developed for those with eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis and rosacea.
Fortified with Aloe Vera, Tea Tree and omega-rich Sea Buckthorn, the 98% natural spray penetrates quickly and deeply to soothe and calm itching skin, whilst promoting healthy skin growth and supporting the natural barrier function. Almond and Olive Oils are blended with English Lavender to moisturise, hydrate and restore soft, comfortable skin all-over the body.
name: Bioskin Dermaspray Daily (100ml)

product_description:
Refresh your skin with Garnier Pure 2-in-1 Wipes, a pack of soft, quilted cleansing wipes that work to purify your skin whilst reducing the appearance of imperfections.
Infused with salicylic acid and skin enriching minerals, the face wipes effectively remove makeup and impurities whilst counteracting the look of blemish pigmentation and imperfections.
Skin feels cleansed, purified and decongested. - K.N.
name: Pure 2-in-1 Wipes (25 Pack)

product_description:
Reveal a glowing complexion with the Illumino Face Oil from Colbert MD. Delivering a soothing sensation, the luxurious facial oil seeks to improve skin's tone, texture and radiance.
Enriched with a soothing blend of Retinol and Vitamin C Esters, the formula offers comfort to the complexion, whilst Colbert MD’s unique Triad Delivery System™ transports the oil deeper into skin to achieve optimum results. The facial oil contains a cocktail of Yangu, Marula and Passionfruit Oil, which work in synergy to visibly improve skin’s elasticity, suppleness and moisture. Expect a youthful complexion that is luminous.
name: MD Illumino Face Oil 30ml

product_description:
Gatineau Gentle Silk Toner refreshes and clarifies your complexion without drying it out. Alcohol-free, it removes traces of make up and closes up your pores, without causing irritation.
Suitable for even the most sensitive skin, the comforting ingredients soften and condition your complexion to leave it feeling silky soft and smooth.
Directions of Use: Apply at night to the face and neck after cleansing, using a cotton wool pad.
name: Gentle Silk Toner

product_description:
Treat your complexion to the Gallinée La Culture Hydrating Face Cream; a deeply nourishing formula that promises to moisturise, soften and rejuvenate even sensitive skin types.
Powered by the brand's Triple Biotic Complex of Prebiotics, Probiotics and Lactic Acid, the fast-absorbing, non-greasy cream delivers optimum hydration, whilst antioxidant Myrtle Extract (sourced from the French Mediterranean region) protects and strengthens the skin's microbiome to restore a radiant, healthy-looking complexion. Creates a flawless make-up base.
name: La Culture Hydrating Face Cream 30ml

product_description:
Achieve a smoother, clearer complexion with the acclenz™ Pore Refining Facial Polish from Dr. Nick Lowe, internationally recognised as one of the world's leading experts in dermatology and skincare.
Catering specifically for blemish-prone skin, the polish is infused with environmentally friendly exfoliating beads that work to buff away dead skin cells and eliminate spot-causing bacteria, leaving your complexion refreshed and renewed with a radiant glow.
A blend of Glycerin and Time Release Salicylic Acid deliver optimum hydration levels, whilst Eucalyptus Leaf Extract acts as an anti-microbial agent to inhibit bacteria growth. Skin is soft, purified and ready to receive other treatment products.
name: Nick Lowe acclenz Pore Refining Facial Polish 50ml

product_description: If you aren't getting enough sleep, this works No Wrinkles Tired Eyes (15ml ) is the ideal product to tighten and reduce signs of fatigue. Working as a defense against tired and puffy eyes, the formula works on dark circles around the eyes whilst you sleep, helping to reduce wrinkles around the eye area. The powerful serum features the extraordinary function of the Persian Silk Tree, which stimulates night time detox and is coupled with nourishing essential oils and plant extracts to promote cell renewal. - SA
name: works No Wrinkles Tired Eyes (15ml)

product_description:
A nutritious blend of the all-natural extracts in the Weleda Iris Hydrating Night Cream work to strengthen the moisture-retention and balance of the skin during its nightly rebuilding phase leaving it feeling soft and relaxed each morning.
Providing natural regeneration of the oil and moisture contents of your skin, the Weleda Iris Hydrating Night Cream leaves skin feeling nourished and smooth. Drawing upon the flowers of healing plants chamomile and calendula, the skin is softened, whilst the pure beeswax and almond oil ingredients envelop the skin in warmth leaving it feeling smooth and calm.
Directions of use:
name: Iris Hydrating Night Cream (30ml)

product_description:
Refresh your complexion with the pH Balancing Face Cleanser from Skin Doctors. Synergising Lactic Acid and Cocamidopropyl Betane, the deeply cleansing formula gently eliminates dead, dull skin cells and unclogs pores, whilst maintaining the skin's pH level and increasing the absorption of other products.
Working to improve the appearance of acne scars, blemishes and fine lines, the cleanser is infused with Alpha Hydroxy Acids to diminish excess oil, dirt and impurities and reveal a revitalised, clearer complexion. A dose of Avocado Extract nourishes and moisturises to leave you with regenerated, flawless skin and a youthful glow. Suitable for daily use. E.N.
name: Doctors pH Balancing Face Cleanser 100ml
